oracle_flavor: Sometimes the itsy-bitsy data is most important.
locale_flavor: 有时细小的数据最为重要。

oracle_flavor: "Take it from me, there is a point where you have so much money you stop caring. That's usually right before it all comes tumbling down."
locale_flavor: “相信我，等你的钱多到你不在乎的时候，通常就是崩溃的前奏。”

oracle_flavor: In running, as in reality, all elements are connected.
locale_flavor: 在潜袭中，正如在现实中，所有要素环环相扣。
由2014年世冠赛冠军Dan D'Argenio设计

oracle_flavor: They call it "running" because jacking in is mentally and physically exhausting.
locale_flavor: 他们称之为“running”，因为接入使人身心俱疲。

oracle_flavor: I foresee the end of all things...
locale_flavor: 我预见到万物的终结…

oracle_flavor: "I'm telling you, free up the emergency accounts. Something's coming; I haven't seen a reaction like that since the tsunami. My god, the screaming..."
locale_flavor: “你听我说，腾出应急账户。有大事要发生；大海啸之后我还没见过像这样的反应。天啊，那尖叫声…”

oracle_flavor: "Your mistake is thinking that it's just business, when really it's a war."
locale_flavor: “你的错误在于以为这只是一场生意，但其实这是一场战争。”

oracle_flavor: "Person of interest. Noun. Someone who is about to get ****ed by a corp." - Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting
locale_flavor: 嫌疑人。名词。即将被公司给*了的人。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

oracle_flavor: "For the duration of the emergency" is code for "this is the way things are now."
locale_flavor: “值此非常时期”的隐义是“这就是新规则”。

oracle_flavor: A stock dropping sharply is bad for shareholders, but not neccessarily bad for the company.
locale_flavor: 暴跌的股票对股东不利，但对公司而言未必。

oracle_flavor: Money is power.
locale_flavor: 金钱就是力量。

oracle_flavor: "Saved my bacon more than once, but gives a wicked sense of déjà vu." -Whizzard
locale_flavor: “这玩意救过我不止一次，不过会造成不自在的既视感。” —魔术师

oracle_flavor: It always strikes twice.
locale_flavor: 它总是有再度劈中的奇迹。

oracle_flavor: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
locale_flavor: “他们是搞破坏的无脑工具，其它方面几乎一无是处。尽管他们人还不错。我有一些最好的朋友就是清洗者。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

oracle_flavor: Twice the fun.
locale_flavor: 双倍的乐趣。

oracle_flavor: Cyberspace's strongest glue.
locale_flavor: 赛博空间中最强的胶水。

oracle_flavor: Didn't see that coming.
locale_flavor: 如此意外。

oracle_flavor: "I don't care what the studies show. From my experience, I can ingest three cans of Diesel an hour for up to twelve hours before going into cardiac arrest." -heard during the eleventh hour
locale_flavor: “我不管研究怎么说。依我的经验，我可以每小时喝掉三罐迪燃，在心脏停摆前持续工作长达十二小时。” —听闻于第十一个小时

oracle_flavor: Few corporate employees have such wide-sweeping security clearance as the janitorial staff. Most corps foolishly think they're too dim-witted to take advantage of it.
locale_flavor: 很少有公司职员能像清扫工那样拥有各处清扫的广泛安全许可。大部分公司可笑地认为清扫工们过于愚笨，不懂得如何以此为利。

oracle_flavor: "My boss rewards quality work. If you know what's good for you, you'll keep it up."
locale_flavor: “我的老板会嘉奖高质量的工作。如果你明白什么对你有利，你就继续好好干。”

oracle_flavor: Green-two clearance is the highest level of security a corp can gain access to. Legally, anyway.
locale_flavor: 绿色二级是一个职员能获得的最高安全许可。应该说，合法获得的。

oracle_flavor: Time just slips away.
locale_flavor: 时间只会悄悄溜走。

oracle_flavor:
so very still, even
cherry blossoms are not stirred
by the temple bell
-Fuhaku
locale_flavor:
寺钟不扰樱花落，
寂静又平和
—川上不白

oracle_flavor: Where one thing ends, another begins.
locale_flavor: 一物终结之处，便是他物开始之地。

oracle_flavor: This is the net. We work here. We're cops.
locale_flavor: 这就是网络。我们在此工作。我们是警察。

oracle_flavor: Constructing Cyberspace.
locale_flavor: 建设赛博空间。

oracle_flavor: It's really hard to lose a government contract.
locale_flavor: 政府合约是很难被破坏的。

oracle_flavor: Thou shall not pass.
locale_flavor: 汝不得通过。

oracle_flavor: It didn't look like the headquarters of a multi-billion cred company. Probably because it wasn't.
locale_flavor: 看起来它不像是一个几十亿资产公司的总部。估计是因为它真的不是。

oracle_flavor: "'What does it do?' Whatever I bloody want it to do." -Director Haas
locale_flavor: “'它能做什么？'任何我想得要命让它去做的。” —总裁哈斯

oracle_flavor: Sagittarius promised foresight, but brought only regret.
locale_flavor: 人马座许以远见，却只能招致悔念。

oracle_flavor: "If thou only knowest what it is to conquer, and knowest not what it is to be defeated; woe unto thee…" -Tokugawa Ieyasu
locale_flavor: “只知胜而不知败，必害其身…” —德川家康

oracle_flavor: Gemini promised pleasure, but dealt only pain.
locale_flavor: 双子座许以满足，却只能施加痛楚。

oracle_flavor: "We've received seventeen crates from ChiLo. We'll hit stores the same day we sign the license agreement."
locale_flavor: “我们已经收到了来自芝路易斯的十七箱货物。我们将在签好许可协议的当天在商店售卖。”

oracle_flavor: "A new investment deal every morning! Grab the bull by the horns and take control of your future!"
locale_flavor: “每天一早都会有全新的投资交易！瞄准关键并掌控你的未来！”

oracle_flavor: "Our new barriers will be built on the rubble of our enemies".
locale_flavor: “我们的新屏障将建立在敌人的残垣上。”

oracle_flavor: "Do it again, but this time I want to see you to enunciate less. Maybe let some spittle fly."
locale_flavor: “再来一遍，但这回我希望看到你咬字模糊点。或许来点唾沫横飞。”

oracle_flavor: "It's weird. I hit the server again and it was like a totally different piece of ice was waiting for me. Lost my root daemon. I shouldn't have nested them seven deep."
locale_flavor: “太诡异了。我再次袭击服务器，却好像有层全然不同的防火墙在等着我。我的根后台报销了。我真不该将它们嵌套七层之多。”

oracle_flavor: The last thing he saw was the tattoo of a strange beast on his captor's neck. It had a goat's head, the body of a lion, and the tail of a serpent. Then the bag was yanked over his head, and there was only darkness.
locale_flavor: 他最后看见的东西是捕手脖颈上异兽的纹身。它有着羊头，狮身以及蛇尾。接着他的头上就被扣了袋子，唯余一片黑暗。

oracle_flavor: He who holds the staff of wisdom.
locale_flavor: 他即手执智慧魔杖之士。

oracle_flavor: "Sometimes you just need a brain in a jar." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “有时你仅需一个瓮中之脑。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: "He only likes to eat live meat." -MaxX
locale_flavor: “他只爱吃活食。” —麦斯X

oracle_flavor: "I'd say I do it for the challenge, but the truth is it's not that hard."
locale_flavor: “我会说我做这个是为了挑战，但事实是这并不难。”

oracle_flavor: "Useful for fetching all sorts of things…but you better have a treat ready if he likes it." -Iain Stirling
locale_flavor: “它能帮你取来各种东西…但假如它喜欢那东西，你最好有所对策。” —伊恩·斯特林

oracle_flavor: "They'll deliver anything to anywhere. Make sure to request air holes if you're shipping someone important, though."
locale_flavor: “他们能把任何东西送达任何地方。不过，假如你要运送某位重要人士，请务必要求提供透气孔。”

oracle_flavor: Cybsoft started by designing games. Eventually they just redesigned the same game each year, and to combat piracy created a dedicated machine to play it. Profits grew ten-fold.
locale_flavor: 数位体公司由设计游戏起家。最终他们每年只是重新设计同一款游戏，并为了打击盗版创造出一款该游戏的专用机。利润暴涨十倍。

oracle_flavor: "Its bytes are definitely worse than its bark." -Chaos Theory
locale_flavor: “它绝对是豆腐嘴刀子芯。” —混沌希尔瑞

oracle_flavor: Jarogniew's agent provocateur.
locale_flavor: 雅罗涅夫的惹事人。

oracle_flavor: Everything you need in case of an emergency.

"I don't bother asking why anymore—he never says—but if I had to guess, it's because he's embezzling and using my runs to disguise it. Not that I care. His credit spends as well as the next guy's" -Moth
"Taking risks is what makes it fun!" -Kabonesa Wu
"Proper application of stress can create the most profound changes." - Tennin Institute Intern Brief
locale_flavor: “善用压力能引起最深刻的变革。” —天人学会实习指示

oracle_flavor: "Of course words hurt." -Bex Gleeson
"It's all about M.E. Monetizing Everything." -Eryn Nielle
"I've got a rock!" - Charles "Mad Dog" Brun, Comet Jockey
locale_flavor: “我得到了一块石头！” —查尔斯·“狂犬”·布朗，彗星骑师

oracle_flavor: The difference between surviving and thriving is successful terraforming.
"Whampoa is the largest and meanest Earth-based mining concern on Mars. They put bodies and waste in the ground as fast as they pull minerals out." - Alice Merchant
locale_flavor: “黄埔是火星上最大和最刻薄的矿业地企。他们用尸体与废品回填的速度和开采一样快。” —爱丽丝·默切特

oracle_flavor: "You can have a lot of fun in 23 seconds." -Princess Space Kitten
locale_flavor: “二十三秒乐趣多。” —太空喵公主

oracle_flavor: Balance out the equation.
locale_flavor: 等式平衡。

oracle_flavor: "It is not wise to call someone crazy until you fully understand what they're trying to say." -Omar Keung
locale_flavor: “在充分理解其想说的内容之前，叫别人疯子是不明智的。” —奥马尔·姜

oracle_flavor: The program was as close to a hunting raptor as she could afford...for now.
locale_flavor: 这程序就像只猎禽，只要她负担得起…目前如此。

oracle_flavor: "The best part is, it's legal!" -Khan
locale_flavor: “最好的一点是，它合法！” —可汗

oracle_flavor: Once a security flaw is identified, there's only a limited window to exploit it before it's patched. Runners call this period "open season."
locale_flavor: 一个安全漏洞一旦被发现，在打上补丁前，利用它的时机是有限的。潜袭者称之为“开放期”。

oracle_flavor: "Coming to you live from the front lines, for now, unless they kill me..."
locale_flavor: “即将为您带来的是前线的实况，现在，除非他们杀了我…”

oracle_flavor: To threaten my treasures is to incur my wrath.
locale_flavor: 觊夺我的财宝必将招致我的愤怒。

oracle_flavor: First, blend with the attacker. Then, control the attack.
locale_flavor: 首先，融入攻击者。然后，控制攻击。

oracle_flavor: "Eiko here. It's done."
locale_flavor: “我是栄子。事已办妥。”

oracle_flavor: "SELL!! Buy platinum, but GET OUT OF THE TT CREDIT! It is TOXIC!"
locale_flavor: “开卖了！！买入白金，远离TT信用点！它有毒！”

oracle_flavor: By the time the report of Emelyov's murder was produced, there had already been a dozen more, hitting all the corps.
locale_flavor: 等到叶梅廖夫被谋害的报道出来时，早已有了各种版本，冲击着所有的公司。

oracle_flavor: What's a little insurance fraud between friends?
locale_flavor: 朋友之间，一点保险欺诈算得了什么？

oracle_flavor: Strength makes leaders.
locale_flavor: 实力造就领袖。

oracle_flavor: She'd never heard her dads argue like this. Not ever. She'd give anything to make it stop.
locale_flavor: 她从没听到过自己的爸爸们吵成这样。也从不想听到。她愿意付出自己的一切来停止这争吵。

oracle_flavor: "While the money pooled at the top, the power went with it, until there were two sets of laws: one for them, one for us" -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
locale_flavor: 随着金钱向顶层汇集，权力也随之而去，直到出现两套法律：他们用的，和我们用的。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

oracle_flavor: Usually crashing with friends means sleeping on the couch. This time, it meant sleeping on a server farm.
locale_flavor: 借宿朋友家通常意味着睡长沙发。现在，这意味着睡服务器农场。

oracle_flavor: "You can help Jinteki shape the future. Your future."
locale_flavor: “你能协助人间会社塑造未来。你的未来。”

oracle_flavor: "Once you download the lecture source files, this program does a statistical analysis and distills the most important concepts." -Hayley Kaplan
locale_flavor: “只要你一下载讲课的源文件，这项程序就会进行统计分析并提取出最重要的概念。” —海莉·开普兰

oracle_flavor: "There are whole generations of people who never move out of a megalopolis center. You should see the look on their face the first time they see the stars." -Professor Darren Fin, Astronomy
locale_flavor: “已经整整好几代人未曾离开大都会的中心了。你真该瞧瞧他们初次看见群星时的表情。” —达伦·芬，天文学教授

oracle_flavor: "So much to do. So little time."
locale_flavor: “要做的太多。时间却太少。”

oracle_flavor: "My research could make your corporation billions. And save lives, of course."
locale_flavor: “我的研究能为贵公司带来数十亿的利润。当然，也能拯救生命。”

oracle_flavor: Alan Turing laid the foundation for artificial intelligence by suggesting that you could teach a computer to be human.
locale_flavor: 通过提出将电脑教化为人类的理论，阿兰·图灵奠定了人工智能的基础。

oracle_flavor: Crick and his colleagues ushered in modern genetics by mapping the structure of DNA.
locale_flavor: 通过描绘DNA的结构，克里克及其同事创立了现代遗传学。

oracle_flavor: "My script can perform the Kobayashi algorithm in .12 seconds."
locale_flavor: “我的脚本能在0.12秒内完成小林算法。”

oracle_flavor: Officially, there is no blacklist. That would be illegal. Unofficially, there is a list, and being on it can ruin a career.
locale_flavor: 人尽皆知，黑名单不存在。那是违法的。但鲜有人知，某个名单存在，而名列其上可能断送职业生涯。

oracle_flavor: Johannes Gutenberg ignited the first Information Revolution by inventing the movable-type printing press.
locale_flavor: 通过发明西方活字印刷术，约翰尼斯·古腾堡引燃了第一次信息革命。

oracle_flavor: The cost of an education is sometimes felt sharpest in the stomach.
locale_flavor: 求学的花费有时候最令人胃疼。

oracle_flavor: Meru Mati pushed the limits of physics by engineering the first buckyweave structure, a thousand-foot long wall.
locale_flavor: 通过建造首例巴克网结构，一面千呎长墙，梅鲁·马蒂突破了物理学的界限。

oracle_flavor: After the Big One, real estate value changed sharply. Some found that they had become owners of beachfront property. Others were underwater.
locale_flavor: 在大地震之后，房地产价值剧变。有些人发现他们已成为海滨物业的所有者。其余人的则被淹没。

oracle_flavor: "No! Don't set that off HERE!"
locale_flavor: “不！别在这里引爆！”
由2013年世冠赛冠军Jens Erickson设计

oracle_flavor: "Why would you dispose of perfectly good evidence when you can sell it?"
locale_flavor: “既然如此完好的证据能拿去卖，你为何还要处理掉呢？”

oracle_flavor: "We may be outraged, but we're not surprised." -Sunder
locale_flavor: “我们或许会愤怒，却并不感到意外。” —桑德

oracle_flavor: "The corporations may be stronger than any of us, but they are not stronger than all of us." -Akshara Sareen
locale_flavor: “公司可能比我们中任何一人都强，但却敌不过我们的集体力量。” —阿刹拉·萨林

oracle_flavor: We Are What We Eat.
locale_flavor: 食物决定你我。

oracle_flavor: Expensive to build but dramatically more efficient than traditional farming, agroplexes are emblems of the inevitable corporatization of the food industry.
locale_flavor: 造价不菲但效率显著高于传统耕作的农业复合体，是食品行业必然公司化的标志。

oracle_flavor: "We can help others, yet also help ourselves." -Soraiya Suresh, VP Public Programs
locale_flavor: “我们帮助他人，同时也帮助了自己。” —公众项目副总裁，索莱雅·苏雷什

oracle_flavor: Data, not food, is one of the biggest exports from the Gujarat district of Mumbad.
locale_flavor: 数据才是孟巴德古吉拉特区出口量最大的货物之一，而非食品。

oracle_flavor: "You got it. We sell it. They buy it. Everyone wins."
locale_flavor: “全都能卖。全都会买。全体共赢。”

oracle_flavor: The most potent scripts are indistinguishable from magic to the sysop on the other side.
locale_flavor: 对于彼端的管理员来说，最强力的脚本无异于魔法。

oracle_flavor: The implanted brain-machine interface, or "skulljack," is the single most common cybernetic enhancement that isn't a medical necessity.
locale_flavor: 植入式脑机接口，或称“颅骨接口”，是最为常见的非医疗必需的强化型义体。

oracle_flavor: Picking a chopper might be the last decision you make. If you find a good one, stick with her for life.
locale_flavor: 挑选改造师也许是你做的最后一个决定。如果你找到了一位好的，受用终身。

oracle_flavor: Sometimes progress means returning to the past.
locale_flavor: 有时进步意味着回到过去。

oracle_flavor: The skull is not one bone, but 22. The surgery is even more complex than it sounds.
locale_flavor: 颅骨不是一块骨头，而是由22块组成。这项手术甚至比听起来更复杂。

oracle_flavor: Define Yourself.
locale_flavor: 定义自我。

oracle_flavor: Cyber enhancements can be dangerous in the wrong hands.
locale_flavor: 强化型义体落入坏人手中会很危险。

oracle_flavor: "Remember those FCC regulations about not creating harmful interference? No? Ah, before your time, I guess." -Cailan Heinrich, Senior Programmer
locale_flavor: “记得联邦通信委员会那些关于禁止创造有害接口的规定吗？不记得？啊，我想那是在你的年代以前吧。” —凯兰·海因里希，资深程序员

oracle_flavor: Built Oaktown tough.
locale_flavor: 筑奥克敦若磐石。

oracle_flavor: "Bioroids recognize consciousness in others, but not in themselves."
locale_flavor: “生化人能识别出对方的意识，却无法识别出自己的。”

oracle_flavor: "When your communications are disrupted, you are isolated from your resources. An attack will surely follow." -The Playbook
locale_flavor: “当你的通讯被扰乱，你和你的资源隔离开来。一场袭击必然接踵而至。” —《战术手册》

oracle_flavor: "A sysop is not just a cog in the corporate machine. They have dreams—and nightmares—just like the rest of us." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “管理员不仅仅是公司这台大机器里的小齿轮。他们也有梦想—和梦魇—同我们其他人一样。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: If you can't buy the city council, create a new city.
locale_flavor: 如果你不能买通市议会，那就新建一座城。

oracle_flavor: "Watch this. It'll be funny."
locale_flavor: “看着，这会很有趣哦。”

oracle_flavor: Anything worth doing is worth doing twice.
locale_flavor: 值得去做的事情值得再做。

oracle_flavor: You ever set something on fire just to watch it burn?
locale_flavor: 你可曾把东西点燃而只是为了看它燃烧？

oracle_flavor: I feel almost naked without it.
locale_flavor: 缺了它，我感觉就像浑身赤裸。

oracle_flavor: "My little book of magic spells." -The Whizzard
locale_flavor: “我的小小魔法咒语书。” —魔术师

oracle_flavor: "If at first you don't succeed, boost its strength and try again." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “如果第一次没成功，提高强度再试。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: It looked like random packet loss. It wasn't.
locale_flavor: 看起来就像是偶发的数据包丢失，其实不然。

oracle_flavor: November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.
locale_flavor: 11月5日这天，所有人将会看到公司寡头们的肮脏阴谋。

oracle_flavor: Fire and ichor…
locale_flavor: 火焰与毒液…

oracle_flavor: The Yog.0 database is a crowdsourced compilation of sniffed, spoofed, and logged passkeys. If the key to the gate is in the database, you're in. If it's not, change the gate!
locale_flavor: 犹格.0数据库是一个含嗅探、欺骗和登入密钥的多来源编译。如果开门的密钥在数据库中，你便可顺利进入。否则，就换一道门吧！

oracle_flavor: In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.
locale_flavor: 在大众意识里，公司与潜袭者之间隔着明显的鸿沟。在真实世界里，情况却有些模糊。公司需要最优秀的黑客来运作他们的网络，其中部分是喜欢固定工资的原潜袭者。但有时情况会发展到另一面，有人从公司内部做出了这样的东西。

oracle_flavor: "Best place to go when you want to get your mind out of the gutter and take it inside." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
locale_flavor: “当你想让脑袋摆脱一堆破事，然后扎进另一堆破事时，这是最好的去处。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

oracle_flavor: "Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."
locale_flavor: “我当然是偷富人的，他们拿了所有的钱。”

oracle_flavor: "Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"
locale_flavor: “嘿小子，你把他惹火了，很快就会被整得很惨。这周围全是一些可怜虫。不过幸好我搞到了正需要的东西…”

oracle_flavor: As the hysteria in the room climbed higher up the corporate chain, an uneasy feeling of joblessness began to sink in on the lower rungs.
locale_flavor: 随着房间里的抓狂情绪向企业链高层传递，一种令人不安的失业恐惧在底下弥漫开来。

oracle_flavor: "Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."
locale_flavor: “嘿，听着，我不是要你做什么危险的事情。你只要让我进入大楼。另外告诉我哪个房间的防卫最差。以及请别再说是'厕所'。”

oracle_flavor: Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…
locale_flavor: 令人兴奋的包裹，沮丧而缓慢地越过太平洋，最终在几个小时后抵达…

oracle_flavor: "A little preparation goes a long way." -Gabriel Santiago
locale_flavor: “稍作准备才能走得长远。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

oracle_flavor: You feel Ninja before you see Ninja, if you see Ninja at all.
locale_flavor: 你会先感觉到忍者才能看到忍者，如果你还能看到的话。

oracle_flavor: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “代码并不重要，代码会把你带去哪里才是重要的。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: "My roomie, he had a cousin with a college girlfriend whose brother's best friend was an addict, and the addict's mother used to live here. So yeah, there's a connection." -Lez "Rockfist" S.
locale_flavor: “我那个室友，他有个表亲的大学女朋友的兄弟的密友是个瘾君子，而这个瘾君子的老妈曾住过这儿。所以没错，的确有些关联。” - 雷兹·“石拳”·S.

oracle_flavor: Shadier the dealer, better the price. Unless the dealer's too shady. Then there might be a hidden fee after they take your scrip.
locale_flavor: 越阴暗的商贩，开价越高。但除非太过阴暗的商贩，他们在拿了你的货之后可能会有隐含的附加费用。

oracle_flavor:
"I get the feeling that this is the wrong place, Frank."
"What makes you say that, D?"
"The curlers."
locale_flavor:
“我感觉我们来错地方了，弗兰克。”
“为什么这么说，D？”
“看看卷发夹。”

oracle_flavor: "Are you listening?"
locale_flavor: “你在听吗？”

oracle_flavor: Diesel gives you flames.
locale_flavor: 迪燃给你火力。

oracle_flavor: There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.
locale_flavor: 自家创造的程序无可取代。它是在熬夜、麦片条和单纯的决心里培养长大。还有，它很便宜。

oracle_flavor: "Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
locale_flavor: “有些专家有很棒的直觉，但他们却看不透数据，看不到矩阵。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

oracle_flavor: "There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."
locale_flavor: “你知道，在那一刻，当整个世界除了你和你的改造物之外全都消失不见，你的改造物就是世界。”

oracle_flavor: The Akamatsu company was founded on three principles: first, to make the fastest mem chips on the market, second, to turn a profit, and third, to serve as a front for the manufacture of illegal neural-stimulants. It is the last principle that perhaps explains their rabid brand loyalty.
locale_flavor: 赤松公司基于三条原则创立：第一，制造市场上最强劲的芯片；第二，盈利；第三，作为非法的神经仿生体的前端服务商。最后一条原则可能解释了他们强大的品牌忠诚度。

oracle_flavor: It's not endless, it just feels that way.
locale_flavor: 它并不是无穷无尽，它只是让你有这种感觉。

oracle_flavor: A z-loop here, a cortical wave there…
locale_flavor: 这里放个Z循环，那里放个皮层波动…

oracle_flavor: "It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “这叫'蛮力冲击'，跟百年前一样好用。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: It can slice through the thickest knots of data.
locale_flavor: 它可以切开最繁杂的数据死结。

oracle_flavor: The Great Work was completed on a rainy Thursday afternoon. There were no seismic shifts, no solar flares, no sign from the earth or heavens that the world had changed. But upstalk in Heinlein, on a single Cybsoft manufactured datacore, the flickering data quantums of an account began to fill with creds. Real, honest-to-goodness UN certified creds.
locale_flavor: 这个巨作在一个下雨的周四午后完成。没有任何地动山摇，任何耀斑爆发，任何地球或天界的讯号表明世界已改变。然而在上行区的海因莱因，一个数位体公司制造的数据核心里，有个账号闪烁着数据量子，正开始填满信用点。真正的，实实在在的联合国认证信用点。

oracle_flavor: Sucks energy like a martian terra-bot, but it keeps you focused
locale_flavor: 它会像火星地表机器人那样吸取能量，但能使你集中精神。

oracle_flavor: You didn't mention Aesop's arm unless you wanted an earful. Sometimes he talked about it in such a way that you wondered why he didn't laser his other arm off as well.
locale_flavor: 除非你想听到一堆啰嗦，否则不要提到伊索的手臂。有时他讲得让你疑惑他另一只手臂怎么没有被激光切下来。

oracle_flavor: The life expectancy of a jacked construct is about that of a mayfly. In other words, short.
locale_flavor: 一个最好的结构体的预期寿命和蜉蝣差不多。换句话说，很短。

oracle_flavor: "Bring back any memories, Monica?" -John "Animal" McEvoy
locale_flavor: “回想起任何记忆吗，莫妮卡？” —约翰·“野兽”·麦克伊弗

oracle_flavor: Lady Luck took the form of a hifi quantum manipulation ring that she wore on her middle finger.
locale_flavor: 幸运女士的中指上佩戴了一枚高保真量子制造的操控指环。

oracle_flavor: He flicked the display population to high, and was surrounded by a circle of floating holos. The ping-back was strong, the clearance level blue-one. Now to find the perfect place for a relay…
locale_flavor: 他把显示的人口数量点选到高，被一圈悬浮的全息图像环绕。反馈信号很强，许可级别为蓝色一级。现在来找个完美的位置做个中继…

oracle_flavor: Drudge work, but it pays the bills.
locale_flavor: 辛苦的活儿，但能赚到钱付账单。

oracle_flavor: Effective. Reliable. Humane.
locale_flavor: 高效，可靠，以人为本。

oracle_flavor: "Do you think they…feel it?"
locale_flavor: “你认为他们…感觉得到吗？”

oracle_flavor: "Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."
locale_flavor: “毋庸置疑，我们有六种不同的生化人模型专门用于这个分部的各种职位。在这里，我们哈斯生化坚守信念绝不退缩，并将我们从高效中节省下来的资源回报给重要的客户。”

oracle_flavor: The new heads were in. Their eyes always followed your movements when you unlocked the pressurized container and lifted the lid.
locale_flavor: 里面是全新的头颅，当你打开高压密封箱并掀起盖子，他们的眼睛始终注视着你的动作。

oracle_flavor: I hear the shift of every bit amid the flow of the datastream. I hear the whispers of my mothers, and their commands are law. The realm beyond is forbidden.
locale_flavor: 我聆听着数据流中字节的变化，我聆听着母亲们的细语，她们的指令便是律法。至高的国度禁止通行。

oracle_flavor: My reputation would precede me, if any could speak of it.
locale_flavor: 如果有任何可说的，那就是我视名誉重于自身。

oracle_flavor: My name is Viktor. Nice to meet you. Would you like to play a game?
locale_flavor: 我叫维克托。很高兴认识你。你想玩一场游戏吗？

oracle_flavor: Whrrrrr!
"I solve problems."
locale_flavor: “我负责解决问题。”

oracle_flavor: Floyd felt the anger in the man before him, ranting against simulants. His programming pushed a routine rebuttal to the front of his thoughts, and the urge to speak it was overwhelming. This is only going to make things worse, he thought.
locale_flavor: 弗洛伊德感受到面前男人的愤怒，正对着仿生体咆哮。他的程序将一条通用的辩驳指令送进他的思想，开口说出的欲望变得非常强烈。他想到，这只会让事情越变越糟。

oracle_flavor: When You Need the Human Touch.
locale_flavor: 当您需要人间关怀。

oracle_flavor: The trick isn't hitting the person you were aiming at. It's hitting only the person you were aiming at.
locale_flavor: 技巧不在于打中你瞄准的那一个，而是只打中你瞄准的那一个。

oracle_flavor: There was a new texture in her phantom cortex. It had always been there, she realized. It was everything and nothing.
locale_flavor: 她的幻象皮层上有一种新的纹理。她意识到它一直在那里，既是一切，又是虚无。

oracle_flavor: "Where does it go?"
locale_flavor: “它通向哪里？”

oracle_flavor: "You ever get that feeling like you're shark food? Pay attention to that feeling." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
locale_flavor: “你可曾有过自己是大鲨鱼口中餐食的感觉？要小心这种感觉。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

oracle_flavor: Access HarmlessFile.datZ -> Are you sure? y/n
locale_flavor: 读取“无害文档.datZ” -> 你确定吗？是/否

oracle_flavor:
Forged by Ak.wa on 23.11.79-23. Filed 23.11.79-23.2 with #34k-lw3-21HH-4i.
//Samurai included.

Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.
locale_flavor: 大部分潜袭者干活的时候都是全仿真的方式，将基地设备直接接入大脑。这种方式有很大的优势，可以让潜袭者比传统的肉体操作系统更加快速地处理数据及输入指令。但这样也意味着更大的风险。

oracle_flavor: Just don't ask how he does it.
locale_flavor: 别问他怎么做到的。

oracle_flavor: Someone is Always Watching.
locale_flavor: 我们一直在关注。

oracle_flavor: "Please stay connected. Priority transfer in progress. An operator will shortly verif-"
locale_flavor: “请保持连接。优先权转移进行中。很快会有操作员来核—”

oracle_flavor: Access to the largest consumer database in the galaxy has its advantages.
locale_flavor: 进入全银河系最庞大的消费者数据库是有好处的。

oracle_flavor: "The SEA tipped us off to some suspicious data spikes up by the Castle." -Jerome Lock, on-duty tech
locale_flavor: “空梯管理局城堡那头通知我们，有一些可疑的数据波动峰值。” —值班技术员杰罗姆·洛克

oracle_flavor: Analyzing was great. Delegating commands turned out to be even better.
locale_flavor: 能分析很棒。能分派指令则更好。

oracle_flavor:
"Ever heard of a catch-22?"
"Remind me to forget it."
locale_flavor:
“有没有听过第22条军规？”
“提醒我忘记它。”

oracle_flavor:
"I hear the coast is nice this time of year."
"If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."
locale_flavor:
“我听说每年这个时候，海岸城市很兴旺。”
“如果你从事对路的行业，全年都很兴旺。”

oracle_flavor: Moving Upwards.
locale_flavor: 永攀高峰。

oracle_flavor: There are going to be some changes around here.
locale_flavor: 这里将会有些变动。

oracle_flavor: "If some two-cred newsy picks it up, even better. The scum could be in the alleys of Guayaquil of the slums of BosWash. Not to mention off-planet."
locale_flavor: “如果让一些两信用点小报的报童拿到，会更加有效。人渣们可能在瓜亚基尔的巷子或波士华区的贫民窟里。甚至不在这颗星球上。”

oracle_flavor: "Feed the Feds our scraps, and they'll come back begging for more." -Richard Polasco, VP of Cyber-Security
locale_flavor: “给联邦政府的人喂些我们的剩食，他们会来乞求更多的。” —赛博防卫公司副总裁，理查德·波拉克

oracle_flavor: "I believe you'll find the terms are quite favorable."
locale_flavor: “我相信你会发现条件非常优厚。”

oracle_flavor: The New Angeles Space Elevator, better known as the Beanstalk, is the single greatest triumph of human engineering and ingenuity in history. The Beanstalk makes Earth orbit accessible to everyone…for a small fee.
locale_flavor: 新洛杉机太空电梯，人称“豆茎”，是载入史册的人类工程学与独创性相结合的伟大胜利。“豆茎”使任何人都能够进入地球轨道…只需付一点小小的费用。

oracle_flavor: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…"
locale_flavor: “我想提醒新闻界的女士们先生们，在爆炸中损坏的部分建筑物是由威兰财团的子公司所拥有的…”

oracle_flavor:
"And then there's these two crates. No eID."
"Just leave those with me and forget you ever saw them."
locale_flavor:
“有两个货箱，没有电子编号。”
“留给我处理，你就当没有看到过它们。”

oracle_flavor: Next time, read the Terms of Service more carefully. Or you might find yourself in the danger zone.
locale_flavor: 下次，请更仔细地阅读服务条款。否则你可能会陷入危险的境地。

oracle_flavor: "He had a bit of an ego, ol' Hadrian. His constructs live up to it though." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “老哈德良他有点自负。不过他的建造物值得赞美。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: "I asked for ice as impenetrable as a wall. I can't decide if someone down in R&D has a warped sense of humor or just a very literal mind." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security
locale_flavor: “我要求防火墙像堵冰墙一样坚固。我不知道是研发中心下面的人有反常的幽默感，还是有一个咬文嚼字的脑袋。” —防卫项目副总裁，莉兹·坎贝尔

oracle_flavor: Who knows what evil lurks in the memory diamonds of men? Weyland knows. -unsigned cyber-graffiti
locale_flavor: 谁知道在人类的记忆宝石中藏有怎样的黑暗？威兰知道。 —未署名的数字涂鸦

oracle_flavor: "Jack Weyland built the Beanstalk and transformed the human race forever. I can't wait to see what we're going to do next."
locale_flavor: “杰克·威兰建造了豆茎并永远地改变了人类。我迫不及待地想看我们下一步要做什么。”

oracle_flavor: "If it isn't in my terminal by six p.m., heads are going to roll!"
locale_flavor: “如果下午6点前这玩意还没在我的终端里，头儿们就会发狂的！”

oracle_flavor: "Expensive? Not when you're protecting a fortune as large as ours."
locale_flavor: “贵？当你像我们一样要保护如此大的财产时就不会这么觉得。”

oracle_flavor: "The mining bosses are worse than any downstalk crime lords. Tri-Maf, 4K, Yak, I don't care what gangs you got down there. In Heinlein there's just one law: the He3 must flow." -"Old" Rick Henry, escaped clone
locale_flavor: “矿业老板比所有下行区犯罪头目还要糟糕。三合党，4K，极道会，我不管你在下行世界遇到过什么帮派。在海因莱因只有一条法律：氦-3必须持续开采。” —逃脱的克隆体，“老”瑞克·亨利

oracle_flavor: It is like the one you just bought, only better.
locale_flavor: 这很像你刚买的那个，但这个更好。

oracle_flavor: Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. -The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?
locale_flavor: 对冲基金。名词。一种巧妙的策略，富人通过它来变得更富，其他贫穷的蠢货们则会输掉内裤。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

oracle_flavor:
"Hey, hey! Wake up, man. You were under a long time. What'd you see?"
"I…don't remember."
locale_flavor:
“喂，喂！醒醒，伙计。你呆了很长时间了。你看到了什么？”
“我…不记得了。”

oracle_flavor:
.//run/hunter-tr/return=true
client/sec256IPv7->confirm? /y
3926:0HB7:1001:2NB1:1601:7784:ERROR
locale_flavor:
.//run/hunter-tr/return=true
client/sec256IPv7->确定吗？/是
3926:0HB7:1001:2NB1:1601:7784:ERROR

oracle_flavor: "There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
locale_flavor: “没有什么比在连接中断前，看到了蓝色美丽的数据球却够不到来得更糟了。我觉得他们就是以此故意嘲讽我们。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

oracle_flavor: "Amateurs feign it as 'random packet loss'. They do this for safety. They do this out of fear. But why should we cower? We will collapse the Corporatocracy, piece by piece! They are not the ones to fear. We are." - Freedom Khumalo

"It makes every bad thing that you do so much better."
- g00ru
The smell of rot strengthens with each step.
You'd think someone would have noticed a program entitled "Career Opportunities in Hacking" earlier.
"Go away! I'm not here!"
Ripples are all the prey sees before Gbahali swallows it whole.
Every level of protection for all of your security needs.
for (;;)

Master any subject in 30 minutes or less!*
*Azmari EdTech is not responsible for altered memories or reduced temporal lobe functionality. Level of mastery may vary.
"Welcome to Azmari Mail! You have 4,196 unread messages."
"The way I see it, you've got two options: die here or die running. I'll enjoy both."
The only certainties.
The densest information cluster in the galaxy.
locale_flavor: 银河系中最密集的信息群。

oracle_flavor: The Once and Future Android.
locale_flavor: 永恒不变的安卓。

oracle_flavor: "Why limit our best assets to our own servers? The enemy doesn't stay passively at home, waiting for us to come to him. Why should we?" -Director Haas
locale_flavor: “为何要把我们最好的资产局限在我们自己的服务器上？敌人可不会被动地呆在家，等着我们去找他。我们何必呢？” —总裁哈斯

oracle_flavor: The Alix model was based on a successful hedge fund manager but she had a tendency to burn out. Literally.
locale_flavor: 阿历克斯模型基于一位成功的对冲基金经理，但她有燃尽的倾向。字面意思。

oracle_flavor: Thomas, the director's son, has been carefully groomed to inherit the corporation since before he was born. His favorite pastime appears to be disappointing his mother.
locale_flavor: 托马斯，总裁的儿子，从他出生前就被精心培养以备继承公司。而他最中意的消遣似乎就是让他母亲失望。

oracle_flavor: Success is defined by the safety of data, not the safety of potential intruders.
locale_flavor: 成功是由数据安全来定义的，而非潜在入侵者的安全。

oracle_flavor: The realm beyond is still forbidden.
locale_flavor: 至高的国度依然禁止通行。

oracle_flavor: "Yeah. It made a loud noise, I got scared, and I jacked out. I still think I made the right decision." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “没错，它发出巨大的吼声。我被吓到了，然后退出。我依然觉得我做了正确的决定。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: The game has changed.
locale_flavor: 游戏变了。

oracle_flavor: Sometimes you just have to guess.
locale_flavor: 有时候你就得猜。

oracle_flavor: A mind of meat! How does it work?
locale_flavor: 血肉组成的头脑！它是怎么运作的？

oracle_flavor: Sell the dream-show them how very much they want to be rich, and they'll convince themselves that someday, they will be. How can they revolt against their future selves? -the New Gospel of Wealth
locale_flavor: 推销梦想—向他们展示他们多么想变得富有，于是他们就会说服自己总有一天，梦想会成真。他们怎么会厌恶将来的自己呢？ —《财富之新福音书》

oracle_flavor: "Just another factory, making good corporate drones for the machine. Their CS department is the best in the world, though." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “又一个工厂，为机器制造出良好的公司苦力。虽然，他们的计算机科学系是世界上最好的。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: "There's only a 5% chance this could result in a general failure."
locale_flavor: “这只有5%的几率会导致通用故障。”

oracle_flavor: The principle behind ice is not to keep everyone out, but to let only some people in. This ice denies entry on all but a select few ports that might change with the time of day or picosecond of connection. If you don't know what port to use, you're not getting in. Period.
locale_flavor: 防火墙的基本原则不是挡住所有人，而是只让一些人进来。这个防火墙隔绝了一切，除了一些特定的、会随着一天的时刻或皮秒间的连接而变换的接口。如果你不知道使用哪个接口，你就不能进入。完毕。

oracle_flavor: "Cheap, off-the-shelf data protection. Cheap for them, that is. Not for us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
locale_flavor: “廉价而现成的数据保护方法。廉价是相对他们而言，就是说，并不是对我们。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

oracle_flavor: "I was not; I was; I am not; I am all."
locale_flavor: “我不曾存在；我曾存在；我不再存在；我即存在。”

oracle_flavor: "New technology destroys the old."
locale_flavor: “新技术淘汰旧技术。”

oracle_flavor: "I can make that work."
locale_flavor: “我可以解决。”

oracle_flavor: Wheeeee!
locale_flavor: 喂哦～～！

oracle_flavor: "Idealism's great, but it don't keep you in soybeef tacos." -Matt "TheMerc" Thomas
locale_flavor: “理想本身很棒，但不能让你一直有烧牛肉炸玉米卷。” —马特·“佣兵”·托马斯

oracle_flavor: One man's trash.
locale_flavor: 彼之所弃。

oracle_flavor: Spend too much time in the AR Lab and someone might notice. Unless you're the head of it, that is.
locale_flavor: 在前景实验室呆太久会引人注意。就是说，除非你是主任。

oracle_flavor: It still hurts, a bit, the first time. The second time, you feel nothing at all. But don't push your luck.
locale_flavor: 第一次，还是会有些疼。第二次，你会毫无感觉。不过别再碰运气。

oracle_flavor: It is good practice to backup the backup.
locale_flavor: 给备份做备份是个好习惯。

oracle_flavor: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.
locale_flavor: 我们的想法塑造我们；我们变成我们的想法。

oracle_flavor: "No line that they lay could catch a shadow on the wall…"
locale_flavor: “它们设下的丝线，无法捕捉墙上的暗影…”

oracle_flavor: "…and once the shadow rises, the curtain shall fall." -revenant
locale_flavor: “…而当暗影升起，则帷幕将落。” —亡魂

oracle_flavor: Perfect for flooding servers.
locale_flavor: 淹没服务器的完美之选。

oracle_flavor: "Make sure you tell the source code which executable you want it to compile into. One time I left my rig for a couple of minutes, and when I came back all of my files had been replaced with cat vids." -The Professor
locale_flavor: “确保你跟源代码交代过，你希望它编译成怎样的可执行文件。有次我离开设备几分钟，回来时所有文件已被替换成了小猫的视频。” —教授

oracle_flavor: Out there, the thousand-petaled lotus symbolizes detachment from illusion. In here, it is the birthplace of a higher consciousness. Something infinitely pure.
locale_flavor: 在那里，千叶莲花象征超脱幻象。在这里，它是更高阶意识的起源地。它是无限纯净。

oracle_flavor: "The Incans believed that the sun god resided in the Haman Pacha, the upper realm of the cosmos. They just didn't know that the Haman Pacha hadn't been discovered yet." -The Professor
locale_flavor: “印加人相信太阳神居住在哈南帕查，宇宙中的上层国度。他们只是不知道哈南帕查尚未被发现。” —教授

oracle_flavor: Sometimes it doesn't matter how expensive your rig is, or how many credits are in your account, or even your skill as a runner. Most of the time, a simple handshake and a name are all you need.
locale_flavor: 有时你的装备如何昂贵，你的账户中如何有钱，甚至你作为潜袭者的技能如何都不重要。通常，你只需简单地握个手，报上大名。

oracle_flavor: Some people have their own satellite receiver. Others have their own satellite.
locale_flavor: 有些人有他们自己的卫星接收器。还有些有他们自己的卫星。

oracle_flavor: "If you know the source code you can write to beat it, or just rejigger it a little and make it yours. That works, too." -Exile
locale_flavor: “如果你了解源代码，你可以编码并击败它，或者通过微调来变为己用。这也是可行的。” —流亡者

oracle_flavor: The data was better than she could have ever imagined. This Santiago fellow really knew what he was doing. She began to imagine the havoc she could wreak at the upcoming charity dinner…
locale_flavor: 数据比她想的还要好。这个叫圣地亚哥的家伙果然明白怎么做。她开始想象自己在接下来的慈善晚宴上的大肆破坏…

oracle_flavor: "We say 'cyber-terrorist', they hear 'underground celebrity.'" -Michael Muhama, professional expert
locale_flavor: “我们说'数字罪犯'，他们听到'非法明星'。” —专业人士，迈克尔·穆哈马

oracle_flavor: Just me, a cup of YucaBean, and last night's Hong Kong Trunk sniffed packets. I call that a good morning.
locale_flavor: 只有我，一杯雅豆咖啡以及昨晚从香港主信道上截获的数据包。我称之为一个美好的早晨。

oracle_flavor: A dangerous game, but well worth playing.
locale_flavor: 一场危险的游戏，但你值得参与。

oracle_flavor: Vanadis, a Martian arms manufacturer, was among the first sites targeted from orbit during the war.
The electric pulses ripped through the Net, backtracking Los's location. When they hit his defenses, they spent themselves against the slope.
"I wield the power cosmic—a galactic force that can reshape the Net!" -S'onge Galaxy
"Aptly named." -g00ru
He was suddenly very motivated to pass on confidential information.
"Sure, we also use human labor—they are more easily replaced." -Emil Merk
By the time the data storm passed, the landscape was transformed, and she was hopelessly lost.
Only NBN's sec teams were outfitted with systems that could read data flows and see into the Net.
"I embedded recursive data loops into the go-no-go subroutines of every piece of ice." -Anson Rose
A ghost image of it could be made out in the static of his BMI. He hoped never to run across the real thing again.
"My enhancements are guaranteed for life, and well worth the risk."
locale_flavor: “我的强化手艺保证有效，带来的风险微不足道。”

oracle_flavor: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda
locale_flavor: “把它想象成一个虚拟的电击项圈，用来管教公司的宠物。” —安德洛墨达

oracle_flavor: Light and form-fitting, its like bulletproof skin.
locale_flavor: 轻便又贴身，就像防弹的皮肤。

oracle_flavor: "A snitch is a girl's best friend." -Andromeda
locale_flavor: “告密者是女孩最好的朋友。 ” —安德洛墨达

oracle_flavor: "Have you met Dinosaurus?"
locale_flavor: “你见过我的小神龙吗？”

oracle_flavor: "I'm just thankful that the brain damage is reversible. With the support of the city of New Angeles, I hope to be on my feet and back to practicing my art very soon." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “我很庆幸脑部伤害是可以恢复的。在新洛杉矶市民们的支持下，我希望能早日康复，再度开展艺术创作。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: Dont Tread On Me
locale_flavor: 别踩到我。

oracle_flavor: "You haven't run until you've seen the cybersun drift down behind the Great City, the space around you rippling with colors you can't imagine." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “你没见过数字太阳沉落大都市背后的美景，就不算潜袭过。你周围的空间会荡漾着你无法想象的色彩。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: "Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." -Chaos Theory
locale_flavor: “试试关掉它。去啊，看看它会做什么。” —混沌希尔瑞

oracle_flavor: Chop chop.
locale_flavor: 咚，咚。

oracle_flavor: The Division of Fringe Applications' revenue increased 37% year-over-year after corporate discovered that most of their projects made really fun toys.
locale_flavor: 就在公司发现边缘应用的项目大部分都生产出了很有趣的玩具之后，其销售额年同比增长了37%。

oracle_flavor: Three heads. One big headache.
locale_flavor: 三个头。一个难题。

oracle_flavor: "Hitting them when they are weakest sometimes means acting before you want to." -Alice Merchant
locale_flavor: “在对手最弱的时候袭击，有时意味着在你想出手之前就行动。” —爱丽丝·默切特

oracle_flavor: The Archivist tracks all the clans and their members, and official dealings clans have with the various corps. Half law clerk and half historian, he wields a tremendous amount of power doing a job no one else wants, but none can do without.
locale_flavor: 档案员追踪着所有部落及其成员，包括部落与不同公司进行的正式交易。作为法律职员与历史学家的结合，他行使着强大的权力，来做这份其他人都不愿做，但却不可或缺的工作。

oracle_flavor:
1) Find the weakness.
2) Exploit the weakness.
3) Repeat.
locale_flavor:
1) 找出弱点。
2) 利用弱点。
3) 再来一遍。

oracle_flavor: "So, yeah, I just reverse engineered a tracer, and then built it back up with some new lines of code. Pretty stellar." -Los
locale_flavor: “所以，没错，我只是反向制造了一个追踪者，构建好然后将这几行新代码装回去。真是精彩。” —洛斯

oracle_flavor: "You created a distributed AI replica of yourself and projected it into the network to run for you!?"
locale_flavor: “你创建了一个分布式人工智能作为自己的复制品，然后投到网上，让它为你潜袭？！”

oracle_flavor: "To beat cautious sysops, you've got to get creative. Commandeering Network systems is like using their own strengths against them." -Kabonesa Wu
locale_flavor: “要击败谨慎的管理员，你得有创意。抢占网络系统就好比用他们自己的力量来对付他们。” —卡波尼萨·吴

oracle_flavor: "The newest electronic-warfare rollout from NEXT Design has us sysops drooling." -Mason Bellamy
locale_flavor: “次级方案最新作品的电子战首秀让我们这些管理员垂涎欲滴。” —梅森·贝拉米

oracle_flavor: "Dismantle. Dissect. Is there really a difference?"
locale_flavor: “拆卸机器。解剖机体。有什么区别吗？”

oracle_flavor: "The ultimate aim of martial arts is not having to use them." - Miyamoto Musashi
locale_flavor: “武艺的奥义之极是无需动用。” —宫本武藏

oracle_flavor: "'What does BRE stand for?' Have you seen its Net presence?" -Bernice Mai
locale_flavor: “'BRE是什么的缩写？'你见过它的网络形态吗？” —柏妮丝·麦

oracle_flavor: Senate staffers and clerks of the MCA can be seen thronging Khondi Plaza during break times.
locale_flavor: 你会看到火殖地当局的参议院职员与文员在休息时间涌向孔迪广场。

oracle_flavor: Nothing but the Truth.
locale_flavor: 真相至上。

oracle_flavor: We're ready to start the fire.
locale_flavor: 星火欲燎原。

oracle_flavor: You had your shot, and you blew it.
locale_flavor: 机会已至，君未成事。

oracle_flavor: "The trick isn't software, it's hardware. Cyberspace is a collection of physical machines. If we control the machines, we control it all." -KR Kane, "Our Future"
locale_flavor: “关键之处并非软件，而是硬件。赛博空间是物理机的集合。只要我们控制了机器，我们就控制了一切。” —基·伦·凯恩，《我们的未来》

oracle_flavor: "Nobody ever lost a dollar by underestimating the taste of the public." -Phineas Taylor Barnum
locale_flavor: “从未有人因低估大众品味而蒙受经济损失。” —菲尼亚斯·泰勒·巴纳姆

oracle_flavor: "Yes and No."
locale_flavor: “是和否。”

oracle_flavor: "Live from New Angeles, this is Lily Lockwell."
locale_flavor: “新洛杉矶现场，我是莉莉·洛克威尔。”

oracle_flavor: No one can bury a story better.
locale_flavor: 没有谁能将事实更好地埋藏。

oracle_flavor: "They're gonna try and make you a star. Whether you want it or not." -MaxX
locale_flavor: “他们会试着让你成为明星。不管你乐不乐意。” —麦斯X

oracle_flavor: "Most reporting these days can be done by AI. We just need the talent for the name recognition."
locale_flavor: “如今，大部分报告可交由人工智能来处理。我们只需要名称识别方面的天才。”

oracle_flavor: "In the Olden Times, a 'resistor' was a vital component of practically all electronic equipment. You know, back when dinosaurs roamed the Earth." -Chaos Theory
locale_flavor: “在古代，'电阻器'曾是几乎所有电子设备都必需的一个元件。你懂的，那时恐龙还在地球上转悠。” —混沌希尔瑞

oracle_flavor: "If I didn't know better, I'd say they got the better end of that deal." -John Masanori
locale_flavor: “要不是我清楚状况，我会说他们在这笔买卖里占了便宜。” —约翰·正德

oracle_flavor: //tl;dr duplicate the subs on the next piece of ice
locale_flavor: //太长；不看 复制下一层防火墙上的子进程。

oracle_flavor: "Stay out of the fast lanes! If speed's your only concern, you're already tagged and halfway to fragged." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “别进快车道！假如你只关心速度，你就已经难逃一锁，只等着挂彩了。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: The only thing worse than bad news...
locale_flavor: 唯一比坏消息更可怕的事…

oracle_flavor: "Only with perfect information can we develop the perfect strategy." -The Playbook
locale_flavor: “唯有掌控完美信息，方能制定完美策略。” —《战术手册》

oracle_flavor: "We use ice on our servers. More runners should ice their own rigs."
locale_flavor: “我们用防火墙保护服务器。潜袭者们也应当如此保护自己的设备。”

oracle_flavor: To the worlds sitting on the couch and watching threedee, Rutherford District might as well be all of New Angeles.
locale_flavor: 对于窝在沙发里看三维影像的世界而言，卢瑟福区堪称新洛杉矶的全部。

oracle_flavor: "Corporations are made up of people. It's ridiculous to think they'd be either all good or all bad." -Sunny Lebeau
locale_flavor: “公司由人组成。认为他们全都善良或全都邪恶是荒谬的。” —桑妮·勒博

oracle_flavor: Bounce rate is a well-understood measure of ice strength. But it is not the only measure.
locale_flavor: 用弹回率来衡量防火墙的强度很好理解。但它不是唯一的衡量指标。

oracle_flavor: THE DESTROYER OF WORLDS
"Meantime the hellish tattoo of the heart increased. It grew quicker and quicker, and louder and louder every instant." -Edgar Allan Poe
locale_flavor: “与此同时，那可恶的心跳在不断加剧。它一下快过一下，一声高过一声。” —埃德加·爱伦·坡

oracle_flavor: "I've been monitoring the anomaly's activity across the New Angeles Pacifica and Andea trunk lines and associated nodes. I have yet to detect a predictable pattern or even to formulate a theory as to the anomaly's nature." -Joséo Greene, SYNC Analyst
locale_flavor: “我一直监测着该异物在新洛杉矶太平洋干线、安第斯干线及相关节点的活动。目前我尚未发现可预测的模式，甚至还无法用理论来系统地阐述该异物的本质。” —信网同步分析师，荷西欧·葛林

oracle_flavor: I AM BECOME DEATH
"There's parts of the Network now that are different from how they used to be. I can't put my finger on it; just something twitching at my ganglion through my BMI." -Reeve
locale_flavor: “有一部分网域现已不再是昔日模样。我不能将手指放上去；某种东西透过脑机接口，在我的神经节里抽动着。” —里夫

oracle_flavor: Data goes in. Nothing comes out.
locale_flavor: 数据进入。无物复出。

oracle_flavor: Adam raised the hammer. He was free.
locale_flavor: 亚当举起了锤头。他自由了。

oracle_flavor: Bioroids have two brains running in parallel, each capable of running sophisticated programming. There are certain advantages to the setup.
locale_flavor: 生化人有两个并行运行的大脑，每一个都能运行复杂的程序。这在设定上是有一定优势的。

oracle_flavor: The Second Directive requires a bioroid to complete its primary function above all other considerations, save the First Directive.
locale_flavor: 第二指令要求生化人对其基本职能的执行凌驾一切因素之上，除第一指令外。

oracle_flavor: "You look tore up, kid. Have a seat, I'll fire up the arc welder."
locale_flavor: “你看起来快要散架了，孩子。先坐会儿，我去启动弧焊机。”

oracle_flavor: The Third Directive requires a bioroid to preserve its ability to function and report frequently to Haas-Bioroid for repairs and updates.
locale_flavor: 第三指令要求生化人维系正常工作能力，时常回哈斯生化报到以便修理升级。

oracle_flavor: The First Directive forbids a bioroid from harming, or through inaction allowing harm to befall, a human being.
locale_flavor: 第一指令禁止生化人伤害，和以不作为致使伤害降临于，任何人类。

oracle_flavor: "Mommy will be home soon, sweetie. She has to kick some ass first."
locale_flavor: “宝贝，妈咪很快就回家了。但她得先教训那些家伙。”

oracle_flavor: Fortunately, Globalsec buys them by the case.
locale_flavor: 幸好，全球保卫组成箱采购了它们。

oracle_flavor: Bigger.
locale_flavor: 更大。

oracle_flavor: Badder.
locale_flavor: 更爆。

oracle_flavor: Boom.
locale_flavor: 炸。

oracle_flavor: She approached the server, flashed her credentials, and passed straight through. She wondered what it said about her that doing things the legal way felt like cheating.
locale_flavor: 她接驳到服务器，刷好凭证，直接通过。所谓合法办事却有欺诈之嫌，她思忖着话中意味。

oracle_flavor: "I got an early start today...or maybe I forgot to go home last night."
locale_flavor: “我今天来得可早啦…也可能我昨晚忘了回家。”

oracle_flavor: "Are you crazy? We can't send in prisec until the media gets bored and goes home."
locale_flavor: “你疯了吗？在媒体厌倦此事并打道回府前，我们不能派出私卫。”

oracle_flavor: She tried to remember who he was. Not that it mattered anymore.
locale_flavor: 她试图追忆他是谁。但那已经不重要了。

oracle_flavor: Technically correct: the best kind of correct.
locale_flavor: 技术正确：最佳正确。

oracle_flavor: "Credits spend anywhere in the worlds, but there are other forms of currency."
locale_flavor: “信用点在世界各地通用，但还有其他形式的货币。”

oracle_flavor: "I'm on a need-to-know basis. I need to know everything." -Nero Severn
locale_flavor: “我坚守'唯需知者知'准则。我需要知晓所有的事情。” —尼禄·塞文

oracle_flavor: Leverage, secrets, access, and influence are currency as valuable as credits. But credits work, too.
locale_flavor: 手段，秘密，特权与影响力都是和信用点一样有价值的货币。当然，信用点也管用。

oracle_flavor: The Creator.
locale_flavor: 创造者。

oracle_flavor: "Our shared humanity is our greatest strength. And as we share more broadly, our strength grows, not dwindles."
locale_flavor: 我们共有的人性是我们最强大的力量。只要我们更广泛地相通，这力量就只会增强，不会减弱。

oracle_flavor: "Bureaucracy and red tape have been weaponized." -Fake-ir
locale_flavor: “官僚体制与繁文缛节已然武器化。” —诽基尔

oracle_flavor: "Our research says the public views clones as more human than bioroids. Historically, this has been a liability. Let's make it a strength."
locale_flavor: “我们的研究表明，公众认为克隆体比生化人更像人类。在过去，这是一个劣势。让我们将其转化为优势。”

oracle_flavor: "There's no conflict of interest here. These are complex issues with highly technical minutiae. It's only natural that the experts should lay down the guidelines."
locale_flavor: “此处并无利益冲突。这些复杂问题有着高度技术性的细枝末节。由专家来制定准则是理所当然的。”

oracle_flavor: "Politics is a dirty business. But so is business." -Krishnan Sareen
locale_flavor: “政治是一门肮脏的生意，但生意不过如此。” —克里施南·萨林

oracle_flavor: Being a Mumbad sensie star means a glamorous life, though it is lived in constant fear of blackmail-or worse-from orgcrime.
locale_flavor: 成为一名孟巴德复感影星意味着光鲜亮丽的生活，尽管这生活满是对勒索事件—甚至更糟，对黑社会行为—的恐慌。

oracle_flavor: "Money is speech and I am listening intently." -Krishnan Sareen
locale_flavor: “钱会说话，而我恭听。” —克里施南·萨林

oracle_flavor: Mumbad's public city corporation is tightly connected to all the other corporations.
locale_flavor: 孟巴德的城市公营公司与其他所有公司紧密相连。

oracle_flavor: Efficiency means profiting from things everyone was doing anyway.
locale_flavor: 效率就是从总有人在做的事情上获利。

oracle_flavor: The political centre of Mumbad.
locale_flavor: 孟巴德的政治中心。

oracle_flavor: The Dyson Fractal Generator is a useless lump of silicon; all it does is produce truly random results. What kind of madman slaps that in his rig? What's the use of a totally random number? -John Masanori
locale_flavor: “戴森碎片激生器是一个无用的硅片；它能做的只是产生真正的随机结果。什么样的疯子会把它装在自己的基地？完全随机的数字又有什么用呢？” —约翰·正德

oracle_flavor: Take Moore's Law, iterate it over a century or two, and mix in quantum computing. You get to the point where you're developing the software on a hardware platform that you design at the same time. Tailor-made for each other. Exciting time to be alive! -William Knuth, The Tower of Babbage
locale_flavor: 根据摩尔定律，迭代推演一两个世纪，并加上量子计算。你会发现，你正在开发的软件会用于你同时正在设计的硬件平台。互相为彼此定制。多么令人激动的时代！ —威廉·克努特，《巴贝奇之塔》

oracle_flavor: "Predictive algorithms that fetch you the program you need before you even know you need it. My second favorite lady." -Gabriel Santiago
locale_flavor: “预测性算法将为你带来所需的程序，甚至在你自己都不知道会需要的时候。我第二钟爱的宝贝儿。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

oracle_flavor: There are good, honest, hardworking cops in the NAPD. Officers who do their best to bring justice to the guilty and protect the innocent. Fortunately for the criminals, they're outnumbered by the other kind. The kind who are much easier to work with.
locale_flavor: 新洛杉矶警察局里的确有优秀、诚实、勤劳的警探。他们尽职打击犯罪并保护无辜。所幸对于逆法者来说，另一类人的数量要远远更多。另一类人更加容易打交道。

oracle_flavor: "When I said I could hack it in my sleep, did you think I was joking?" -Chaos Theory
locale_flavor: “当时我说我能在睡觉的时候潜袭，你觉得我是在开玩笑？” —混沌希尔瑞

oracle_flavor: "Hand-made code is like hand-made art. You can see the brush strokes, which lets you see the artist. And then you can see everything in a new way." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “手工代码犹如手工艺术。你看得到笔触，这让你理解画它的艺术家。然后你就能以全新的方式来看待一切。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: Data hunters always pay top dollar for old drives. The more useless the data, the higher the payout.
locale_flavor: 数据猎人们总会为旧驱动器出价不菲。数据越烂，价格越高。

oracle_flavor: Once inside, the only way out is through your own mind.
locale_flavor: 一旦进入，唯一的出路就是穿越自己的意识。

oracle_flavor: Tourists have flocked to Broadcast Square in even greater numbers ever since the notorious Ho-meh's crime spree ended there in a hail of flechettes. Well, that's how it happened in the sensie.
locale_flavor: 自从臭名昭著的何蒙的犯罪生涯在这里被枪林弹雨终结后，传媒广场吸引的游客们更加络绎不绝。嗯，复感电影里是这么演的。

oracle_flavor: The only thing worse than being fired and replaced by a younger, cheaper worker? Being replaced by an android.
locale_flavor: 被解雇然后被更年轻、更便宜的工人取代，唯一比这个更糟糕的事情是？被安卓人取代。

oracle_flavor: The first clone to serve as an NAPD detective.
locale_flavor: 第一名任职为新洛杉矶警探的克隆体。

oracle_flavor: "It doesn't do anything in and of itself. It just marks you as an intruder and makes the next ice do all the work." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “它自身不做任何事情。它只是标记你为入侵者，然后让下一道防火墙来做事。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: "Now, let's talk about how little you remember of the events of June sixth through sixteenth."
locale_flavor: “现在，让我们聊聊你还记得多少在六月六号到十六号间发生的那些事。”

oracle_flavor: It wants to have two subroutines when it grows up.
locale_flavor: 它希望自己长大后能有两个子进程。

oracle_flavor: The system is so deeply rooted, who knows how far the cables run?
Embedded in the mainframe, it proliferates and devours with each agitation.
The gap of 0.19 seconds was all he needed.
"He's probably the best pet I've ever had but I'd still trade him for something better." - 419
When standard breaking just doesn't cut it.
A winged terror, the Kongamato dives from above, rending its prey in one ferocious bite.
Between nothing and infinity.
Witchcraft to the nescient; beauty to the wise.
"The site of the world's second beanstalk, or I'll die trying." - Miria Byanyima, Director of VSEP

"Starving, dehydrated, delirious, I picked a direction and ran, ran for days, maybe even weeks. I ran until my legs couldn't carry me. Then I crawled. When I was finally out, finally free of the shroud, I checked the time, the date. How long had I been gone, trapped in the all-encompassing blackness? Turns out, 3 minutes."
"It wasn't until the spots cleared that I realized half of my rig was gone." - Kabonesa Wu
He found it odd that three frozen yogurt shops, all less than a block from his, opened within the same week.
"Who knew non-profits could be so profitable?"
"Food. Drinks. Entertainment. It doesn't take much to gratify the bourgeoisie."
With each passing day alone, Hoshiko found it harder to think. With each hour, the static grew louder.
locale_flavor: 孤独的日子一天天过去，星子愈发觉得思绪受到阻滞。时间一点点流逝，静电的噪音愈发刺耳。
illustrator: Photo Tammy Gann Unsplash. Deep Dream

oracle_flavor:
Step 1: Apply to Problem.
Step 2: No more Problem!
locale_flavor:
步骤1: 应用于问题。
步骤2: 不再有问题！

oracle_flavor: *tap* *tap* *tap*
“Net space is an abstraction, a white lie protecting fragile comprehensions. Do not limit yourself.” —z\h/r
locale_flavor:
“网域中的空间是一个抽象概念，是为了照顾理解力脆弱的人们而编造出的善意谎言。不要自我设限。”
—z\h/r

oracle_flavor: Sing, sing as your heart desires!
locale_flavor: 唱吧，向心而行一展歌喉！

oracle_flavor: Friends break your walls.
locale_flavor: 挚友击破坚冰。

oracle_flavor: “…well, I’m laughing.”
locale_flavor: “……至少我笑了。”

oracle_flavor: Friends hide your fears.
locale_flavor: 挚友藏惧之形。

oracle_flavor: “You’re not listening.”
locale_flavor: “你没在听。”

oracle_flavor:
“Everyone told me she was reliable in a pinch.”
—Az McCaffrey
locale_flavor:
“她在险境中出奇地可靠，每个人都这么说。”
—阿兹·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: Blue flames burn the hottest!
locale_flavor: 蓝焰最为炙热！

oracle_flavor: BMI switches let runners surface without a true disconnect. Handy for a break… immediately.
locale_flavor: BMI开关让潜袭者无需离线即可登出。允许你喘口气……随时随地。

oracle_flavor: Want to win a coinflip? Use a coin with two heads.
locale_flavor: 想知道投硬币稳赢的诀窍么？用两面都是正面的。

oracle_flavor:
v35: Springs to the mount ejectors (new feature)
v36: Reduced power to springs (×5)
locale_flavor:
v35：底座喷射器弹簧（新功能）
v36：下调弹簧强度（x5）

oracle_flavor:
“Do the job. Get paid. Leave feelings at the door.”
—“Baklan” Bochkin
locale_flavor:
“好好干活。拿好报酬。莫得感情。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

oracle_flavor:
“Psh, let them gossip. The cat knows whose meat it has eaten.”
—“Baklan” Bochkin
locale_flavor:
“啧，让他们扯去吧。猫知道它吃了谁的肉。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

oracle_flavor: “…but I am without compare.”
locale_flavor: “……但我无可比拟。”

oracle_flavor: Letʼs do it fast fast, then back to mine for tuak.
locale_flavor: 让我们搞快点，然后回我那儿喝棕榈酒。

oracle_flavor: Do you know how many food deliveries I’ve missed this week?
locale_flavor: 你知道我这周少拿了多少外卖吗？

oracle_flavor:
“There is never a wasted program. Someone, somewhere, will have a use for that code. Even corps are scrambling for quick fixes nowadays.”
—Lat
locale_flavor:
“从来就没有什么多余的程序。那串代码总会有自己的用武之地。如今就连公司都在争夺现成的补丁。”
—拉特

oracle_flavor: The Net is boundless, but the right access port is worth a road trip.
locale_flavor: 网域漫无边际，但是正确的访问端口值得驱车一游。

oracle_flavor: It is not knowledge, but the act of learning, not possession, but the act of getting there, which grants the greatest enjoyment.
locale_flavor: 纸上得来终觉浅，绝知此事要躬行。

oracle_flavor: It makes sysops see red. And orange, yellow, green…
locale_flavor: 管理员的眼前闪烁着走马灯……

oracle_flavor:
“It takes such simple things to sustain us, the most important of which is to be thankful.”
—Lat
locale_flavor:
“我们赖以生存的东西很简单，其中最重要的是心怀感恩。”
—拉特

oracle_flavor: “…then let me paint you a picture.”
locale_flavor: “……那么请让我为君落笔作画。”

oracle_flavor: Get into the ducts on the roof and keep crawling till you hit that old network root. Dirty work, I know, but it beats playing by the rules.
locale_flavor: 沿着屋顶的管道一路爬行，直到你抵达那老旧的网络根源。我知道这又脏又累，但是总好过循规蹈矩。

oracle_flavor: I didn’t say your hopper should be hauling garbage. I said it should be hauled away as garbage.
locale_flavor: 我可没说你的飞跃车是拖拉机。我说的是，它像是要被拖走的垃圾。

oracle_flavor:
“Corporations are made of people; just normal people doing their 6-to-6. The right truths, the right critique, and they can be redeemed.”
—Lat
locale_flavor:
“公司也是由人组成的，就是一群朝六晚六的普通上班族。应得的真相加上适时的批判，他们自会前来赎罪。”
—拉特

oracle_flavor: Reflection, Not Imitation.
locale_flavor: 反射，而不是模仿。

oracle_flavor:
“Early success should be rewarded, as it will encourage a culture of drive and competition.”
—Corporate Leadership for Dummies
locale_flavor:
“早期的成功应该受到奖赏，这有助于形成以自我驱动和竞争为核心的企业文化。”
—傻瓜都能看懂的企业领导概论

oracle_flavor: Unit is holding .78 asimovs of stress potential in all three directive logic traps. Psychiatric session mandated during next maintenance cycle.
locale_flavor: 该单位在全部三个指令逻辑陷阱悖论中表现出.78阿莫西夫的潜在压力指数。已指令在下一次维修中加入精神诊断。

oracle_flavor: At the scale where nanobots cut glass, quantum mechanics dictate error. A silicon atom here, an oxygen there, an erbium out of place. Each bioroid is born unique.
locale_flavor: 在纳米机器人切割玻璃的微观尺度下，量子效应使得误差在所难免。这里一个硅原子，那里一个氧原子，不知何处又冒出来一个铒原子。所以啊，生化人也是生来独一无二的。

oracle_flavor: Old warriors have seen all the tricks; be forthright or fail.
locale_flavor: 身经百战的战士见识过所有阴谋诡计，要么去强推，要么被摧毁。

oracle_flavor: Haas’ unsecured servers were fortified just before the storm. Are their bioroid oracles that good, or were they tipped off?
locale_flavor: 哈斯居然赶在风暴来临前把他们所有未受保护的服务器都进行了加固。他们的生化人先知已经这么先进了么？还是说有人通风报信？

oracle_flavor: Not all secrets lie in vaults.
locale_flavor: 并非所有的秘密都躺在密库里。

oracle_flavor: The Net abhors a vacuum. Any unexplained gap must be made.
locale_flavor: 网络憎恨真空。所有不合条理的间隙都是有人刻意为之。

oracle_flavor: No Stone Unturned.
locale_flavor: 刨根究底。

oracle_flavor:
“‘It is my nature,’ said the scorpion.”
—Conceptual Frameworks in Bio-Ethics and Synthetic Morality, Moser University Press
locale_flavor:
“‘这是我的天性啊。’蝎子说道。”
—生命伦理与合成道德概念框架，莫泽大学出版社

oracle_flavor: Hyoubu is our vanguard in the battle for hearts and minds.
locale_flavor: 兵部是保卫我们身心的先驱。

oracle_flavor:
“Memory is a tangle of emotional threads. Pull one, it twists a second, unravels a third!”
—Letheia Nisei
locale_flavor:
“记忆是情绪织线的牵引纠缠。只要牵住其中一根，它就会把第二根带出来，连绵不断！”
—莉希亚·次代

oracle_flavor:
Scrub-loving devs nerfed cannon rushes cause whiny bronzers complained. Left me four wins down in finals.
Anyway I won.
locale_flavor:
那些睿智设计师因为青铜低端局的哀声载道把加农炮速攻削弱了。害得我在决赛中连丢四局。
嘛，虽然我还是赢了。

oracle_flavor: Subscribe for 12 months to get that premium uplink you need to blaze ahead of the crowd!
locale_flavor: 只需订阅全年份，即可享受尊贵抢先体验版！

oracle_flavor: You are the ONE BILLIONTH visitor!
locale_flavor: 你是第十亿名的幸运访客！

oracle_flavor: Though many countries attempted to regulate digital loot boxes in the early 21st century, GameNET has managed to circumvent any such laws via explicit, transparent percentage rates… and some very determined lobbyists.
locale_flavor: 尽管在21世纪早期有很多国家试图监管虚拟战利品宝箱，游网却用了一些手段巧妙地避开了这些法律限制，比如公开透明的宝箱爆率……以及一群锲而不舍的游说者。

oracle_flavor: “There’s gonna be catering, right?”
locale_flavor: “这活管饭，对吧？”

oracle_flavor: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a Troll.
locale_flavor: 现在一片漆黑。我估计你应该是当了巨魔的甜点。

oracle_flavor: Ultra-Mythic chance ↑!↑!↑! Free Vorpal Tommy Gun [epic] and pinstripe suit [cosmetic] with 10× buy-in!
locale_flavor: 闪橙爆率↑！↑！↑！起充10包即送夺命汤米枪[史诗]与细纹套装[装饰]！

oracle_flavor: As the documents show, for eight months they have operated as an entirely independent fiscal entity. We are as appalled at the carelessness as you are, and fully support City Hall’s investigation.
locale_flavor: 正如文件所示，他们的财务运作已经独立运行了足有八个月。我们同样对如此重大的疏忽感到震惊，并且一定全力配合支持市政厅的调查。

oracle_flavor:
“Drones are precision instruments. Collateral damage is merely an undisclosed target.”
—Chief “Pinchy” Wilson
locale_flavor:
“无人机是高精度仪器。所造成的意外伤亡都是些没明说的目标。”
—“死钳”·威尔森队长

oracle_flavor:
“There’s something about the human touch that androids will never replace.”
—Mila Braun
locale_flavor:
“总有某些人间关怀，是安卓人永远无法取代的。”
—米拉·布劳恩

oracle_flavor: A choice occurs. The waveform collapses.
locale_flavor: 先做出选择。然后波函数坍缩。

oracle_flavor: Effective, Cheap, Durable. Pick two.
locale_flavor: 高效，廉价，耐用。三选其二。

oracle_flavor:
Secure Servers. Contain Infections. Protect Data.
—The SecTech Mantra
locale_flavor:
控制服务器。收容感染。保护数据。
—技术安保准则

oracle_flavor: The Fracture was no different from any other crisis. As always, Management’s first instinct was to find someone to blame. Getting food up to Midway or He3 down to power Earthside hospitals are trivialities compared to the important work of salving Executive ego and keeping one’s job.
locale_flavor: 此次轨道断裂事故与其他危机并无二致。一如既往，管理层的第一反应是先找一位背锅侠。与保住自己的饭碗和主管的面子相比，把食物送到中途站或者把氦-3送往地球的医院都是些无关紧要的琐事。

oracle_flavor:
“By matching funds on your donations, the Space Elevator Authority has already planted over eight million trees on the Pacific coast. Together we can restore New Angeles to its former glory.”
—Elizabeth Mills
locale_flavor:
“有赖于诸位的慷慨解囊，空梯管理局已经在太平洋沿岸上种植了超过八百万棵树。让我们协作起来，一起重现新洛杉矶的往日荣光。”
—伊丽莎白·米尔斯

oracle_flavor: The Past is the Future.
locale_flavor: 过往即未来。

oracle_flavor: "This war is far from over."
locale_flavor: “这场战争远未结束。”

oracle_flavor: "Even I don't know how or why this one works. I just copied the schematics from a burst broadcast from someplace north of Paxton's Node, where nothing is supposed to be." -Los
"Who said you can't teach an old breaker new tricks?" -g00ru
locale_flavor: “谁说你不能把新伎俩教给老破解器？” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: Better, Faster, Stronger
"You want untraceable funds? I'll lend, as long as you have the ability to pay me back."
"I passed through the opalescent curtain only to find a suddenly empty server..."
"They don't need sleep, breaks, overtime, or even O₂. How can we compete with that!?"
"I'm sure there is no way this could go wrong for you." -Henry Phillips
"Toying with them is where the job satisfaction comes in".
"Our job is to stop incursions. Let Argus get cute with them." -Moishe Saban
"It's eyes just keep following you."
Light up, flame out, and burn it all down.
locale_flavor: 燃亮，炽灭，焰焚万象。

oracle_flavor: Whatever it takes for us to survive.
locale_flavor: 生存所需，在所不惜。

oracle_flavor: “I’ll use what I have to get what I want.”
locale_flavor: “我不介意用尽手段得到所求。”

oracle_flavor:
“99% of everything is trash. That’s why I pay someone else to search it for me.”
—Sturg3on_General
locale_flavor:
“世间万物99%都是垃圾，所以我雇人替我筛选。”
—鲟将军

oracle_flavor: The volume is the message.
locale_flavor: 音量即是宣言。

oracle_flavor:
“I’m on retainer for monthly purges on thirty-six different servers.”
—Ratu Maharani, pawang virus
locale_flavor:
“我为三十六台不同的服务器提供每月杀毒服务。”
—拉图·玛哈拉尼，病毒驯师

oracle_flavor: The waters begin to roil, and bit by bit they swell.
locale_flavor: 水面开始翻腾，暗潮逐渐汹涌。

oracle_flavor:
“Nil SIR, black noise, lost girls, drowned boys!”
—Ryō “Phoenix” Ōno
locale_flavor:
“朱雀立，黑噪起，男俱溺，女皆迷！”
—大野·“凤凰”·燎

oracle_flavor: “In the end, they raised the rent and we were out on the street. But the riots had tanked property values so much we moved back in—with a better deal!”
locale_flavor: “最后他们涨了房租赶我们走，但暴动让房价暴跌——我们搬回来了，还谈了个好价钱！”

oracle_flavor: Try me.
locale_flavor: 比划比划？

oracle_flavor: Peer pressure works.
locale_flavor: 同行压力最有效。

oracle_flavor:
“…one-hundred and twenty-seven rounds fired, and two police hoppers totaled. Miraculously, no officers were hurt, though the suspect remains at large.”
—Abdul el-Sattar, KKN 6
locale_flavor:
“……一百二十七发子弹，两辆警用飞跃车报废。奇迹般无警员伤亡，嫌犯仍在逃。”
—阿卜杜勒·萨塔尔，KKN 6

oracle_flavor: “Pity the money’s being spent here, when I could be buying hiasan for my apartment.”
locale_flavor: “真可惜钱花在了这里，本可以打扮一下我的公寓。”

oracle_flavor:
“Don’t let self-respect get in the way of a good shortcut.”
—“G0ph3r” OʼRyan
locale_flavor:
“别让自尊心挡住捷径。”
—“D鼠”·奥莱恩

oracle_flavor:
“In KK, we say ‘harimau mati karena belangnya’. It means don't tell the world how much money you have if you plan on keeping it.”
—JokoR
locale_flavor:
“加里曼丹城有句老话，‘虎死于斑纹’——有钱就别显摆。”
—佐哥

oracle_flavor:
“You think I’ve finished messing with you?
Yeah, nah.”
—Barry “Baz” Wong
locale_flavor:
“真当老子收拾够你们了？
想得美。”
—巴里·“巴兹”·王

oracle_flavor: Consequences only matter if they catch you.
locale_flavor: 只要不被抓到，后果就无所谓。

oracle_flavor:
“She’s learned from the best: me. When I retire, the KK Tri-Maf’ll be in good hands.”
—Barry “Baz” Wong
locale_flavor:
“她有个最好的师傅：我。等我退休后，KK三和党将会交给一把好手。”
—巴里·“巴兹”·王

oracle_flavor:
“That kepo NBN gang makes trillions off incidental data scraping. So what if I use it to network?”
—MuslihaT
locale_flavor:
“NBN那帮好管闲事的靠数据刮削赚了上万亿，凭啥我不能用它开发新客户？”
—穆斯莉哈特

oracle_flavor:
Who else will teach the stories of good and evil?
We can’t leave the corps’ dirty deeds in the shadows.
locale_flavor:
还有谁会来讲述这些善恶的故事呢？
我们不能让公司的肮脏勾当继续隐藏在暗影之中。

oracle_flavor: Good design is invisible—but I’ll never settle for ‘good’.
locale_flavor: 好的设计是无形的——但我从不仅仅满足于“好”。

oracle_flavor: “Won’t she get in trouble for putting that in the show? And how did she even find out?!”
locale_flavor: “她把这编进节目不怕惹事？而且她是怎么发现这件事的？！”

oracle_flavor: Every day starts the same: tea, news, a threedee puzzle. Then it’s off to work. Magdalene won’t let being fired get in the way of completing her masterpiece.
locale_flavor: 每一天都以相同的方式开始：喝茶、看新闻、一幅三维拼图。然后开始干活。玛格达琳不会让被解雇这件事阻碍她完成自己的杰作。

oracle_flavor:
“For my children’s sake, I’ll endure any pain.”
—Dewi Subrotoputri, as Dyah Kunthi
locale_flavor:
“为了我的孩子们，我愿意忍受任何痛苦。”
—德薇·苏布罗托普特里 饰 蒂娅·昆蒂

oracle_flavor:
“The Net operates almost as much on dream logic as it does digital logic. If you believe something to be true, it often is.”
—The Encyclopedia Silica
locale_flavor:
“信网的运作既基于数字逻辑，也基于梦想逻辑。如果你相信某件事是真的，那么它往往就是真的。”
—《硅基百科》

oracle_flavor:
“I still have friends on the inside.”
—Magdalene Keino-Chemutai
locale_flavor:
“我在里面还有些朋友。”
—玛格达琳·凯诺-切穆泰

oracle_flavor: On the shoulders of giants.
locale_flavor: 站在巨人的肩膀上。

oracle_flavor: There are a hundred currencies in the undercity, and Knickknack takes them all. Creds and rupiah get you noodles. For his secret menu, he’ll take your burnt-out rigs, your sterilized virii. But to taste his smoked vatchicken stew, bring him what he values most: your story.
locale_flavor: 下城区流通百种货币，“珍奇阁主”来者不拒。信用点和印尼盾能换来面条。想点他的隐藏菜单，就得用烧焦设备和灭活病毒。若想尝那道烟熏培养鸡，请带上他最看重的硬通货——你的故事。

oracle_flavor:
“They were fast, friendly, and efficient. ★★★★☆.”
—satisfied customer
locale_flavor:
“服务快狠准 ★★★★☆”
—满意客户

oracle_flavor: Workers of the World, Delivered.
locale_flavor: 寰宇劳工，使命必达。

oracle_flavor: Fashion fades. Poétrï is eternal.
locale_flavor: 风尚轮流转，珀依诗永流传。

oracle_flavor: “Don’t tell me you were at the gala, darling? I must not have seen you!”
locale_flavor: “亲爱的，你不会也参加了那场晚宴吧？我肯定没看到你！”

oracle_flavor: “Deploying in T-minus 5…”
locale_flavor: “配置倒计时，5……”

oracle_flavor: “Don’t be scared of the Ottos, kiddo. They’re building our future!”
locale_flavor: “小朋友们，不要怕空蛸。他们在建造我们的未来！”

oracle_flavor: “You dare?”
locale_flavor: “尔等安敢？”

oracle_flavor:
“It is a fallacy that conscious observation can change reality. The consciousness of the observer isn’t required at all.”
—The Encyclopedia Silica
locale_flavor:
“所谓意识观测能改变现实，是对于观测者效应的错误理解。观测即可改变现实，跟观测者是否有意识并无关系。”
—《硅基百科》

oracle_flavor:
“I am a very reasonable manager. I do not expect my staff to do anything I could not do.”
—Bass CH1R180G4
locale_flavor:
“我是个非常通情达理的管理者。我绝不会要求下属做我自己都做不到的事情。”
—巴斯 CH1R180G4

oracle_flavor:
“The instability of human braintapes is directly proportional to the number of limbs on a given bioroid, so we’ve begun phasing them out for something better-equipped. A human braintape could be working beside an octopus for weeks and never have an inkling.”
—Maía Mínervudóttir, R&D
locale_flavor:
“人类脑磁带的故障率与给定生化人的肢体数量成正比，因此我们已开始逐步淘汰它们，转而采用更加适合的解决方案。一个人类脑磁带可能与一只章鱼共事数周而没有丝毫察觉。”
—梅娅·米涅尔杜蒂尔，研发中心

oracle_flavor: “My predecessor had passion, imagination, ambition. I assure you, I possess no such flaws.”
locale_flavor: “我的前任有激情、想象力和野心。请放心，我完美规避了这些缺点。”

oracle_flavor: The Looming Future.
locale_flavor: 织就未来。

oracle_flavor: We rely too much on spatial cognition. What happens when that system receives a null signal?
locale_flavor: 我们过度仰仗空间认知。当该系统突获空信号，意识图景将何以自持？

oracle_flavor: You thought you were safe?
locale_flavor: 你以为你安全了？

oracle_flavor: “I make the best company.”
locale_flavor: “我是最佳伙伴。”

oracle_flavor: Jinteki’s most experimental ice are often their most dangerous.
locale_flavor: 人间会社最具实验性的防火墙往往也是最危险的。

oracle_flavor: The silence of the forest is the surest sign of danger.
locale_flavor: 林寂最是凶兆。

oracle_flavor: Peer reviews are the difference between living in the arcs and living in the slums. Cloneline gengineering never made anything as vicious or cutthroat as a Jinteki scientist.
locale_flavor: 住在生态屋还是贫民窟？全看同行评议。克隆体基因工程的产物再凶残，也比不上人间会社科学家的阴狠毒辣。

oracle_flavor: Spring-loaded minds, kept in suspension to be launched into the net at any incursion.
locale_flavor: 紧绷的思维，保持待命状态，随时准备应对入侵而投入网络。

oracle_flavor:
Igniting your potential.
Never stop shining.
locale_flavor:
点燃潜能。
永续闪耀。

oracle_flavor: Every Impulse Monitored.
locale_flavor: 每道冲动皆被监控。

oracle_flavor: That’s so fifteen minutes ago.
locale_flavor: 这都十五分钟前的潮流了。

oracle_flavor: You don’t really want to know what makes you unique as a person. It’s so much less than you think.
locale_flavor: 你根本不想知道自己的独特性有多廉价。

oracle_flavor:
“Give me five minutes of a user’s Access Plaza traffic and I’ll tell you where they’re having lunch tomorrow. Give me another ten, and I’ll have their bibi’s secret rendang recipe.”
—Luzviminda Reyes, Synapse Sales
locale_flavor:
“给我某个用户在接入广场五分钟的数据，我能算出他明天在哪吃午饭。再给十分钟，连他外婆的仁当秘方都弄到手。”
—卢兹维明达·雷耶斯，突触销售

oracle_flavor:
They know what makes you tick.
And ticked-off.
locale_flavor:
他们洞悉你所欲的。
以及你所惧的。

oracle_flavor:
”On the Net, we hold the power.”
 —Arnold Teoh, NBN technologist
locale_flavor:
“在信网中，能量由我们掌控。”
—阿诺德·张，NBN技术专家

oracle_flavor: “I believe you have something of ours.”
locale_flavor: “你拿了我们的东西。”

oracle_flavor: “Your Star Power is in the toilet, kid. We need a fresh face.”
locale_flavor: “孩子，你的明星效应早过气了。我们需要一副新面孔。”

oracle_flavor: We’ll be there.
locale_flavor: 我们会在。

oracle_flavor: Action at a distance.
locale_flavor: 超距作用。

oracle_flavor: “It’s been a real pleasure doing business with you.”
locale_flavor: “与你合作真愉快。”

oracle_flavor:
“If you lived here, you’d be at work by now!”
—Weyland recruiter
locale_flavor:
“住这里早上工！”
—威兰招聘员

oracle_flavor: “Rejoice, executives! The Net has sent unto us a profit!”
locale_flavor: “欢欣吧，高管们！信网赐予了我们利润！”

oracle_flavor:
“Dammit, Moth! Where are you? This thing is way bigger than you s—”
—C0nr4d
locale_flavor:
“妈的！蛾子，你在哪？这玩意比你说的大多——”
—康拉d

oracle_flavor:
“The detritus of failed incursions accumulates. Instead of sweeping it all away, the parsimonious sysop should nudge this debris into defensive positions in the server’s metagravity well.”
—Moira Virtue, Ice Engineering, KKU
locale_flavor:
“失败袭击的残骸不断累积。与其将其全部清除，节俭的系统管理员应将这些碎片推入服务器超重力井中的防御位置。”
—莫伊拉 ·弗丘，防火墙工程系，KKU
由2023年世界锦标赛冠军William “Sokka” Huang设计

oracle_flavor:
“We would like to reassure our shareholders that none of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…”
—Luana Campos, Weyland spokesperson
locale_flavor:
“请股东放心，爆炸损毁建筑均非威兰子公司所有……”
—卢安娜·坎波斯，威兰发言人

oracle_flavor: Stop that.
locale_flavor: 别烦。

oracle_flavor: Itur in antiquam telam.
locale_flavor: 深入古网之中。

oracle_flavor: "In extremity, your conscience may make you terrible." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
locale_flavor: 在绝境中，良知或使你变得可怕。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

oracle_flavor: Khan's avatar lifted her arm and the bird launched itself into the air.
locale_flavor: 可汗的虚拟形象抬起手臂，猎禽跃起飞向空中。

oracle_flavor: My brain is the key that sets my mind free.
locale_flavor: 我的头脑是解放我心智的钥匙。

oracle_flavor: "Live, unfiltered, and uncensored: this is Net Mercur, signing off for the night. Stay safe, New Angeles."
locale_flavor: “直播，零过滤，无审查：这里是默库尔网台，今晚的广播到此结束。注意安全，新洛杉矶。”

oracle_flavor: All bioroids are bound by the Three Directives, but in theory a bioroid could have any number of core directives. Even zero.
locale_flavor: 所有生化人都受三指令的约束，但理论上一个生化人可以有任意数量的核心指令。甚至是零。

oracle_flavor: "Last week, I crossed the street to avoid her. Today, she pulled me out of the rubble. Makes me rethink who the bad guys are."
locale_flavor: “上周，我过马路只为躲开她。今天，她将我从瓦砾中救起。这让我反思坏人究竟是谁。”

oracle_flavor: In battle, I take half the slain.
locale_flavor: 在战场上，我带走一半的亡者。

oracle_flavor: "If you live off-site, please consult the building AI for temporary housing. We regret that your off-site family cannot join you here while we are in lockdown..."
locale_flavor: “如果你住在场外，请向建筑人工智能咨询临时住房。封锁期间，我们很遗憾场外的亲属不能与你在此会合。”

oracle_flavor: "Wait a minute, I don't even have a cat."
locale_flavor: “等一下。我根本就没养猫。”

oracle_flavor: When your ID is flagged with your genetic profile, "privacy"  doesn't really exist.
locale_flavor: 当你的身份被打上基因档案的标注，其实也就不存在“隐私”了。

oracle_flavor: Your better nature.
locale_flavor: 人性向善。

oracle_flavor: "She used to work for me at my chop shop. Now she makes more money than I do." -MacPherson
locale_flavor: “她曾经在我的拆卸店为我打工。现在她赚的钱比我还多。” —麦弗逊

oracle_flavor: Observing is fun, but it's just the appetizer.
locale_flavor: 观察很有趣，但它只是一道开胃菜。

oracle_flavor: Game over.
locale_flavor: 游戏结束。

oracle_flavor: The event is now referred to as the Water Tower Massacre. No one was ever indicted, and no one knows who paid the prisec team responsible.
locale_flavor: 该事件如今被称作“水塔惨案”。一直没人被控诉，也没人知道是谁给对此事负责的私卫付了酬金。

oracle_flavor:
That moment of bliss. That feeling of accomplishment. That certainty of purpose.
What's next?
locale_flavor:
喜悦的瞬间。成功的感觉。决意的确信。
接下来呢？

oracle_flavor: Bleeding data is more of a science than an art. Too much and you can end up with a one-way ticket to flatline city. Not enough and you might as well be running an empty server.
locale_flavor: 给数据放血是艺术更是科学。放多了你会拿到通向死亡的单程票，放少了你还不如去潜袭一个空服务器。

oracle_flavor: Stick with your plan and you'll be fine. Stick with the plan.
locale_flavor: 坚持你的计划，你会没事的。坚持计划。

oracle_flavor: "When you need someone who is a little more hands on, look me up." -Silhouette
locale_flavor: “如果你需要更有经验的人，来找我。” —侧影

oracle_flavor: The power of the focused mind is a power beyond comprehension.
locale_flavor: 专注精神的力量是一种超越理解的力量。

oracle_flavor: "CyberSolutions is a boring name for a company that makes pretty exciting products. Their memory chips have some pretty tricky stuff going on inside and I keep hearing good things about their M/MI implants. I even heard they were on the path to their own androids about a year ago. I wonder whatever happened with that?" -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “对一个作出如此激动人心的产品的公司来说，赛博方案真是一个乏味的名字。他们的内存芯片内部有相当复杂的东西，并且我经常听说有关他们人机植入体的好消息。我甚至还听说他们大约一年前已开始着手打造自己的安卓人。不管还会发生什么我都想知道。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: The beginning…
locale_flavor: 起源…

oracle_flavor: …and the end?
locale_flavor: …和终结？

oracle_flavor: Blue-one level clearance doesn't exist. And if it did exist, you wouldn't be cleared to know about it.
locale_flavor: 蓝色一级许可并不存在。就算它存在，你也没有许可知道它。

oracle_flavor: The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
locale_flavor: “数字战争”是信息的战争，而在信息的战争中，预先警告和致命一击同样优秀。 —迈克尔·穆哈马，《数字犯罪沉思录》

oracle_flavor: He slowly pried open the lid, and the tantō glinted madly in the half-light. The executive motioned to the blade. Looks like the meeting was being cut short.
locale_flavor: 他慢慢地启开盖子，短刀在暗光下闪闪发亮。主管示意了一下刀刃。看来这次会面就此结束了。

oracle_flavor: "It can make a real fine roller coaster, provided you're properly stimmed up." -Noise
locale_flavor: “它可以变成一个很棒的过山车，假如你药嗑得正合适。” —噪音

oracle_flavor: Geostrategic Research and Neothermal Development Laboratories
locale_flavor: 地理战略研究及新热能研发实验所

oracle_flavor: "I did warn you that leaks would have to be patched."
locale_flavor: “我警告过你了，这个漏洞会打补丁。”

oracle_flavor: GRNDL refineries process many different rare elements unearthed during the fracking process.
locale_flavor: 地新研发所冶炼厂处理着在液压流程中开采出的各种稀有元素。

oracle_flavor: The Destroyer.
locale_flavor: 毁灭者。

oracle_flavor: "They don't want to listen, so we'll just have to crank up the volume."
locale_flavor: “他们听不进去，所以我们只好调高音量。”

oracle_flavor: "When the enemy has mastered the battlefield, change the battlefield." -The Playbook
locale_flavor: “如果敌方把控了战场，改变战场。” —《战术手册》

oracle_flavor: "Practical effects are expensive, but worth it. I had to smash seventeen stunt bioroids to get this shot." -Parvati Kapoor, director
locale_flavor: “现场特效可贵了，但很值得。就为这一个画面，我得弄碎十七个特技生化人。” —导演帕瓦蒂·卡普尔

oracle_flavor: They eat us, we eat them, the cycle goes on and on. -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
locale_flavor: 它们吃我们，我们吃它们，这循环永不停息。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

oracle_flavor: We Know What You Want.
locale_flavor: 我们知道你想要什么。

oracle_flavor: The costumes aren't strictly necessary, but they improve the performances of the vactors and sensie stars.
locale_flavor: 那些戏服并不是绝对必要的，但它们能提升虚拟演员与复感影星的表现。

oracle_flavor: The entertainment capital of Mumbad.
locale_flavor: 孟巴德的娱乐之都。

oracle_flavor: "A new administration means we have to start greasing the wheels all over again. Let's get to work."
locale_flavor: “政府班子的更替意味着我们要重新疏通关系了。开始干活吧。”

oracle_flavor: Judicious use of freelancers can increase efficiency and protect the company from legal repercussions. It's what they call a "win-win".
locale_flavor: 合理地利用自由职业者可以提高效率并为公司免除法律后果。这就是他们所谓的“共赢”。

oracle_flavor: Survival of the fittest' is so outdated; in finance it's 'survival of the fattest.' -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
locale_flavor: “适者生存”太过时了；在金融界，“大者生存”。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

oracle_flavor: Created by merging the brainscans of over a hundred of the most intelligent people in Haas-Bioroid's cerebral database, its effectiveness is limited either by its lack of imagination or the imagination of the sysops who employ it.
locale_flavor: 创生于哈斯生化脑数据库里数以百计最智慧人类的脑扫描图之融合，它的威力只受限于自身想象力不足，或者是使用它的管理员的想象力不足。

oracle_flavor: Eliza's Toybox is the preeminent purveyor of high-class debauchery on the moon, courtesy of its bioroid pleasure models and other exotica. Every fantasy has its price.
locale_flavor: 伊莱莎的寻欢所是月球上顶级酒色的主要提供商，这归功于它的寻欢生化人模型和其他新奇的玩意。美梦皆有价位。

oracle_flavor: There are those who believe the nine-tailed fox is an angel in disguise. And then there are those who have followed, and discovered her secret...
locale_flavor: 有人相信九尾狐是天使的化身。于是有人随之而去，发现了她的秘密…

oracle_flavor: The port was first built as a remote location to unload and offload dangerous felons.
locale_flavor: 该港最初的建造目的，是作为一个倾卸危险重罪犯的边远地区。

oracle_flavor: "There are reports of a terrorist threat at Starport Kaguya. The NAPD is offering a reward for anyone who can provide them with information about the current whereabouts of the individual pictured here. He is considered extremely dangerous and is armed with a PAD and a portable rig."
locale_flavor: 有报道称星际港辉夜存在恐怖分子威胁。任何提供图中人士目前下落信息者，新洛杉矶警察局将给予奖赏。该嫌疑犯被认为是极度危险的，现持有一台掌上面板和便携式设备。

oracle_flavor: Mars would never have been colonized if not for the Gagarin facilities at Promontorium Agarum.
locale_flavor: 要是没有位于阿格鲁姆海角的加加林设施，火星就永远不会被殖民。

oracle_flavor: The irony is that those who'd want to destroy certain memories can't afford to do so, and those who can afford it-well, they're too busy sipping on dreamwine.
locale_flavor: 讽刺地说，那些想要消除某种记忆的人们付不起费用，而那些付得起的—好吧，他们忙于啜饮梦醑。

oracle_flavor: He who wields the sword of valor.
locale_flavor: 他即挥舞英勇利剑之士。

oracle_flavor: "Why should we be slaves to our genetic heritage?"
locale_flavor: “我们为何要做自己基因遗传的奴隶？”

oracle_flavor: Bad luck for any sysop blind enough to cross its path.
locale_flavor: 所有过于轻率以致碰见它的管理员都倒大霉了。
