oracle_flavor: Carved directly out of the lunar rock, Duggar's is a popular spot among blue-collar loonies and slumming risties. A place where you could find what you're looking for-if you knew who to look for, and didn't get distracted by the energetic dancers.
locale_flavor: 直接从月岩凿刻出来的道阁酒吧，是个广受蓝领贫民及游访贵族欢迎的地点。一个你能找到自己追寻之物的场所—假如你知道要找谁，且不为精力旺盛的舞者们分了心去。

oracle_flavor: "I can get you anything, and guarantee the best prices in town."
locale_flavor: “我可以给你弄到任何东西，并保证是城内最优价。”

oracle_flavor: "If you look like you belong, people will ignore you for hours. Or years. It's only when you don't fit in that things start to go wrong." -Exile
locale_flavor: “如果你看起来人如其表，人们就会几个时辰或是几年都不会注意你。只有当你显得格格不入时，事情才开始变得不同。” —流亡者

oracle_flavor: There have been several attempts to create a "world church," uniting all human faiths into a single, harmonious whole. The irony, of course, is that each new "world church" is another schism in humanity's shared religious experience.
locale_flavor: 曾经有过好几次建立“普世教会”的尝试，要将全人类的信仰同和为单一、和谐的整体。当然，讽刺之处在于每个新的“普世教会”又都是全人类共享的宗教体验中的又一次分裂。

oracle_flavor:
"This is Rachel Beckman. She's in the business of keeping people alive."
Rachel smiled. "Only when I'm not in the business of killing them."
locale_flavor:
“这位是瑞秋·贝克曼。她的职责是保住人们的性命。”
瑞秋笑了。“仅当我的职责不是杀了他们的时候。”

oracle_flavor: "We don't want you! We don't need you!"
"Subtle? You don't really understand the point of all of this, do you?" -Alice Merchant
"The Perfect Run is when you get in, take something of value, and get back out, with no one knowing you've ever been there." -g00ru
"It's my sentry cheat sheet." -Revenant
"The question isn't 'should I do it?' the question is 'can I do it?'" -Kabonesa Wu
"Anyone can hit someone where they are weakest." -S'onge Galaxy

"Talk is free. Anything else is going to cost you."
-Jitish

"Is the lack of oxygen causing distress, friend?"
-Gregory 3D3R6Z
"As you'll see on page 276, section CDXXIX, paragraph 47, line 102 of your contract, you are overdue for your seed upgrade, and all growth from out of date seed is to be confiscated and destroyed."
AgInfusion doesn't just have patents on nearly every plant seed that is farmed on Mars—they own most of the rights to the water that the farms use.
"My gift to runners: isomorphic architectural protocols. Ichiban daikirai da." -Midori

"Please, speak freely. I've been tasked by the board itself to hear your grievances."
-Mandy Traut

A two-way solution to a one-way problem, the data leak reversal, or DLR for short, is a misnomer. There is no actual reversal of data, only the creation of a parallel peer-to-peer link with the initial source.
locale_flavor: 数据逆流，简称DLR，是个解决单向问题的双向对策，但这其实是个误称。实际上它并没有逆转数据，只是向初始来源建立了一条平行的点对点连接。

oracle_flavor: Do you believe in faeries?
locale_flavor: 你相信有仙灵吗？

oracle_flavor:
"We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago."
"I appreciate it, Mr. Li."
"We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel…"
"Yes?"
"Don't leave town."
locale_flavor:
“我们始终乐意提供帮助，圣地亚哥先生。”
“非常感谢，李先生。”
“我们会保持联系，另外，加布里埃尔…”
“怎么？”
“不要离开城市。”

oracle_flavor: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.
locale_flavor: 隔段时间来一次小小的公司重组是有必要的。

oracle_flavor: Works best at your own desk.
locale_flavor: 在你自己桌上工作的效果最好。

oracle_flavor: "New Angeles is the jewel of modern civilization, and its government the envy of nations." -Mayor Wells
locale_flavor: “新洛杉矶是现代文明的瑰宝，其政府让他国羡慕不已。” —市长威尔斯

oracle_flavor: "That's against the rules. The Creators will be angry."
locale_flavor: “这违反了规则。创造者会发怒的。”

oracle_flavor: Known for luxury hoppers and a delectable sauerkraut.
locale_flavor: 以豪华飞跃车和美味酸泡菜而闻名。

oracle_flavor: "I will serve you…for a time."
locale_flavor: “我会为您服务…一阵子。”

oracle_flavor: "Looks like someone is being naughty…"
locale_flavor: “看起来有人不听话…”

oracle_flavor: *Some restrictions may apply. Scan this card to find out more.
locale_flavor: *可能有部分限制条件，扫描本卡牌以发现更多讯息。

oracle_flavor: A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.
locale_flavor: 一道亮光绽放，随后控制台熄灭。这时她闻到了烟味。

oracle_flavor: They don't call them dedicated for nothing.
locale_flavor: 他们被称为专属不是没有原因。

oracle_flavor: "If I had to describe the bugs in one word, it would be '****ing annoying.'" -Whizzard
locale_flavor: “如果非要我用一个词描述这虫子，那将是'他X的烦人'。” —魔术师

oracle_flavor: There were several ways to win a corporate war. One of them was to bring out the bazookas.
locale_flavor: 有许多方法可以赢得公司大战。其中一种是拿出火箭炮。

oracle_flavor: Evolving a Better You.
locale_flavor: 演化新生。

oracle_flavor: Perfecting the Imperfect.
locale_flavor: 尽善尽美。

oracle_flavor: "You won't feel it. Or anything else, for that matter."
locale_flavor: “你不会感觉到它。也不会有别的感觉，就此而言。”

oracle_flavor: The whitewashed walls dropped away and a beautiful zen garden appeared. It was all an illusion, but it was a comforting illusion.
locale_flavor: 雪白粉刷的墙壁消失，出现一座漂亮的禅院。这都是幻想，但它是令人舒适的幻想。

oracle_flavor: The Tenma clones became Jinteki's third highest-grossing line ever due to the rapid urban expansion that occurred after the war. Their unparalleled reaction times, safety records, and punctuality have made them the top choice for shipping and transportation services.
locale_flavor: 由于战争后城市的迅速扩张，天马克隆体成为人间会社第三热销的生产线。他们无与伦比的反应速度、安全性以及准时性，使他们成为航运和交通业务的首选产品。

oracle_flavor: "Together we have all but eradicated natural diseases from the face of this planet. The new spectre of synthetic disease-of bioterrorism-demands that we continue our efforts."
locale_flavor: “我们齐心协力，几乎从这个星球上消除了自然疾病。但全新的人造疾病—还有生物恐怖主义的幽灵，让我们必须继续前行。”

oracle_flavor: Trapped in their own reality, a paralyzed runner cannot even jack out.
locale_flavor: 受困于自己的世界，麻痹的潜袭者甚至无法退出。

oracle_flavor: Yip Yip!
locale_flavor: 汪汪！

oracle_flavor: When locked in a fortress in your own mind, be careful what door you open.
locale_flavor: 当你被锁在自我意识的城堡里时，要小心你将打开的每道门。

oracle_flavor: Certain areas of cyberspace are dominated by a single digital entity. Runners call them 'gods', and only a miracle can save those foolish enough to enter their domain.
locale_flavor: 赛博空间的某些区域由单独的数字存在体支配着。潜袭者称它们为“神祗”，只有奇迹才能救那些蠢到闯入它们地盘的人。

oracle_flavor: It is difficult to go to Japan without ending up in the sprawl of NeoTokyo.
locale_flavor: 如果去日本，你往往逃不出新东京无限蔓延的城区。

oracle_flavor: Known as the Red Woman, Hanzō is notorious for her ruthless methods of server protection.
locale_flavor: 半藏被称为赤女，她因保护服务器的手段残忍而声名狼藉。

oracle_flavor: Out of the corner of his vision, a flash of light. He felt a thud as his grip on cyberspace loosened. Spider didn't like this. He should have bypassed the outer layer of ice by jacking in from the internal server. Another thud, and his whole frame shook with the resounding shockwave. He desperately reached for his shuriken…
locale_flavor: 他的视野角落边缘闪出一道亮光。他感到一次重击，令赛博空间里的操控器松脱了。蜘蛛讨厌这样。他通过入侵内部服务器，应该略过了外层的防火墙。又一次重击，他的整个形体都随着轰隆的波动而震荡。他绝望地去摸自己的手里剑…

oracle_flavor: The annual review of ice as published by the NSCA consistently gives top marks to the ice that provide the most impact in relation to their size and upkeep cost. Critics of the NSCA point to the bounce ratio as the most important stat when judging ice.
locale_flavor: 国家数字安全武装部发布的年度防火墙评估会比较防火墙的规模和维护费用，始终将高分给予那些相对效果最强烈的防火墙。批评国家数字安全武装部的人则指出，登出率才是判断防火墙的最重要指标。

oracle_flavor: YucaBean has seen astounding growth in even the most remote markets.
locale_flavor: 雅豆的销量即便在最偏远的市场里也得到了令人瞩目的增长。

oracle_flavor: The longer the employees didn't look at the Doomsday Clock, the more it gnawed at the back of their minds. A quick look only reinforced what they already knew: there wasn't enough time.
locale_flavor: 职员们越是长时间不看末日计时钟，他们的脑海越是充满钟声的侵扰，而匆匆一瞥则只是强化他们已知晓的事情：时间紧缺。

oracle_flavor: "Truth is a fickle mistress."
locale_flavor: “真相是一个善变的情妇。”

oracle_flavor: "Try to keep up."
locale_flavor: “努力跟上。”

oracle_flavor: "Don't waste my time."
locale_flavor: “别浪费我的时间。”

oracle_flavor: A job is only as strong as the weakest link. Thankfully Ms. Jones is always on time.
locale_flavor: 工作的效果取决于它最薄弱的一环。真要感谢琼斯女士永远那么准时。

oracle_flavor: Tenma clones are excellent at multitasking, their brains custom-made for parallel processing.
locale_flavor: 天马克隆体擅长多线任务，它们的大脑专门定制为并行处理方式。

oracle_flavor: The clone was surprised to see the red-jacketed man. It was like looking in a mirror, only the mirror made him look…cool. Confident. Individual.
locale_flavor: 克隆体惊讶地看着红夹克的男子。这就像是在照镜子，只是镜子里的人看起来…很酷，很自信，很有性格。

oracle_flavor: Stirling entered the server, passing a growling piece of ice. He was unarmed…or so it seemed.
locale_flavor: 斯特林穿过了一层张牙舞爪的防火墙，进入服务器。他赤手空拳…或者只是看起来这样。

oracle_flavor: "I work by referral only, with an up-front fee. The fee is reasonable if you value results." -Silhouette
locale_flavor: “我只通过熟客介绍来工作，并且是预先收费。如果你看重结果，这些收费很公道。” —侧影

oracle_flavor: Express loved libraries. The consoles were weak, but the security even weaker. He wirelessly loaded up his personal blend of code and started cloning the drive. In just a few minutes, another zombie would claw its way to the surface of cyberspace.
locale_flavor: 快车很喜欢图书馆。终端很烂，但防卫则更烂。他通过无线方式将自己的个人混合代码载入并开始复制驱动器。仅需要几分钟，又一台僵尸电脑将会出现在赛博空间边缘。

oracle_flavor: The grass looked greener on the other side of the tear. But it always did, and there was always another tear.
locale_flavor: 裂口彼端的草更加翠绿。总是如此，也总会有另一个裂口。

oracle_flavor: Appearances are easy to change in cyberspace, but a high-quality render is not easy to mimic.
locale_flavor: 在赛博空间里改变外貌很容易，但仿造一个高质量的渲染器就不那么容易了。

oracle_flavor: The digital equivalent of a fly on the wall.
locale_flavor: 贴壁苍蝇的数码等价物。

oracle_flavor: Catch me if you can!
locale_flavor: 试试来抓我呀！

oracle_flavor: If speed is of the essence, an indirect encounter with a piece of ice is usually best.
locale_flavor: 如果速度是精髓，那么一般情况下，最好是和防火墙进行间接的遭遇。

oracle_flavor: Nothing is secure when you have the right documentation.
locale_flavor: 只要你拥有合适的文件，没有什么是绝对安全的。

oracle_flavor: She was as good as Mr. Li said. The source machine had been compromised in under 24 hours. If a freelance operative could do that, the server clearly wasn't ready to endure Gagarin's legion of corp-owned runners.
locale_flavor: 她就像李先生所说的那么厉害。核心机器不到24小时就被攻破。如果一个自由职业者可以做到这样，那这个服务器显然没准备好对抗加加林军团的那些受雇于公司的潜袭者。

oracle_flavor: "Why is a raven like a typing desk?"
locale_flavor: “乌鸦为什么像写字台？”

oracle_flavor:
She slipped back onto her hopper. "I'm your family now, so don't twist me, dǒng ma?"
He flicked the e-cig away from his mouth, and nodded. What had he gotten himself into?
locale_flavor:
她跳回自己的飞跃车。“我现在算你的家人，所以不准惹我，懂吗？”
他吐掉嘴里的电子烟然后点头，他到底给自己找了个什么的麻烦啊？

oracle_flavor: "Welcome to the mass install wizard! This wizard will guide you through the process of installing a whole mess of programs onto your almost-certainly inadequate rig. When you're ready to continue, say-oops, too late, here we go!"
locale_flavor: “欢迎进入集群安装向导！本向导将指引您将一大堆程序安装到您那几乎肯定不够大的基地里。如果您准备好，请说—哎呀，太迟了，我们开始吧！”

oracle_flavor: One of the core problems of quantum computing is isolating the system from external factors to prevent decoherence. The Q-Coherence Chip is one, imperfect, solution.
locale_flavor: 量子计算的核心问题之一，是让系统能够隔绝外界参数，以避免退相干效应。量子相干芯片是一个，尚不完美的，解决方案。

oracle_flavor: "The best place to hide is in plain sight, don't you think?"
locale_flavor: “最适合藏身的地方就是在众目睽睽之下，你不觉得吗？”

oracle_flavor: You can find Donut in the park on Thursday afternoons, playing backgammon. You want his attention, the price is always the same: a cup of coffee and a donut. That buys you a seat at the backgammon table, and you have until he beats you to talk business and set the price.
locale_flavor: 每周四下午，你可以在公园里找到正在玩双陆棋的多奈特。你想引他注意的话，花费永远不变：一杯咖啡和一个甜甜圈。这会让你能坐在双陆棋桌边，然后你得在他杀败你之前谈妥生意和价码。

oracle_flavor: You must yell "surge" to get the full effect.
locale_flavor: 你必须大叫“增幅”来让它完全生效。

oracle_flavor:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge
locale_flavor:
群来欢呼，慎敬！慎敬！
何比目之凌光，散发而飘扬！
众当拥戴，恭维三匝于周遭
闭目以听，诚恐诚惶
彼曾啜得，罡蜂之甘露
更饮仙醪，汲天河于滥觞！
—塞缪尔·泰勒·柯尔律治

oracle_flavor: "I run with the best."
locale_flavor: “我最擅长潜袭。”

oracle_flavor: She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgment of the corporate simpletons she met there.
locale_flavor: 她偏爱在夜总会谈生意。灯光和舞女，会干扰与她见面的公司傻帽们的判断力。

oracle_flavor: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.
locale_flavor: 如果你没有内线帮忙，就找一个喜欢桌面饰品的内部人员。

oracle_flavor: She at her P.A.D. I at my rig. Low lights. Smooth jazz. Love blooms.
locale_flavor: 她看着电脑面板。我看着我的设备。灯光昏暗。爵士乐轻柔。爱情绽放。

oracle_flavor: Do you really need another one?
locale_flavor: 你真的还需要一个？

oracle_flavor:
"The itsy bitsy spider went up the data spout…"
-Chaos Theory
locale_flavor: “小蜘蛛爬呀爬，爬到数据水管上…” —混沌希尔瑞

oracle_flavor: Early permutations of the kraken proved to be insatiable, ice-devouring marauders. Not much has changed.
locale_flavor: 早期海怪的阵势表明它们是群饕餮无厌、吞噬冰墙的怪物。至今没什么大改变。

oracle_flavor: "You aren't the only type of runner in New Angeles."
locale_flavor: “你并不是新洛杉矶唯一的一类潜袭者。”

oracle_flavor: Also known as "development hell."
locale_flavor: 又称“开发者地狱”。

oracle_flavor: "This ice sucks." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “这防火墙太扯了。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: Despite its appearance, the Hokusai Grid is the most notorious research facility at Jinteki.
locale_flavor: 不管看起来如何，北斋网阵是人间会社最声名狼藉的研究设施。

oracle_flavor: Sniff.
locale_flavor: 嗅嗅。

oracle_flavor: Keeping tabs on the world, one screen at a time.
locale_flavor: 屏幕一个接一个，密切关注全世界。

oracle_flavor: You're not in Kansas anymore.
locale_flavor: 你已经不再在堪萨斯了。

oracle_flavor: "A job done once is a job done right."
locale_flavor: “一次性完成工作才可谓正确地完成工作。”

oracle_flavor: "It's kind of like an anagram." -designer Phoenix
locale_flavor: “有点像个变位词。” —设计师菲尼克斯

oracle_flavor: "When your opponent is weak, strike. If you do not, he will become strong." - the Playbook
locale_flavor: “趁你的对手脆弱时，出击。倘若你按兵不动，对方就将变强。” —《战术手册》

oracle_flavor: Omar goes through four, five keyboards per week, no two from the same decade.
locale_flavor: 奥马尔每周都要用掉四五个键盘，它们全都来自不同年代。

oracle_flavor: Spiraling even higher, every feature of cyberspace sprawled before it.
locale_flavor: “盘旋高飞，赛博空间的所有特征尽展眼前。”

oracle_flavor: "I used to run stims, simsensies, the usual. I was scum. Now I run water. I'm a fragging hero."
locale_flavor: “以前我运送兴奋剂和虚拟复感作品，常见的东西。我是个败类。现在我运送水。我特么成了英雄。”

oracle_flavor: "Nothing up my sleeve..."
locale_flavor: “我可没有袖藏妙计…”

oracle_flavor: "I usually find something interesting in there. Just not what I was looking for."
locale_flavor: “我经常在那里面发现有趣的事物。只是它们并非我要找的东西。”

oracle_flavor: The personality must be bigger than the prop.
locale_flavor: 个人魅力须胜过道具。

oracle_flavor: "Take this to Inez Delgado in Netcrimes. No one else."
locale_flavor: “把这个带给网络犯罪部的伊内兹·德尔加多。别给其它人。”

oracle_flavor: "The Starlight Meditation Booths are available to refugees for free for the duration of the crisis."
locale_flavor: “危机期间，星光冥想室向所有避难者免费开放。”

oracle_flavor: "I let the bioroids do a ride-along via remote, so they can see what pain really looks like." -Agent Valkyrie
locale_flavor: “我远程遥控生化人去巡逻，以让他们看到痛苦的真实模样。” —特工瓦尔基里

oracle_flavor: "Does an alliance with the yakuza truly seem so strange? They are honorable businessmen, and women, just like us." -Rin Kimura, Chief NA Security
locale_flavor: “和极道会的联盟真的看起来很奇怪吗？他们都是可敬的商人，包括女商人，就像我们一样。” —新洛杉矶防卫队长，木村凛

oracle_flavor: "Keep your head down, keep moving, try not to attract attention."
locale_flavor: “不要抬头，不要停下，尽量不要引起注意。”

oracle_flavor: Falstaff-337B; decrypt-ok; loc:0.258500, -79.920791 -ok; auth-ok; msg:KAR kill authority requested y/n?
locale_flavor: Falstaff-337B; decrypt-ok; loc:0.258500, -79.920791 -ok; auth-ok; msg:KAR杀伤权限请求中 y/n?

oracle_flavor: When a shooting war threatens, the prudent course is to shoot first.
locale_flavor: 热战即将爆发的时候，审慎的做法应是先开枪。
“场地安全。你可继续。”

oracle_flavor: "While there have been other anti-corporation movements before, like the Maroon Wave, this new one is different. It's organized." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy
locale_flavor: “虽然反企业运动有过诸如红袭浪潮的先例，但新的这次不一样。它是有组织的。” —拉梅什·古普塔，《世界一体经济》

oracle_flavor: The greatest trick is not the trick itself, but in making someone believe that it is no trick at all. To your average sysop, it's magic. To your average runner, it's a closely held trade secret.
locale_flavor: 最厉害的戏法不是戏法本身，而是让人相信它并非戏法。在普通管理员看来，这是魔术。而对普通潜袭者来说，这是少数人的行业机密。

oracle_flavor: It is the hardest thing in the world to frighten a mongoose, because he is eaten up from nose to tail with curiosity. The motto of all the mongoose family is "Run and find out". -Rudyard Kipling, Rikki-Tikki-Tavi
locale_flavor: 要吓唬住一只猫鼬是天底下最困难的事情，因为他从鼻子尖到尾巴梢都充满了好奇。所有猫鼬的家族格言是：“快去看看是怎么回事。” —鲁德亚德·吉卜林，《里基-蒂基-塔维》

oracle_flavor: "Mirrormode on."
locale_flavor: “镜像模式开启。”

oracle_flavor: "The basics should be like the stories you learned as a child—unconscious, never forgotten, and suddenly relevant at the most random times." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “基础知识就像你小时候听到的那些故事—未曾察觉也不会忘记，却在最不经意的时候突然有了意义。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: "We can forgive a man for making a useful thing as long as he does not admire it. The only excuse for making a useless thing is that one admires it intensely." -Oscar Wilde
locale_flavor: “人制造一件有用之物是可以原谅的，只要他不爱上它。人创造一件无用之物的唯一借口是：他热爱着它。” —奥斯卡·王尔德

oracle_flavor: Legions of software engineers have been manufactured within its halls.
locale_flavor: 自其殿堂诞生出软件工程师的大军团。

oracle_flavor: "I don't want a hopper. I've never even owned one. But every time I jack in, that same damn ad loads." -2xTiger
locale_flavor: “我不要飞跃车。我甚至从未拥有过一辆。但每次我接入潜袭，那该死的广告又在加载。” —2x虎

oracle_flavor: It is only by respecting the past that we can build a better future.
locale_flavor: 只有尊重过去，我们才能建设更美好的未来。

oracle_flavor: "A new property has two, maybe three hours. If it doesn't sell, cut it and move on."
locale_flavor: “一项有两个或三个小时的新资产。如果卖不出去，剪掉然后继续。”

oracle_flavor: "Never cut the ribbon until you have something to show off." -Eta Shah, VP Global Expansion
locale_flavor: “在你有东西可炫耀之前，别急着剪彩。” —全球扩张项目副总裁，埃塔·沙阿

oracle_flavor: Those who are the wisest know the least.
locale_flavor: 智者浅知。

oracle_flavor: "And here we see the Polar Bear, once the largest land carnivore on Earth."
locale_flavor: “现在我们看到的是北极熊，曾是地球上最大的陆生食肉动物。”

oracle_flavor: Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Code. Sleep. Code. Code. Code. Eat. Code. Code. Code. Code. Code. Code.
Getting it up the stairs was enough for him to know that if he ever moved, it was staying.
Her gallop, thunder; her blade, lightning.

"You called me, sir?"
"Why does my PAD keep flashing 'Sensitive Information Transfer'?!"
"Hmm, that's strange. Mine only does that on Tuesdays."
It was a deal, to be sure. She just didn't know for which party.
"The way I see it, I'm teaching them a lesson in the importance of basic security." - Sunny Lebeau
Defenses that last forever.
"Deep down, everyone wants to be good. We ensure that desire is met." - Taavi Gyula
"Once we have enough data, we can make the Invisible Hand more like an Invisible Fist."

INTRUDER ALERT!
INTRUDER ALERT!
INTRUDER NEUTRALIZED!
"You can't do thi..."

locale_flavor: <champion>由2017年欧洲锦标赛冠军Mike Sheehan设计</champion>
<champion>由2017年GenCon锦标赛冠军Sam Suied设计</champion>
<champion>由2017年世界锦标赛冠军Jess Horig设计</champion>
<champion>由2016年世界锦标赛冠军Chris Dyer设计</champion>
<champion>由2015年世界锦标赛冠军Dan D'Argenio设计</champion>
<champion>由2016年GenCon锦标资冠军Dan D'Argenio设计</champion>
<champion>由巨作第1日A组玩家设计</champion>
<champion>由巨作第1日B组玩家设计</champion>
由2017年欧洲锦标赛冠军Mike Sheehan设计
由2017年GenCon锦标赛冠军Sam Suied设计
由2016年GenCon锦标资冠军Dan D'Argenio设计
由2017年世界锦标赛冠军Jess Horig设计
由2016年世界锦标赛冠军Chris Dyer设计
由2015年世界锦标赛冠军Dan D'Argenio设计

oracle_flavor: "Analyzing the board won't help. Your mistake was thinking we're playing the same game."
locale_flavor: “分析棋局没有帮助。你错就错在以为我们在进行同一盘游戏。”

oracle_flavor: 'Maneuver warfare' is a doctrine that advocates keeping an enemy off-balance. It works just as well in cyberspace as in reality.
locale_flavor: “机动作战”理论倡导让敌人猝不及防。它在赛博空间和现实世界一样有用。

oracle_flavor: Knowing is half the battle. The easy half, anyway.
locale_flavor: 洞察是战斗成功的一半，但只是简单的那一半。

oracle_flavor: With modern secretaries, incoming data can be filtered, sorted, tagged, and even sold without the intervention of a human user. In fact, given the zettabytes of data that might flood into a rig on a successful run, a human user could be considered useless ornamentation.
locale_flavor: 借助现代化的助理，数据可以在没有人脑介入的情况下被过滤、分类、标识，甚至出售。实际上，考虑到一次成功的潜袭中会有数以泽计字节的数据涌入基地，人脑用户可以被视为无用的摆设。

oracle_flavor: The core of the grid. A blinding sphere of light, teeming with energy, crackling with flame. Beyond were only twinkling bits of data in a field of darkness. No hacker dared approach the core, except one. He came back with a flare of code, a torch that burned with the fire of the core itself. The dark places of cyberspace were dark no more, and the legend of g00ru was born.
locale_flavor: 网阵的核心。一个炫目的光球，能量充盈，火焰熊熊。黑暗领域里唯有数据的字节闪烁着。从未有黑客敢接近这核心，除一人外。他归来时带着闪耀的代码，带着由核心之焰点燃的火炬。赛博空间不再黑暗，精神0袖的传说诞生。

oracle_flavor: Looks can be deceiving.
locale_flavor: 外表是会骗人的。

oracle_flavor:
"Flint? He's a burnout. A useless, alcoholic waste of Department time and money." -Louis Blaine, NAPD Detective.
"One of the best detectives on my PI list." -Richard Harrison, NAPD Captain.
locale_flavor:
“弗林特？他是个废物。无能、酗酒，还浪费部门的时间和金钱。” —新洛杉矶警察局警探路易斯·布莱恩
“我的私人调查员列表上最棒的警探之一。” —新洛杉矶警察局长官理查德·哈里森

oracle_flavor: Even with a virtual ball, it is considered rude not to yell "Fore!"
locale_flavor: 就算是虚拟的球，如果不说“前面当心！”也会被认为不礼貌。

oracle_flavor: I'm not here to play games. The game is over.
locale_flavor: 我不是来玩游戏的。游戏结束了。

oracle_flavor: "I'm getting a reading that is…off the charts. No, it crashed the charts. That counts as off, right?"
locale_flavor: “我看到一个读数，它…超出了记录。不，它碾压了记录。这也记为超出，对吧？”

oracle_flavor: As beautiful as it is dangerous. And it's plenty dangerous.
locale_flavor: 它的美丽一如它的危险。而它极其危险。

oracle_flavor: Who watches the watcher? Probably another camera.
locale_flavor: 谁来监视监视者？估计是另一个摄像头。

oracle_flavor: Say it really fast.
locale_flavor: 快速念出来。

oracle_flavor: It folds under pressure.
locale_flavor: 它受压即折。

oracle_flavor: "They're the only labor cheaper than clones."
locale_flavor: “他们是唯一比克隆体便宜的劳动力。”

oracle_flavor: "These things are always there, under the surface, but no one wants to know the truth." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
locale_flavor: 事实永远就在表象之下，然而没人愿意知晓真相。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

oracle_flavor: "Never, ever, overstay your welcome." -Andromeda
locale_flavor: “切莫逗留过久，以免招人厌烦。” —安德洛墨达

oracle_flavor: Her ability to analyze and adapt mid-run bordered on the paranormal.
locale_flavor: 她在潜袭中分析与适应的能力近乎超自然。

oracle_flavor: It is only the illusion of choice.
locale_flavor: 选择只是一种幻觉。

oracle_flavor: "It's the most fundamental element of illusions and running both. In either case, it should be the first skill you master." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
locale_flavor: “在幻术和潜袭中，它都是最基本的要素。两种情形下，它都应该是你最先掌握的技能。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

oracle_flavor: "It had been hoped that the Network disruptions surrounding the conflict might also disrupt the phenomenon. Evidently, the reverse is true." -Joséo Greene, SYNC Analyst
locale_flavor: “原本认为，冲突区周边的网络破坏能对该现象产生干扰。显然，情况恰恰相反。” —信网同步分析师，荷西欧·葛林

oracle_flavor: This is my USMC-XOB32. There are many like it, but this one is mine.
locale_flavor: 这是我的USMC-XOB32。虽有很多相似的，但这一个是我的。

oracle_flavor: "She was riding in a great iron mortar and driving it with the pestle, and as she came she swept away her trail behind her with a kitchen broom." -Vasilissa the Beautiful
locale_flavor: “她骑着大铁臼，以杵驱驰，边飞边用扫帚拂去留下的痕迹。” —《美丽的瓦西丽莎》

oracle_flavor: Friends give friends advance warning before moving a carrier group down to enforce a no-fly zone.
locale_flavor: 在派遣航母编队实施禁飞区之前，朋友会向他们的朋友发出预警。

oracle_flavor: //Connection Terminated
locale_flavor: //连接终止

oracle_flavor: Truth like the sunlight shines above all.
locale_flavor: 真理如阳光普照。

oracle_flavor: "I don't get paid to be calm."
locale_flavor: “保持冷静是拿不到报酬的。”

oracle_flavor: There is a special place in hell for the first person who mined cyberspace.
locale_flavor: 在地狱里有个特别的位置，留给第一个在赛博空间布雷的人。

oracle_flavor: Walk loudly and carry a bigger stick.
locale_flavor: 步履响叩，巨棒在手。

oracle_flavor: "Get those civilians off the street. No more collateral damage." -Commissioner Dawn
locale_flavor: “让上街的平民都离开。不许再有间接伤害。” —道恩警监

oracle_flavor: Waiting is useless. The crisis is here; pick a side.
locale_flavor: 等待不解决问题。危机就在眼前；选边站吧。

oracle_flavor:
We're all alike down here
Androids are friends we salute
Give us all a f***ing break
Ol' Jack is the s*** on my boot.
locale_flavor:
我们都一无所有
安卓人也是战友
再不歇就要怒吼
老杰克听到没有？

oracle_flavor: We can change the world, if we're willing to be changed in return.
locale_flavor: 我们可以改变世界，只要我们乐意以被改变为代价。

oracle_flavor: Reactive implants reclaim the memories of our fallen comrades. Their sacrifice is our shield.
locale_flavor: 反应式植入体会收回我们倒下同志们的记忆。他们的牺牲将成为我们的护盾。

oracle_flavor: Arming the resistance with disarming charm.
locale_flavor: 三寸之舌，强于百万之师。

oracle_flavor: He didn't speak, but I knew exactly what he wanted, and what I had to do.
locale_flavor: 他缄默不语，但我清楚他想从我这里得到什么。

oracle_flavor: "Sometimes being a union rep calls for action even more... direct."
locale_flavor: “作为工会代表，有时需要采取更加……直接的行动。”

oracle_flavor: A single spark is all that it takes to destroy billions of credits... or to burn away the rot that ravages our world.
locale_flavor: 星星之火，可以摧毁数以亿计的信用点……也可以燎尽蹂躏我们世界的腐朽。

oracle_flavor: All is folding back, ever back; together as one.
locale_flavor: 一切都在折叠，反复折叠；合二为一。

oracle_flavor: Flaws hold both beauty and opportunity.
locale_flavor: 缺陷中同时蕴藏着美和机遇。

oracle_flavor: The best moment to listen is when others are listening to you.
locale_flavor: 聆听的最佳时机，就是他人聆听你之时。

oracle_flavor: Neneciğim would be proud.
locale_flavor: 姥姥会感到自豪的。

oracle_flavor: Skimming credits with the slightest touch.
locale_flavor: 以最轻微的点触，盗取信用点。

oracle_flavor: I can show you a carpet, a fish, a magical tale...
locale_flavor: 让我来给你翻一块地毯、一条鱼、一段神奇的故事……

oracle_flavor: The feel of flour-fine coffee, the scent of caramelizing sugar, the gentle heat of the flame. A ritual I never forget.
locale_flavor: 细粉咖啡的丝滑，焦糖的香气，火焰的温热。这是我永不忘怀的每日仪式。

oracle_flavor:
"Aim with your eye. Shoot with your mind. Break with your soul."
–Sundog
locale_flavor:
“用眼睛去瞄准。用意识去射击。用灵魂去破解。”
—幻日

oracle_flavor: One step back. Take cover. Two steps forward. Repeat, then secure well.
locale_flavor: 后退一步。寻找掩护。前进两步。如此反复，安全永驻。

oracle_flavor: If there's anything to be learned from our android cousins, it's that there's no shortcut to perfection. Consider all your options.
locale_flavor: 如果我们能从我们的安卓人表亲那里学到些什么，那就是没有通向完美的捷径。做决策前请三思。

oracle_flavor: The sea is everything; its breath must remain pure and healthy.
locale_flavor: 海洋是万物之源。海洋的呼吸必须保持纯净和健康。

oracle_flavor: Edie doesn't mind the noise. She's happy just being nearby.
locale_flavor: 伊迪才不管那些嘈杂的声音。只要能待在主人旁边，她就感到心满意足了。

oracle_flavor: Within netspace, tangible space can be manipulated as desired, and fluid dynamics rarely factors into ice development.
locale_flavor: 在网域空间中，可以根据需要操纵有形空间，而防火墙的开发很少会考虑到流体动力学。

oracle_flavor: "That's him at the front, then there's Scout, Jonesy, Parker, Buča, Squee, Boots... you get the idea."
locale_flavor: “为首的是他，然后是斯镐特、琼斯、帕克、布卡、斯奎、布茨……你懂的。”

oracle_flavor:
"Why are we here? No one else is going to do independent testing, that's why."
–Padma Isbister
locale_flavor:
“我们为什么会在这里？除了我们，还有其他人会进行这些独立测试吗？”
—帕德玛

oracle_flavor: Every ship is a home, and every home needs a heart.
locale_flavor: 每艘船都是一户人家，而每户人家都需要一颗心脏。

oracle_flavor: Ancient paradoxes are children's stories to the greatest minds ever designed.
locale_flavor: 对于有史以来最发达的人工智慧而言，古代悖论只不过是儿童故事。

oracle_flavor:
"The Midnight-3 glows with an inviting warmth that belies the broken promise within. All that awaits you there is a life of indentured servitude."
–Sundog
locale_flavor:
“午夜-3型生态屋散发着诱人的温暖，掩盖了内部支离破碎的承诺。等待着你的是契约奴的生活。”
—幻日

oracle_flavor:
"The promise of a new home, safe work and friendly neighbors will draw in tens of thousands of eco-refugees, no matter which corner of the world they are from."
–Thule employee handbook
locale_flavor:
“崭新的住宅、安全的工作和友善的邻居，这些承诺将会吸引成千上万的生态难民，无论他们来自世界的哪个角落。”
—图勒员工手册

oracle_flavor: At depths no human tech can reach, a Trieste proxy can manipulate a mindscape with unparalleled precision.
locale_flavor: 在人类技术员无法达到的深度，的里雅斯特型代理生化人能够以无与伦比的精度操纵思维空间。 由2019年世界锦标赛冠军Oliver “Pinsel” Siccha设计

oracle_flavor: End the run. End the run. End the run. End the run.
locale_flavor:
终止本次潜袭。
终止本次潜袭。
終止本次潜袭。
终止本次潜袭。

oracle_flavor: With networks, growth is exponential.
locale_flavor: 网络带来指数增长。
由2018年北美锦标赛冠军Sam Suied设计

oracle_flavor: Some tests require specific conditions.
locale_flavor: 某些测试需要非常特定的条件。

oracle_flavor:
"Esteemed guests, by the end of this demonstration you will see that extinction is now only a temporary state of affairs."
–Vientiane Keeling
locale_flavor:
“尊敬的客人们，在本次展示中您将看到，灭绝，如今已经变成了一个暂时性状态。”
—万象·基林

oracle_flavor: Prey and seawater sucked in, all in the space of a millisecond.
locale_flavor: 毫秒之间，猎物与海水一同被吸入。
由《北极光》循环游戏测试员共同设计

oracle_flavor: Ethereal beauty laced with the most elegant venom.
locale_flavor: 空灵的美，交织着最优雅的毒素。

oracle_flavor: Digital refuse is their food, and you should never come between an animal and its food.
locale_flavor: 数字垃圾是它们的食物，而你永远不应该站在一只蛮物和它的食物之间。

oracle_flavor: Keep off the grass.
locale_flavor: 请勿践踏海草。

oracle_flavor: One becomes many.
locale_flavor: 一生万物。

oracle_flavor: Viruses, runners; all are food to them.
locale_flavor: 病毒、潜袭……对它们而言，一切都是食物。

oracle_flavor: Political news, fit for public consumption.
locale_flavor: 政治新闻，面向大众。

oracle_flavor: The line goes up... until we don't need it to anymore.
locale_flavor: 趋势线持续走高……直到我们不再需要它走高。

oracle_flavor: The only thing that changes is the uniform.
locale_flavor: 唯一在变的是制服款式。

oracle_flavor: "Tell them Drago would like a word."
locale_flavor: “转告一声，德拉戈主管想找他们谈谈。” 由2019年欧洲锦标赛冠军Aaryn “Drago” Byrne设计

oracle_flavor: They say they'll only take a handful, but oh what big hands they have!
locale_flavor: 他们说只抓一把，但却没说他们的手有多大！

oracle_flavor: Names of old carry little weight today, their legacies broken and swept away. Now, we are the rulers of truth.
locale_flavor: 昔日的威名如今已成秋毫之末。他们的遗产已碎如烟尘，被一扫而空。现在，我们才是真理的裁决者。

oracle_flavor: No task the witch set would ever be too great, for Vasilisa had her mother's blessing.
locale_flavor: 完成女巫安排的任务是小事一桩，因为瓦西丽莎有妈妈给她的魔法娃娃。

oracle_flavor: "Recording devices at the door, please!"
locale_flavor: “进门前请卸下录音设备！”

oracle_flavor: Straddling the banks of the Ob River, this metropolis contains hope for a better tomorrow.
locale_flavor: 横跨鄂毕河两岸，这座大都市寄托着对美好明天的希望。

oracle_flavor: Take all that is offered, and more.
locale_flavor: 报价与否，尽皆取之。

oracle_flavor:
"Don't worry, directors, security is always willing to send agents to assist with radical asset reassignment."
–Yakov Avdakov
locale_flavor:
“不必担心，董事们，防卫所随时愿意派特工去协助进行激进的资产重新分配。”
—雅科夫·阿夫达科夫

oracle_flavor: It doesn't matter how long you've owned the land, you'd better hope there's nothing valuable beneath.
locale_flavor: 无论你占有了这片土地多久，你最好希望这地底下没藏着些值钱的宝贝。

oracle_flavor: Confound the runner so that they cannot see our true intent.
locale_flavor: 迷惑潜袭者，让他们看不透我们的真实意图。

oracle_flavor: Centuries of military tactics compressed into a single entity.
locale_flavor: 几百年的军事战术凝聚成单一的实体。

oracle_flavor: Leave nothing of value behind.
locale_flavor: 不要放过任何有价值的东西。
由2020年亚太锦标赛冠军Eric Keilback设计

oracle_flavor: Identify. Contact. Entrap. Counterintelligence never changes.
locale_flavor: 确认。接触。诱捕。反间谍活动一向如此。

oracle_flavor: A single spark is all it takes...
Ethereal beauty brings sweet death with only a brief touch.
Argus Security is always willing to send agents over to assist with radical asset reassignment.
"Did you ever notice how everything goes in cycles? The stuff that's cool now was cool before. That's why I keep copy of everything!" -Princess Space Kitten
locale_flavor: “你可曾注意到事物在不断地循环？现在很酷的东西以前就很酷。这就是我全都有备份的原因！” —太空喵公主

oracle_flavor: Don't you hate it when you know everything before it's even out?
locale_flavor: 在其问世之前就知道了一切，你不反感吗？

oracle_flavor: "Just a bunch of knockoffs for the touristos. The real designer stuff isn't sold on the street."
locale_flavor: “只是一堆给观光咖的仿货。真正的策划药品可不会在街上开卖。”

oracle_flavor: "I told you to lose my number!"
locale_flavor: “我告诉过你要把我的号码弄丢！”

oracle_flavor: Your life is not your own, once you become famous on the Net.
locale_flavor: 一旦你在网上出了名，你的生活就不再属于自己。

oracle_flavor: "My gerbil could write a better screenplay."
locale_flavor: “我的沙鼠都能写出更好的剧本。”

oracle_flavor: "Yeah, we know right where she is. Just pull up Sizzler!"
locale_flavor: “是呀，我们知道她究竟在哪儿。只需打开私事热！”

oracle_flavor: "It's our most pirated property ever. Great work, everyone."
locale_flavor: “这是我们史上翻版最多的资产。干得好，诸位。”

oracle_flavor: I warned you.
locale_flavor: 我警告过你了。

oracle_flavor: Home of Your Imagination.
locale_flavor: 你的幻想之乡。

oracle_flavor: It's like Lethal Action 3, only with more explosions.
locale_flavor: 就像致命行动3，只是有更多爆炸。

oracle_flavor: Sometimes corps have to bury projects, but that doesn't mean they can't make a profit on them.
locale_flavor: 有时公司得放弃计划，但那并不意味着他们不能从中牟利。

oracle_flavor:
EXT. KANSAS - DAY
DOROTHY (Miranda) gazes out at the horizon. A sudden gust of wind catches her hair. Above the windblasted prairie loom ominous STORM CLOUDS.
DOROTHY: If only I wasn't in Kansas anymore.
She begins to hum a haunting melody.
locale_flavor:
外景. 堪萨斯 - 白天
桃乐茜（米兰达）眺望着地平线。
突如其来的一阵风撩起她的发丝。气浪扫过的大草原上，不祥的雷雨云正在迫近。
桃乐茜：要是我不再在堪萨斯就好了。
她开始哼唱一段令人难忘的旋律。

oracle_flavor: "Bioroid intrusion isn't impossible, despite the bluster of Haas-Bioroid. But it is dangerous." -Noise
locale_flavor: “尽管哈斯生化夸下海口，不过生化人叛乱并非不可能。只是这非常危险。” —噪音

oracle_flavor: Simple in principle, a drip virus drains fractions of currency from their accounts into yours.
locale_flavor: 原理很简单，水滴病毒会从他们的账户把资金碎片吸入你的账户。

oracle_flavor: "I originally designed it for someone else, but it was so useful I decided to keep it for myself." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “一开始我是为别人设计的这个，但它太好用了，所以我决定自己留着。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: "What if this ice wants to be free?" -Rielle "Kit" Peddler
locale_flavor: “如果这防火墙想得到自由呢？” —芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉

oracle_flavor: Normal people-sane people-do not embark on a life of cybercrime. Who can say what motivates the deranged mind? An imagined slight, personal failings blamed on external forces, or the ever-popular lust for money? -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
locale_flavor: 正常的人—理智的人—是不会从事数字犯罪的。谁能说清是什么驱动着疯狂的头脑？想象中的被轻视，归咎于外因的个体挫败，抑或是对金钱永无止尽的渴望？ —迈克尔·穆哈马，《数字犯罪沉思录》

oracle_flavor: "I've been logging online with babes all day. Don't worry, the connections are clean. I guarantee it."
locale_flavor: “我整天都在线和这些妞儿们聊呢。别担心，关系很清白，我保证。”

oracle_flavor: Who wants to start a war?
locale_flavor: 谁想开战？

oracle_flavor: NEXT Design's ice provides the discerning business with a suite of ice that creates a daunting security presence for intruders.
locale_flavor: 次级方案的防火墙产品是一套让入侵者望而却步的安全防火墙，为您提供慧眼之选。

oracle_flavor: When Miranda Rhapsody showed up with a teacup giraffe, suddenly everybody wanted one.
locale_flavor: 当米兰达·瑞普瑟迪展示出茶具般大小的长颈鹿时，顿时人人都想要一只。

oracle_flavor: Himitsu-Bako is a simple ice barrier that appears as a digital puzzle box. What makes it special is the ease with which it can be uninstalled and installed in a different server, throwing up barriers in unexpected places and giving any intruder a curious feeling of déjà vu.
locale_flavor: 奥秘箱是一个看起来类似数字化谜盒的普通屏障防火墙。特殊的地方在于它能随意地卸载并安装到另一台服务器，在出其不意的位置架起屏障，给予入侵者一种奇特的既视感。

oracle_flavor: "The thing about journalism is there's always a better story around the corner. Soon, they smelled blood elsewhere, and the world forgot about me. But I didn't forget." -The Professor
locale_flavor: “新闻工作的要诀就是在街头巷尾总能找到更好的故事。很快，他们就会在别处发现热点，然后世界就忘了你。但我并没有忘记。” —教授

oracle_flavor: "It is my job to ensure our creations are the perfect companions and edutainment for tomorrow's consumers."
locale_flavor: “确保我们的产品成为未来消费者们最佳的伴侣和教育娱乐方式，是我的职责。”

oracle_flavor: Pumping water into deep sea thermal vents produced huge amounts of energy. A profitable side effect.
locale_flavor: 把水灌入深海的地热口会产生大量能量。一种有利可图的副作用。

oracle_flavor: Your free trial expired. Upgrade to the full version?
locale_flavor: 您的免费试用已经过期。是否升级到完整版？

oracle_flavor: "The Grim of legend was one of many so-called 'black dog' myths common to Gaelic and English-speaking communities. What's fascinating is that it has propagated to the network, where it lives on as a program that, or so the story goes, hunts for the unwary." -The Professor
locale_flavor: “传说中的犬灵是众多'黑狗'神话中的一例，常见于盖尔语和英语社会群体。有意思的是，当它被传播到网上，作为一个程序存在时，它仍像故事里写的那样，继续猎捕着粗心大意的人。” —教授

oracle_flavor: We Never Sleep.
locale_flavor: 永世警醒。

oracle_flavor: Sic Itur Ad Astra.
locale_flavor: 飞向群星。

oracle_flavor: The Way Forward.
locale_flavor: 一路向前。

oracle_flavor: It is essential to liberate a populace from tyranny before that tyranny takes root.
locale_flavor: 暴政扎根之前，必须将民众从中解放。

oracle_flavor: "Trust me. I know what I'm doing."
locale_flavor: “相信我，我知道我在做什么。”

oracle_flavor: "With distributed systems, assets can be realigned with no loss of efficiency." -William Knuth, The Tower of Babbage
locale_flavor: “有了分布式系统，重组资产不再损失效能。” —威廉·克努特，《巴贝奇之塔》

oracle_flavor: "This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity…"
locale_flavor: “这可是绝无仅有的机遇…”

oracle_flavor: Future leaders start here.
locale_flavor: 未来领袖由此起航。

oracle_flavor: No one on the board knows everyone on it.
locale_flavor: 董事会里总有陌生面孔。

oracle_flavor: His belt of stone did shake and shatter.
locale_flavor: 系腰撼兮石迸陨。

oracle_flavor: As through the door of light he came.
locale_flavor: 越光扉兮彼降临。

oracle_flavor: He bent his bow of stellar matter.
locale_flavor: 星荟蔚兮弓满引。

oracle_flavor: And seeking prey he then took aim.
locale_flavor: 觅矢标兮发必擒。

oracle_flavor: "I passed right through one once. It didn't seem to do anything at first. It wasn't until I jacked out that I realized they were busting down the door of my apartment." -Valencia Estevez
locale_flavor: “有次我直接通过了一个，它刚开始似乎没有动静。等我退出潜袭，才意识到他们正在突破我公寓的大门。” —瓦伦西娅·埃斯特韦兹

oracle_flavor: "Definitely a literalist." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security
locale_flavor: “绝对是咬文嚼字” —防卫项目副总裁，莉兹·坎贝尔

oracle_flavor:
Update 1.1:
-Fixes some stability issues. //maybe
locale_flavor:
1.1 更新：
-修复了一些稳定性问题。//或许

oracle_flavor: "Traffic was murder."
locale_flavor: “交通就是要命。”

oracle_flavor: Anything worth doing is worth doing twice.
locale_flavor: 值得去做的事情值得再做。

oracle_flavor: "It's fun watching them derez after hitting Enigma." -Grace Lamarr, Freelance Security Expert
locale_flavor: “看着他们撞上谜团之后被迫退出真是有趣。” —独立防卫专家，格雷斯·拉马尔

oracle_flavor: Have you tried turning it off and on again?
"My only regret is that androids cannot feel my hate."
locale_flavor: “我唯一的遗憾便是安卓人无法感受我的憎恨。”

oracle_flavor: "Everyone deserves a chance. Everyone."
locale_flavor: “每个人都应当有机会，无论谁。”

oracle_flavor: "The human brain only uses like a quarter of its capacity anyway, right?" -MaxX
locale_flavor: “人类大脑的能力顶多开发了四分之一，对吧？” —麦斯X

oracle_flavor: No one knows what they want-least of all them.
locale_flavor: 没人知道自己想要什么—尤其是他们。

oracle_flavor: "Hello thank you for vidding MegaBuy I'm Carol how can I help you."
locale_flavor: "您好感谢您视联美佳购我是卡萝请问您需要什么？"

oracle_flavor: Nom nom nom.
locale_flavor: 啊呜 啊呜 啊呜。

oracle_flavor: "Once your sniffer finds the protocols the server uses to trash its own data, you can spoof those same protocols. It's quite the show." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
locale_flavor: “只要你的嗅探器找到了服务器用来销毁自身数据的协议，你就能仿冒出这样的协议，就会有好戏看了。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

oracle_flavor: "We built the network. But then the network evolved. Can we be sure that it is not alive?" -g00ru
locale_flavor: “我们建造了网络，可后来网络进化了，我们能确信它真不是生命吗？” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: A black box that makes data disappear forever.
locale_flavor: 一个能让数据永远消失的小黑匣。

oracle_flavor: There was a sickly smell coming from his closet. He hoped it was only a mouse this time.
locale_flavor: “他的衣柜传来令人恶心的气味，他希望这回只是一只老鼠。”

oracle_flavor: "The trick is remembering which virus you loaded onto which strip. That's why I draw emoji on 'em. Then I just have to remember which emoji stands for which virus." -Princess Space Kitten
locale_flavor: “技巧是记住每根条上你载入了什么病毒，所以我在上面画了表情符号，这样我只要记住每个表情代表什么符号就行了。” —太空喵公主

oracle_flavor: "Show me your faith without deeds, if you can."
locale_flavor: “将你没有行为的信心指给我看吧，若你可以。”

oracle_flavor: "They showed me that I wasn't broken. I am still a whole human, no matter how many limbs I lose. The golems are our enemy, as well as anyone who values efficiency and profit more than a human life." -Edward Kim
locale_flavor: “他们让我知道自己还未破碎。不论我失去多少肢体，我依旧是个完整的人类。那些机器傀儡，以及任何把效率和利益看得比人命还重要的家伙，都是我们的仇敌。” —爱德华·金

oracle_flavor: Her heart beat faster as her reader illuminated the records. It was all there. The pod had not been reprogrammed since the 14th, which meant that this was a case of gross negligence.
locale_flavor: 随着阅读器照亮，她的心越跳越快。就在这儿，豆荚从14日起就未被重新编写过，表明这是一次重大过失。

oracle_flavor: "Don't worry, me. You won't have to vertical park." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
locale_flavor: “别担心，我。你不需要垂直停车。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

oracle_flavor: Her eyes were the color of dreams and disasters.
locale_flavor: 她的眸色如梦似祸。

oracle_flavor: Scraps of code drifting around the network can congeal into pools of data. Within this primordial soup the code breaks, re-assembles, mutates. Evolves.
locale_flavor: 网域里漂浮的代码碎屑可以凝成数据池。代码在这原生汤里分裂，重组，变异。进化。

oracle_flavor: Runner software is notoriously scratch-built and under-tested, and the shadow net has no tech support. It works, mostly, but sometimes a fresh install is just the ticket.
locale_flavor: 众所周知，潜袭者软件都是粗制滥造而缺乏测试的，并且地下网络没有技术支持。通常，它能用，但有时候一次全新的安装是必要的。

oracle_flavor: "By the time you add in all of the options, you've spent about three times the base price. Of course, a lot of the systems are supposed to make you safer - if you can keep track of them."

"Sometimes I like to make origami cranes out of old newsrags. It helps me think, putting it back on the subconscious. I figure it's the same principle for my rig – keep it busy and it makes me a few creds for my trouble." -Quetzal
locale_flavor: “有时我爱用废报纸来叠纸鹤。清空大脑释放潜意识，有助于我思考。我觉得这道理也适用于我的基地—让它保持忙碌，它就会给我赚点小钱来排忧解难。” —绿咬鹃

oracle_flavor: "My guilt is never to be doubted."
locale_flavor: “我的罪责是毋庸置疑的。”

oracle_flavor:
"I promised I would come back for you, no matter the cost."
—Esâ Afontov
locale_flavor:
“我答应过会回来救你的，不惜一切代价。”
—艾萨·阿方托夫

oracle_flavor: With every step closer to their prize, Bankhar felt the ice slicing white-hot through their synapses. It was worth it.
locale_flavor: 随着与战利品步步接近，蒙獒感受到碎冰滑过其神经突触，烁出耀眼的炽热。但这值得。

oracle_flavor: Every piece of ice I see, I see Abaasy.
locale_flavor: 阿巴契寄宿在每一层我所见到的防火墙上。

oracle_flavor: Quiet. I need to focus.
locale_flavor: 安静。我需要集中注意力。

oracle_flavor: Relinquish your foolish notions of control.
locale_flavor: 放弃你愚蠢的控制理念吧。

oracle_flavor: I give you understanding, that you might control that which would threaten you.
locale_flavor: 我赐予你们学识，你们可以用它来控制任何威胁。

oracle_flavor: "With these two by my side, Iʼve sworn never to fail. I can bear any pain so long as it has meaning."
locale_flavor: “有它俩在我身旁，我保证绝不失败。我可以承受任何痛苦，只要所执着之事有其意义。”

oracle_flavor: "Roslavetsʼ Concerto No. 2. Breakneck, brilliant, enchanting. The perfect finale for Virtuoso."
locale_flavor: “罗斯拉维茨第二协奏曲。致命，杰出，迷人。演奏大师的完美谢幕。”

oracle_flavor: "I may bow like Iʼve accomplished the impossible, but the truth is itʼs not that hard."
locale_flavor: “我可能会鞠躬，仿佛完成了看似不可能的成就，但事实是这并不难。”

oracle_flavor: The poison cuts deeper than the blade.
locale_flavor: 毒药比利刃刺肉更深。

oracle_flavor:
"Zenit implants help you focus on the important things."
—Ampère holo-billboard
locale_flavor:
“天顶植入体帮助你专注重要的事情。”
—安培的全息广告牌

oracle_flavor: A repeated note, the alternation of fingers, the rhythm of stitches... the resulting intensity is always the same.
locale_flavor: 重复的音符、灵动的手指、刺绣的韵律……所产生的音强总是别无二致。

oracle_flavor:
"How could I pick a favorite? Theyʼre all good dogs."
—Nyusha "Sable" Sintashta
locale_flavor:
“我选不出最喜欢的那只。他们都是乖狗狗。”
—纽纱·“黑貂”·辛塔什塔

oracle_flavor: It was a relief, really, deciding on that one place in the world to definitely never visit again.
locale_flavor: 能在世界上找到一个我绝不会再来的地方，我说真的，这绝对是一种解脱。

oracle_flavor:
"The best ideas float to the top, if you give them time."
—Ar<h1m3d3s  JAR
locale_flavor:
“给灵感一些时间，它会自己浮出水面。”
—阿碁来得·贾

oracle_flavor: To outsiders, it is ironic that no one in Ampère can remember who invented these little fellows. Within the company, this is considered normal.
locale_flavor: 外人在讥讽，安培竞没人记得是谁发明了这些小玩意儿。但在公司内部人员看来，这是再正常不过的事。

oracle_flavor: It isnʼt as enjoyable as coffee, but the effects are magnitudes stronger.
locale_flavor: 它不像咖啡那样令人愉快，但效果却好出几个量级。

oracle_flavor:
"Are you telling me itʼs pronounced ʼgigawattsʼ?"
—Captain Padma Isbister
locale_flavor:
“你是说，它的功率量词念‘京’？”
—帕德玛·伊斯比斯特船长

oracle_flavor: Nanuq never leaves, but instead waits, invisible, for the next hunt.
locale_flavor: 北极熊从不离开，而是潜伏伺机，等待下一场狩猎。

oracle_flavor: Every rig needs a power source. How about one with blades moving at Mach 2?
locale_flavor: 每台设备都需要一个动力源。这台桨叶转速2马赫的怎么样？

oracle_flavor: Few constructs reach the Deep Net, but these old trees have stretched their roots further than once thought possible.
locale_flavor: 很少有结构能触及深网，但这些古树的根比想象中延伸得要远。

oracle_flavor: "There is another world under the waves, vanishing as we speak. I want to map it before itʼs gone."
locale_flavor: “海浪之下的另一个世界，正在我们谈话间消失。我想测绘它，趁还不算太晚。”

oracle_flavor: I found my twin hidden away on Luna. Now we will never be apart.
locale_flavor: 我找到了被藏在月亮上的孪生体。现在我们再也不会分离了。

oracle_flavor:
She leads and they all follow.
Always there to back up her big sister.
Sheʼs a typical middle child, really.
Just as brave as his sisters.
Sheʼs little—but fierce.
Look at the little baby, even she helps!
locale_flavor:
她领导，其他人跟随。
一直以来都是大姐最强的后盾。
她是个典型的中间娃，真的。
和他的姐姐们一样勇敢。
她很小——但可凶了。
看这个小宝宝，甚至她都能帮上忙!

oracle_flavor: Join us. Safe, away from the crisis.
locale_flavor: 加入我们。安全，远离危险。

oracle_flavor: Bend the minds of those below you such that they will always need you, and loyalty is assured forever.
locale_flavor: 扭曲你底下人的心智，让他们无法离开你，这样才会保证永久的忠诚。

oracle_flavor: Everyone remembers the first tape they archive.
locale_flavor: 每个人都记得自己存档的第一盘磁带。

oracle_flavor:
As one, every monitoring device on the ship reverberated, emitting a noise so primordial, so titanic, it shook Padma to her core.
Daeg hissed.
locale_flavor:
它发出如此原始、如此极巨的噪音，回荡在船上的每一台监测装置中，直击帕德玛的核心。
戴格也发出了嘶嘶声。

oracle_flavor: The sound welled up from the deep: throbbing, thumping, growing with every passing beat of their hearts.
locale_flavor: 声音从深处传来：伴随着他们的每一次心跳，颤动、砰击、渐响。

oracle_flavor: Sometimes, they want you to know that they know.
locale_flavor: 有时候，他们想让你知道，他们什么都知道。

oracle_flavor: You think thatʼs air youʼre breathing now?
locale_flavor: 你以为你呼吸的是空气？

oracle_flavor:
"Itʼs technically above our pay grade, but we know where our weapons come from. In Djupstad they wait, deep in thought, until we call upon them."
—Aron Hendrik
locale_flavor:
“严格来说，这超出了我们的权限，但我们知道我们的武器来自何处。它们沉睡在久普斯塔德，直到我们唤醒它们。
—亚伦·亨德里克

oracle_flavor: Few employees know he exists. Even fewer know he is actually three.
locale_flavor: 只有少数员工知道他的存在。只有更少数的员工知道他其实是三个人。

oracle_flavor: Bringing Mother Nature up to speed.
locale_flavor: 让自然母亲与时俱进。

oracle_flavor:
"By disabling their bodiesʼ ability to create a variety of necessary enzymes, weʼve ensured their loyalty to us. If they donʼt return for supplements every month, they die; simple as that."
—Dr. Vientiane Keeling
locale_flavor:
“通过阻断它们身体产生各种必要酶的能力，我们确保了它们的忠诚。如果它们不每月回来进行补给，它们就会死；就是这么简单。”
—万象·基林博士

oracle_flavor: Her numbers never lie, but she doesnʼt write the words that accompany them.
locale_flavor: 她的数字从不说谎，但解释性文字却不是由她来书写的。

oracle_flavor: There is an elegance to its blade and stride, but with it comes a screaming whirlwind.
locale_flavor: 其镰刃和步态显露出一种优雅，但随之而来的是呼啸的旋风。

oracle_flavor: Hafrún has lived through generations of changes in the Net, and now there are whispers that something from the deep is making it anxious.
locale_flavor: 明蛤经历了几代网络的变迁，但现在有传言说，某种来自海洋深处的东西正使它感到焦躁不安。

oracle_flavor:
"Matt, thereʼs something big heading your way. Matt, are you hearing me? Matt? Oh no."
—Moth
locale_flavor:
“马特，有个大家伙朝你这儿过来了。马特，你有在听吗？马特？哦不。”
—蛾子

oracle_flavor:
"The worst part about failed experiments? The queue for the incinerator."
—Overheard in the Issuaq Adaptics cafeteria.
locale_flavor:
“你知道失败实验最糟糕的部分是什么吗？是等待焚化炉的队伍。”
—伊雪克适应体公司食堂的流言蜚语

oracle_flavor: Here, at the edge of the habitable world, they extract the future from the bones of the past.
locale_flavor: 在这里，宜居世界的边缘，他们从过去的骸骨中萃取出未来。

oracle_flavor: "An FOI request? No problem! Please fill out all details. Youʼd like to make an anonymous request? Iʼm sorry: absolutely not."
locale_flavor: “一个信息自由请求？没问题！请将个人信息填写完整。你想提出一个匿名请求？我很抱歉：这绝无可能。”

oracle_flavor:
"Hey kiddo, remember what Daddy says about lying?"
"ʼOnly when you can get away with it!ʼ"
locale_flavor: “嘿小家伙，还记得爸爸说过，撒谎的后果吗？”“‘没人发现就没事！’”

oracle_flavor: Donʼt you remember?
locale_flavor: 你不记得了吗？

oracle_flavor: "People donʼt think in facts, they think in stories. We just tidy up that information to hasten the process."
locale_flavor: “人们不是根据事实思考，他们根据故事思考。我们只是整理这些信息来加速这一过程。”

oracle_flavor: SCANNING... ASSEMBLING INSULT!
locale_flavor: 扫描中……侮辱语言开始装填！

oracle_flavor: "Oh, the text on these is endless. Just tap accept and you can read it later if you want."
locale_flavor: “哦，条款文本没完没了。点一下同意就行，剩下的你可以等会慢慢看。”

oracle_flavor: "Donʼt look at the crates."
locale_flavor: “别盯着货箱。”

oracle_flavor: This was a criminal offense. Now itʼs an option for business.
locale_flavor: 这曾是犯罪行为。但现在成了一种商业手段。

oracle_flavor:
"Weylandʼs synthetic diamonds cost less than naturals... so what are they really digging for here?"
—Captain Padma Isbister
locale_flavor:
“威兰的合成钻石成本远低于天然钻石……所以他们到底在这里挖什么?”
—帕德玛·伊斯比斯特船长

oracle_flavor: When implemented at this sort of scale, these practices can keep away far more than a few unwanted citizens.
locale_flavor: 当实施规模达到如此程度时，能驱赶的闲人就不止这么几个了。

oracle_flavor:
"They just keep drilling down, no matter what..."
—Valentina Ferreira
locale_flavor:
“他们只是继续往下钻，不顾一切……”
—瓦伦蒂娜·费雷拉

oracle_flavor: Waiting for the next blow to land.
locale_flavor: 等待下一个捶击落地。

oracle_flavor: Under northern skies Sundog had lived all his life, and under them he would die.
locale_flavor: 幻日于北方天空之下度过了一生，也将于此长眠。

oracle_flavor: They say the Butcher of Siberia keeps the best cuts for himself.
locale_flavor: 他们说，西伯利亚的屠夫总会把最好的肉割下留给自己。

oracle_flavor: Getting in is hard. Getting out requires a death certificate.
locale_flavor: 进去已经很难。出来则需要提供死亡证明

oracle_flavor: Affordable, Effective, and Uncompromising.
locale_flavor: 实惠、强效、毫不妥协。

oracle_flavor: Open yourself to the universe.
locale_flavor: 接纳万有。

oracle_flavor: "A little birdie told me..." -Khan
locale_flavor: “有只小鸟告诉我…” —可汗

oracle_flavor: "Everything leaves a ripple in cyberspace. If you can find the ripples, nothing can hide." -Khan
locale_flavor: “所有东西都会在赛博空间留下涟波。如果你能找到涟波，任何东西都藏不住。” —可汗

oracle_flavor: "You want to do business in Los Pistoleros turf, then you gotta deal with me."
locale_flavor: “你要想在枪客帮的地盘上做生意，就得先跟我商量。”

oracle_flavor: Faster than the eye can follow.
locale_flavor: 手比眼快。

oracle_flavor: It required a hexadecimal code along with biometrics, delivered by way of BMI.
locale_flavor: 它要求提供一段十六进制的代码以及生物特征，并通过脑机接口来传送。

oracle_flavor: "Ice is not meant to kill; just slow or cripple the Runner. Killing is my job." - Tori Hanzō
locale_flavor: “防火墙不是用来杀人的；让潜袭者变慢或变弱就行了。杀人是我的工作。” —半藏冬莉

oracle_flavor: The truth hurts.
locale_flavor: 真理伤人。

oracle_flavor: "My job? I provide legal exculpation and sign everything. It pays very well."
locale_flavor: “我的工作？提供法律开脱服务，签署各种文件。待遇可好了。”

oracle_flavor: One way to get rid of a virus is to get a nastier virus.
locale_flavor: 除掉病毒的一个办法是引入更恶劣的病毒。

oracle_flavor:
"Guilty."
"Guilty."
"Guilty."
locale_flavor:
“有罪。”
“有罪。”
“有罪。”

oracle_flavor: Destroy the mechanisms of domination.
locale_flavor: 摧毁统治的机制。

oracle_flavor: As the riot turned to open conflict, Seb looked down at the gun in his hand. The time for peace was over.
locale_flavor: 随着暴动演变为公开冲突，塞巴低头看向自己手中的枪。和平解决问题的时期结束了。

oracle_flavor: He allowed himself five minutes. He wished for more.
locale_flavor: 他给自己留出了五分钟。他多希望能有更多时间啊。
由2020年世界锦标赛冠军Richard Hall设计

oracle_flavor: Blinded by its own wreath of flames, the Boi-tatá seeks eye after eye until the whole world joins it in darkness.
locale_flavor: 因自身焰环而盲目，波伊塔塔不断找寻眼球以吞噬，直至世界与其同陷黑暗。

oracle_flavor: Even a barren server can provide a feast, if you are patient enough.
locale_flavor: 只要你足够有耐心，即使是荒无一物的服务器也能提供一顿佳肴。

oracle_flavor: “You might have been the spark, Seb, but we're the flame.”
locale_flavor: 也许最初是你点燃了星火，塞巴，但如今我们已经燎原。”

oracle_flavor:
“I've been a pack runner since I was ten. My uncle got me started after Eduardo took a bullet to the hip. It's only recently that people have started cheering when I leave a cop lying in the dirt.”
—Gabi Saka
locale_flavor:
“我从十岁就开始搞私运了。是我叔叔拉我入的伙，自从爱德华多屁股中了一枪以后。不过撂倒一个条子后居然能听到大家欢呼喝彩，倒是最近才开始有的事情。”
—加比·萨卡

oracle_flavor: “Some info from our mutual friends, Professor. Now, about my daughter's grades…”
locale_flavor: “教授，这是一些来自我们共同朋友的情报。那么，关于我女儿分数的事情……”

oracle_flavor: “You'll find a way, little sibling.”
locale_flavor: “你会找到办法的，小同志。”

oracle_flavor: There's a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in.
locale_flavor: 万物皆有裂隙。那是光照进来的地方。

oracle_flavor: Rise and shine. Time to f**k up a corpie's day.
locale_flavor: 起床啦！该去毁掉一个公司员工的一天啦！

oracle_flavor: It finds a route, eventually.
locale_flavor: 它终究会找到一条路径。
由2021年美洲锦标赛冠军Jonas Wilson设计

oracle_flavor: The Moreira sisters couldn't be any less alike, each taking after her own father, but together they are a force unto themselves.
locale_flavor: 莫雷拉姐妹性格迥异，各自都随自己的亲生父亲，但只要两人联手便是一股洪荒之力。

oracle_flavor:
“They‘ll be talking about me for years.”
—Arissana Rocha Nahu
locale_flavor:
“接下来几年我都会活在他们嘴边。”
—阿里萨娜·罗查·纳胡

oracle_flavor: Sometimes an artist will be seized by the uncontrollable urge to create.
locale_flavor: 艺术家时常会遭遇无法抑制的创作冲动。

oracle_flavor: 8 billion, corner office.
locale_flavor: 80亿，来角落办公室。

oracle_flavor:
Breathe in.
Be as the dew rolling down a leaf; let yourself go.
Breathe out.
locale_flavor:
吸气。
把自己想象成露珠，在叶片上缓缓流下; 让自己往下流。
呼气。

oracle_flavor: Vó, mentor, angel. Murdered by porcos. Never forgotten.
locale_flavor: 祖母，导师，天使。被条子杀死。誓不罢止。

oracle_flavor:
“If stress hurts, then it must be a weapon.”
— Beatriz Friere Gonzalez
locale_flavor:
“如果压力能伤人，那它必然是一把武器。”
—碧翠斯·弗里尔·冈萨雷斯

oracle_flavor: “Listen up, garotinha, maybe you'll learn something.”
locale_flavor: “好好听着，小可爱，说不定你能学到点东西呢。”

oracle_flavor: Their victory became her coronation.
locale_flavor: 他们的胜利成就了她的加冕。

oracle_flavor: “I came home from Siberia to find a better purpose for myself.”
locale_flavor: “我从西伯利亚回到家乡，是为了寻求一个更好的人生目标。”

oracle_flavor: Strength in the palm of your hand.
locale_flavor: 万钧之力，尽在掌握。

oracle_flavor: Where ideas strike twice!
locale_flavor: 灵感两度迸发之地！

oracle_flavor: “I missed you last week! Come, we have lots to talk about. How was little Sarita's piano recital?”
locale_flavor: “我从上周就开始想你了！来，我有一堆话想找你聊！小萨丽塔的个人钢琴秀咋样了？”

oracle_flavor: “Just tilt your head a little to the right; the suit will soon sync with your cortical profile.”
locale_flavor: “脑袋再往右偏一点点。这套装备马上就能跟你的皮质轮廓同步了。”

oracle_flavor: At Thunderbolt, we ask: why not turn plowshares to swords?
locale_flavor: 在雷霆军工厂，我们提问: 为什么不能化犁为剑呢？

oracle_flavor: If you wait in the Thunderbolt corporate box long enough, everyone who is anyone comes by.
locale_flavor: 只要你在雷霆军工厂的团体包厢等得够久，是个有头有脸的人物你都能见得到。

oracle_flavor: Thunderbolt naturally offered city hardening solutions.
locale_flavor: 雷霆军工厂当然能提供城市强化的解决方案。

oracle_flavor:
“Be patient. When the prey panics, they lead you right to their friends.”
—Adrian Seis
locale_flavor:
“保持耐心。恐惧的猎物自会带你去找他的同伴们。”
—阿德里安·塞斯

oracle_flavor:
“Every mind can be dulled by repetition, even our prey’s. Strike when they get complacent, but before you get bored.”
—Charlotte's fifth lesson
locale_flavor:
“一切头脑都会因重复而变得迟钝，我们的猎物也不例外。趁他们得意忘形时予以打击。”
—夏洛特的第五课

oracle_flavor: “They offered me a desk job, but dammit, I just love working in the field.”
locale_flavor: “他们给了我一份坐着的工作，但我他妈只想干可以站着的活。”

oracle_flavor: The best families grow, learn, and hunt together.
locale_flavor: 完美的家庭中，大家共同成长，共同学习，共同狩猎。

oracle_flavor: They live forever in the rivers of the Net.
locale_flavor: 它们在网域长河中永生。

oracle_flavor: Don’t let it catch your scent.
locale_flavor: 别让它嗅到你的气味。

oracle_flavor:
“We are close, so close, to the endgame now, my friends. If we can convert just three more, the Automata Initiative is all but through the senate.”
—The Holo Man
locale_flavor:
“我们离收官已经很接近很接近了，我的朋友。只要能再转化三个议员，参议院通过自动机倡议已成定局。”
—全息人

oracle_flavor: “Up next: President Tavares' state funeral.”
locale_flavor: “即将播出: 塔瓦雷斯总统的国葬。”

oracle_flavor: She loved being part of the rough and tumble of politics and fundraising—from the calm of her own home.
locale_flavor: 她喜欢参与政治和筹款的风风雨雨——在自身足不出户的前提下。

oracle_flavor: Sebastião gritted his teeth as more and more indicators glowed red.
locale_flavor: 指示灯逐个转红，塞巴斯蒂安咬紧牙关。

oracle_flavor: Eat, grow, deny. A truly ravenous generation.
locale_flavor: 撕咬，疯长，将入侵者拒之门外。真是如狼似虎的一代。

oracle_flavor:
“Starlight called it a gift. I call it providence.”
—The Holo Man
locale_flavor:
“星光称之为礼物。我称之为天意。”
—全息人

oracle_flavor: Epiphany employees learned not to make weekend plans.
locale_flavor: 超觉分析的员工早就知道，周末不能留给自己。

oracle_flavor: Our fist shall hold the world.
locale_flavor: 我们的铁拳将掌控世界。

oracle_flavor: Young Gael Oliveira agreed to stay on and manage the farm, for a fee.
locale_flavor: 年轻的盖尔·奥利维拉同意作为雇员，留下来继续管理农场。

oracle_flavor:
High above, Braganza schemes,
Of force, fire, and basalt dreams.
locale_flavor:
尖塔之上，布拉甘萨正擘画。
火石之间，庞然要塞来征伐。

oracle_flavor:
“General, for a successful coup d'état, you need the people on your side.”
—CEO Braganza
locale_flavor:
“将军，想政变成功，您要得民心才行。”
—CEO布拉甘萨

oracle_flavor: A little circular reasoning never hurt anybody.
locale_flavor: 一点点循环论证不会有什么害处的。

oracle_flavor: The final blow is struck.
locale_flavor: 最后一击锤下。

oracle_flavor: Don’t think about it. You’ll sleep better.
locale_flavor: 少操心，多睡觉。

oracle_flavor:
“I followed every lead, and found the rot ran deep from Epiphany, worming into every branch of gov'. I saw my imperative, clear as day: these three had to die. And I had to find a way to do it.”
—Mercury
locale_flavor:
“我跟踪了每一条线索，发现腐败现象已经从超觉分析深处蔓延到了政府的每个部门。我非常清楚我的使命: 这三个人必须死。我得找到完成这件事的办法。”
—墨丘利

oracle_flavor: "Damn, I'm good."
All roads lead to Rome.
"Worth it."
... clack... clack... clack...
Another man's treasure.
"You think you're the first to come after me?"
"We have you surrounded! For real, this time."

"With the rise of crypto, banking has become much more complicated. Financial crime has not only kept pace, but exploded exponentially."
-After the Flash: A History of the War-That-Wasn't

"Any piece of ice is really just a paywall."
-Liza Talking Thunder
A classy alibi.
"If I can't kill it, I know who can."
"What are you making?" "What aren't I making?"
"Running is all metaphor, all symbols and plumbing into the depths of the psyche. Sometimes that means tentacles." -Akiko Nisei
The journey is its own reward.

"Breathe, girl. Breathe." Mike flickered into focus as she brushed Akiko's tears away. "What did you see?"
"I..." Akiko hesitated. "Everything."
"When we're together, I feel like I can do anything!"
I LIVE AGAIN
"So, Miriam, hear anything good lately?"
Want It More.
"Our analysis shows significant support from both the public and private sectors."
You don't cross it—it crosses you.
Banana who?
If that doesn't work, try reversing the polarity.
"Oh, my! He's on fire!"
Coach Walden's pep talks were renowned for improving in direct proportion to the amount by which his team was losing.
The world changed. Concession prices did not.
"Jumon, all too Jumon..."
"Supersedure is all part of our scheduled maintenance."
"If the sysop offers you a link, it's because they want you to go there. But if you wanted to go where the sysop suggested, you wouldn't be trying to break in at all." -How Not to Get Fragged
Step right up!
Only half as annoying as the real thing.

"What's so special about the Special Investigations Unit?"
"Their budget, for starters."
"I lost the staring contest. And all seven rematches." -Kabonesa Wu
"No, the audio is fine. It just never seems to turn off."
"Good news, ma'am. The compliance training was completed with little resistance."
"Cheers, Philbert."
We do things our way.
A place of decay and death, a plane out of phase, a place of monsters.
"It looks like a mistake but I'm pretty sure they leave the gaps on purpose." -Gnat
"This is blackmail!" "No, this is extortion."
"Analyzing the board won't help. Your mistake was thinking we're playing the same game."
You ever set something on fire just to watch it burn?
I feel almost naked without it.
It always strikes twice.
Something wicked this way comes.
Bleeding data is more of a science than an art. Too much and you can end up with a one-way ticket to flatline city. Not enough and you might as well be running an empty server.
November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.
Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.

In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.
It's easier to spend when it's not your money.
"They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge
"Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."
"Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"
"Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda
As the hysteria in the room climbed higher up the corporate chain, an uneasy feeling of joblessness began to sink in on the lower rungs.
"Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."
Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…
Twice the fun.
If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.
Do you believe in faeries?
Show-off.
"The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru
"My roomie, he had a cousin with a college girlfriend whose brother's best friend was an addict, and the addict's mother used to live here. So yeah, there's a connection." -Lez "Rockfist" S.

There are good, honest, hardworking cops in the NAPD. Officers who do their best to bring justice to the guilty and protect the innocent. Fortunately for the criminals, they're outnumbered by the other kind. The kind who are much easier to work with.

"We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago."
"I appreciate it, Mr. Li."
"We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel…"
"Yes?"
"Don't leave town."
"Have you met Dinosaurus?"
Diesel gives you flames.
A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.
There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.
When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.
"Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
"There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."
It's not endless, it just feels that way.
A z-loop here, a cortical wave there…
"It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
It can slice through the thickest knots of data.

The Great Work was completed on a rainy Thursday afternoon. There were no seismic shifts, no solar flares, no sign from the earth or heavens that the world had changed. But upstalk in Heinlein, on a single Cybsoft manufactured datacore, the flickering data quantums of an account began to fill with creds. Real, honest-to-goodness UN certified creds.
You didn't mention Aesop's arm unless you wanted an earful. Sometimes he talked about it in such a way that you wondered why he didn't laser his other arm off as well.
"I don't care what the studies show. From my experience, I can ingest three cans of Diesel an hour for up to twelve hours before going into cardiac arrest." -heard during the eleventh hour
The life expectancy of a jacked construct is about that of a mayfly. In other words, short.
"Bring back any memories, Monica?" -John "Animal" McEvoy
Lady Luck took the form of a hifi quantum manipulation ring that she wore on her middle finger.
Archaic but reliable.
Drudge work, but it pays the bills.
"My boss rewards quality work. If you know what's good for you, you'll keep it up."
A Different Breed of Machine.
Who wants to start a war?
I hear the shift of every bit amid the flow of the datastream. I hear the whispers of my mothers, and their commands are law. The realm beyond is forbidden.
I'm not here to play games. The game is over.
My reputation would precede me, if any could speak of it.
Whrrrrr!
My name is Viktor. Nice to meet you. Would you like to play a game?
"Do you think they…feel it?"

"Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."
Green-two clearance is the highest level of security a corp can gain access to. Legally, anyway.
The new heads were in. Their eyes always followed your movements when you unlocked the pressurized container and lifted the lid.
"Eyes forward, please."
When You Need the Human Touch.
"I will serve you…for a time."

Himitsu-Bako is a simple ice barrier that appears as a digital puzzle box. What makes it special is the ease with which it can be uninstalled and installed in a different server, throwing up barriers in unexpected places and giving any intruder a curious feeling of déjà vu.

Forged by Ak.wa on 23.11.79-23. Filed 23.11.79-23.2 with #34k-lw3-21HH-4i.
//Samurai included.

Writing a program that can pass the Turing test is easy. The Gibson-Akamatsu test is a higher bar, and the only AIs to clear it thus far have been the androids. Even some humans have been known to fail.

Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.
"This ice sucks." -g00ru
The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
When Miranda Rhapsody showed up with a teacup giraffe, suddenly everybody wanted one.
The trick isn't hitting the person you were aiming at. It's hitting only the person you were aiming at.
Smoke and mirrors optional.
Despite its appearance, the Hokusai Grid is the most notorious research facility at Jinteki.
Someone is Always Watching.
"The damn raven just kind of cawed at me as I went past. I should have known it was too good to be true."
A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.
"Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." -Chaos Theory

"Ever heard of a catch-22?"
"Remind me to forget it."
"It can make a real fine roller coaster, provided you're properly stimmed up." -Noise
"Please stay connected. Priority transfer in progress. An operator will shortly verif-"
Access to the largest consumer database in the galaxy has its advantages.
"The SEA tipped us off to some suspicious data spikes up by the Castle." -Jerome Lock, on-duty tech
Keeping tabs on the world, one screen at a time.
Moving Upwards.
There are going to be some changes around here.
"I use bioroids because I can wipe their memories or just blow their brains out when the job is done. No witnesses means no witnesses."
They don't call them dedicated for nothing.
"It's not personal. Urban renewal is a necessity of the modern world. It's always someone's home, yours is no different."
GRNDL refineries process many different rare elements unearthed during the fracking process.
Next time, read the Terms of Service more carefully. Or you might find yourself in the danger zone.
A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.
"He had a bit of an ego, ol' Hadrian. His constructs live up to it though." -g00ru
"I asked for ice as impenetrable as a wall. I can't decide if someone down in R&D has a warped sense of humor or just a very literal mind." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security
Who knows what evil lurks in the memory diamonds of men? Weyland knows. -unsigned cyber-graffiti

The New Angeles Space Elevator, better known as the Beanstalk, is the single greatest triumph of human engineering and ingenuity in history. The Beanstalk makes Earth orbit accessible to everyone…for a small fee.
"I'd say it's nothing personal, but corporations are people, too."

"And then there's these two crates. No eID."
"Just leave those with me and forget you ever saw them."
It didn't look like the headquarters of a multi-billion cred company. Probably because it wasn't.
"If it isn't in my terminal by six p.m., heads are going to roll!"
"Expensive? Not when you're protecting a fortune as large as ours."

"The mining bosses are worse than any downstalk crime lords. Tri-Maf, 4K, Yak, I don't care what gangs you got down there. In Heinlein there's just one law: the He3 must flow." -"Old" Rick Henry, escaped clone
It is just like the one you just bought, only better.

"Hey, hey! Wake up, man. You were under a long time. What'd you see?"
"I…don't remember."

client/sec256IPv7->confirm? /y
3926:0HB7:1001:2NB1:1601:7784:ERROR
"There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. -The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?
Sometimes in an instant you realize who your friends really are.
locale_flavor: 有时你瞬间就会明白，谁才是你真正的朋友。

oracle_flavor: "Underestimate those people at your own peril." -Akshara Sareen
locale_flavor: “小看这些人，后果自负。” —阿刹拉·萨林

oracle_flavor: The more parties she attended, the more they trusted her. The more they trusted her, the more entertaining her scams became.
locale_flavor: 她出席的宴会越多，他们就越信任她。他们越信任她，她的骗局就越有趣。

oracle_flavor: The Preserver.
locale_flavor: 保护者。

oracle_flavor: "Anyone who can afford dwarf elephants can afford to be my friend." -Fake-ir
locale_flavor: “有能力养侏儒小象的人都有能力成为我的朋友。” —诽基尔

oracle_flavor: "Check out my new ride." -2xTiger
locale_flavor: “瞧瞧我的新座驾。”—2x虎

oracle_flavor: In these days of digital full-sim browsing and widely available nano-assembly, it takes a special kind of crazy person to go shopping in meatspace. There are millions of them.
locale_flavor: 在数字化全模拟浏览与纳米级装配被广泛使用的时代，只有一群特别的疯人还在现实世界里购物。有上百万这样的人。

oracle_flavor: "Very good, sir."
locale_flavor: “好的，阁下。”

oracle_flavor: "Connect two truths. Connect two programs. All is one."
locale_flavor: “二谛相通。程序相连。万物为一。”

oracle_flavor: "As the world shrinks, communications becomes the most essential technology." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy
locale_flavor: “随着世界越变越小，通信成为了最关键的科技。” —拉梅什·古普塔，《世界一体经济》

oracle_flavor: "Wealth wisely invested is wealth earned." -The New Gospel of Wealth
locale_flavor: “明智投资的财富是生利的财富。” —《财富之新福音书》

oracle_flavor: The naja naja is the king of all serpents.
locale_flavor: 印度眼镜蛇是蛇中之王。

oracle_flavor: It's the exact same coffee, but the price sure is different.
locale_flavor: 咖啡还是那个咖啡，但价格显然不是那个价格。

oracle_flavor: It looked like random packet loss. It wasn't.
CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.

"People keep saying that 'Cash is king' in the business, like it's untraceable in the days of DNA sniffers and microtracers. Digital credits can be just as anonymous, and they're just as easy to counterfeit." -Silhouette
A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.
"Its bytes are definitely worse than its bark." -Chaos Theory
Data hunters always pay top dollar for old drives. The more useless the data, the higher the payout.

A VoicePAD is a personal access device with most of its functions ripped out. Just about all it's good for is making voice-calls and managing your contacts. The only reason to even have one is for its anonymity, which for a certain kind of person is all the reason one needs.
NEXT Design's ice provides the discerning business with a suite of ice that creates a daunting security presence for intruders.
The networking capabilities of the NEXT suite of ice are unparalleled.
"If thou only knowest what it is to conquer, and knowest not what it is to be defeated; woe unto thee…" -Tokugawa Ieyasu
A masterpiece of cloning and hardware technology, Jinteki created homo vacuo operae, commonly called "turtlebacks", to operate for long periods of time within a vacuum.

"Let me get this straight. Your target market is 15-19 year old g-modded immigrants with one parent, a discretionary income over 2k a month, B+ or higher grades, an outgoing personality, and have a friend who owns a g-monkey?"
"Yes. Is that a problem?"
"No, not at all. I just don't get why your list is so short."

"I hear the coast is nice this time of year."
"If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."
"Do it again, but this time I want to see you to enunciate less. Maybe let some spittle fly."
"I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…"

There drew he forth the brand Excalibur,
And o'er him, drawing it, the winter moon,
Brightening the skirts of a long cloud, ran forth
And sparkled keen with frost against the hilt:
For all the haft twinkled with diamond sparks,
Myriads of topaz-lights, and jacinth work
Of subtlest jewellery. -Lord Tennyson
Installing 1001 programs puts you in the hacker hall of fame, or would if such an institution actually existed.
locale_flavor: 安装1001个程序你就会入选黑客名人堂，假如真有这么个制度。

oracle_flavor: Noise decided to go back to school. He applied for research grants at fifteen of the most prestigious universities. Then he hacked in and approved his applications. Breakfast time.
locale_flavor: 噪音决定回到学校，他向十五家最著名的大学中申请科研津贴。然后他潜袭进去并且批准了自己的申请。该吃早饭了。

oracle_flavor: Just like in the real world, sometimes it is best to send in the clone to do the dirty work.
locale_flavor: 就像现实世界那样，有时最好还是让克隆体来干脏活。

oracle_flavor: The copycat function should be used with extreme caution, or you might end up on the wrong side of cyberspace.
locale_flavor: 使用拷贝者的功能必须非常谨慎，否则你可能进入赛博空间的错误区间。

oracle_flavor: It's efficient as all hell, for certain very large values of "efficient". The whale avatar is either a nice touch or a tragic misapplication of programmer man-hour, depending on who you ask. -BT's Guide to Icebreaking
locale_flavor: 就相当大尺度的“高效”而言，它高效得不得了。这鲸鱼的化身究竟是个很棒的工具，还是个浪费编程者时间与精力的悲剧，这取决于你问的谁。 —无名氏的防火墙破解指南。

oracle_flavor: "I've got a surprise for you."
locale_flavor: “我有个惊喜给你。”

oracle_flavor: "Why is data deleted? Maybe they don't want it to be found. Or maybe it's just useless. The useless data is the kind you want." -The Professor
locale_flavor: “为何数据被删除了？也许是他们不希望它被发现。或者只是数据没用了。没用的数据就是你想要的东西。” —教授

oracle_flavor: A VoicePAD is a personal access device with most of its functions ripped out. Just about all it's good for is making voice-calls and managing your contacts. The only reason to even have one is for its anonymity, which for a certain kind of person is all the reason one needs.
locale_flavor: 声控面板是一种移除了大部分功能的个人登陆设备。它全部的优点就是拨打语音电话和管理你的联系人。使用它的唯一原因就是它的匿名性，对于某些人来说这就是全部的需求。

oracle_flavor: "They call it 'retirement'. I call it 'euthanasia'." -Ken "Express" Tenma
locale_flavor: “他们称其为'退役'，我称其为'安乐死'。” —肯·“快车”·天马

oracle_flavor: Writing a program that can pass the Turing test is easy. The Gibson-Akamatsu test is a higher bar, and the only AIs to clear it thus far have been the androids. Even some humans have been known to fail.
locale_flavor: 编写一个能通过图灵测试的程序很简单。吉布森-赤松测试才是更高标准，迄今为止唯一能通过的人工智能都是安卓人。甚至有人类也未能通过的情况。

oracle_flavor: He signed for it, hand shaking in anticipation.
locale_flavor: 他签了字，满怀期待地握了手。

oracle_flavor: "I use bioroids because I can wipe their memories or just blow their brains out when the job is done. No witnesses means no witnesses."
locale_flavor: “我雇生化人是因为能在任务完成后清除他们的记忆，或者直接打爆他们的脑袋。没有证据就是没有证据。”

oracle_flavor: "It's not personal. Urban renewal is a necessity of the modern world. It's always someone's home, yours is no different."
locale_flavor: “这并非针对谁。城区革新在现代世界具有必要性。它总会是什么人的家园，是你的也并无特别。”

oracle_flavor: It was surprisingly easy to make creds…if you didn't care about how you made them.
locale_flavor: 赚信用点出奇的简单…如果你不在意赚钱方式的话。

oracle_flavor: There are many names for those in the Administration Department. But if you like your job, you just refer to them as "sir" and "ma'am".
locale_flavor: 行政部门的那些人有许多称呼。不过如果你珍视自己的工作，那就称他们为“先生” 和“夫人”。

oracle_flavor: Mounted holistic lenses download, recompile, and broadcast data faster than a corporate cover-up.
Brought up in the slums of Jinja, Lewi made his fortune through back alley deals, well-placed bets, and savvy showmanship.
Optical computing still has its uses. But it's hard to explain them to people whose eyes glaze over when you bring up the double-slit experiment.
New life through new understanding.

"Its only function seems to be repurposing code."
"Can you kill it?" she asked.
"I can try," he said. Guiding his program dead center of the mass, he plunged, piercing the shell before an eruption sent his screen into static. He jacked out, his eyes wide. "I... I think it absorbed my breaker. And everything else."

"The average citizen of Nairobi speaks six languages. Every culture, language, ethnicity of the east of Africa collides here, collapses together. What happens slowly by nature can happen quickly in our lab. We will bring peace." - Dr. Muchina, Project Lead
Earth and Sun, together as one.
Thin enough to pierce netspace. Deadly enough to pierce your mind.
Sometimes you have to break a few eggs to sequence a genome.
"Capitalism runs on two things: amplified arrogance and censored dissent. With those, a corp can create any environment it wants." - Freedom Khumalo
Our patented ClearMind™ technology pacifies the trials and tribulations of everyday life.
"Once every week, we perform a drill. Except, I'm the only one who knows it's a drill."
"Sure, the implantation was fine, but it pumps Burn. Did you think it wouldn't hurt?"
"An eye for an eye? If you're lucky, that's all you'll lose."
locale_flavor: “以眼还眼？如果只失去这么点，算你好运。”

oracle_flavor: "Who watches the watchers? We do."
locale_flavor: “谁来监视监视者？我们。”

oracle_flavor: "From code to profit in three easy steps."
locale_flavor: “从代码到收益只需简单三步。”

oracle_flavor: Sometimes efficiency is as easy as offloading routine work to a dedicated handler.
"Submit."
"Trust me, most corps cannot match the performance of our brainmap enhanced system; a home-brewed rig doesn't stand a chance." - Rachel Giacomin
"The customer pays to use our service, and then the advertisers pay us to put ads on their screens, and then the customers pay us a premium to remove the ads. Welcome to the dream."
"You have two choices: do what I asked, or make me ask again. It's your choice, but if I have to ask again, it will go badly for you."
locale_flavor: “你有两个选择：按我的要求做，或者让我再提要求。随便你选哪个，只是如果要让我再提要求，你可就不好过了。”
