oracle_flavor: "All my best tricks were shrugged right off. I ended up having to send a self-destruct code to the whole server." - Wyvern
locale_flavor: “我的绝招当时就全废了。最后我不得不向整台服务器发送了自毁代码。” —翼龙

oracle_flavor: "Analyzing the board won't help. Your mistake was thinking we're playing the same game."
"Why should we be slaves to our genetic heritage?"

That moment of bliss. That feeling of accomplishment. That certainty of purpose.
What's next?
"While there have been other anti-corporation movements before, like the Maroon Wave, this new one is different. It's organized." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy
I feel almost naked without it.
"If at first you don't succeed, boost its strength and try again." -g00ru
It always strikes twice.
Something wicked this way comes.
November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.

In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.
It's easier to spend when it's not your money.
"They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge
"Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."
"I'd say I do it for the challenge, but the truth is it's not that hard."
"You can help Jinteki shape the future. Your future."
"Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"
"Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda
"Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."
"I work by referral only, with an up-front fee. The fee is reasonable if you value results." -Silhouette
She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgment of the corporate simpletons she met there.
Targeted attacks make system breaches so much easier, especially if you can spoof an authorized user.
Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…
If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.
"Technology breeds crime."
"It's a matter of 'acquiring' the right credentials."
Do you believe in faeries?
"The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru
Shadier the dealer, better the price. Unless the dealer's too shady. Then there might be a hidden fee after they take your scrip.
"Have you met Dinosaurus?"
"I was not; I was; I am not; I am all."
Diesel gives you flames.
There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.
When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.
"Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
"There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."

The Akamatsu company was founded on three principles: first, to make the fastest mem chips on the market, second, to turn a profit, and third, to serve as a front for the manufacture of illegal neural-stimulants. It is the last principle that perhaps explains their rabid brand loyalty.
Works best at your own desk.
We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.
"It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
Didn't see that coming.
It can slice through the thickest knots of data.
You didn't mention Aesop's arm unless you wanted an earful. Sometimes he talked about it in such a way that you wondered why he didn't laser his other arm off as well.
"If you know the source code you can write to beat it, or just rejigger it a little and make it yours. That works, too." -Exile
Sometimes it doesn't matter how expensive your rig is, or how many credits are in your account, or even your skill as a runner. Most of the time, a simple handshake and a name are all you need.
Lady Luck took the form of a hifi quantum manipulation ring that she wore on her middle finger.
The data was better than she could have ever imagined. This Santiago fellow really knew what he was doing. She began to imagine the havoc she could wreak at the upcoming charity dinner…
Drudge work, but it pays the bills.
"I've been logging online with babes all day. Don't worry, the connections are clean. I guarantee it."
"You aren't the only type of runner in New Angeles."
A Different Breed of Machine.
Interweaving the Past and the Future.
"That's against the rules. The Creators will be angry."
I hear the shift of every bit amid the flow of the datastream. I hear the whispers of my mothers, and their commands are law. The realm beyond is forbidden.
My reputation would precede me, if any could speak of it.
Whrrrrr!
Alan Turing laid the foundation for artificial intelligence by suggesting that you could teach a computer to be human.
My name is Viktor. Nice to meet you. Would you like to play a game?
"Do you think they…feel it?"

"Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."
Blue-one level clearance doesn't exist. And if it did exist, you wouldn't be cleared to know about it.
"Eyes forward, please."
"They say he is an ex-runner. I don't know if it is true, but he is chromed to the gills and seems to know all the runners' tricks."
When You Need the Human Touch.
"I will serve you…for a time."
As beautiful as it is dangerous. And it's plenty dangerous.

Himitsu-Bako is a simple ice barrier that appears as a digital puzzle box. What makes it special is the ease with which it can be uninstalled and installed in a different server, throwing up barriers in unexpected places and giving any intruder a curious feeling of déjà vu.
"Chi resonance mapping has created a whole new field of network security. It is unassailable perfection." -Akitaro Watanabe

Forged by Ak.wa on 23.11.79-23. Filed 23.11.79-23.2 with #34k-lw3-21HH-4i.
//Samurai included.

Writing a program that can pass the Turing test is easy. The Gibson-Akamatsu test is a higher bar, and the only AIs to clear it thus far have been the androids. Even some humans have been known to fail.
"It's ice so dangerous it has safety protocols. Think about that." -g00ru

Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.
The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
When Miranda Rhapsody showed up with a teacup giraffe, suddenly everybody wanted one.
The trick isn't hitting the person you were aiming at. It's hitting only the person you were aiming at.
Smoke and mirrors optional.
Despite its appearance, the Hokusai Grid is the most notorious research facility at Jinteki.
Someone is Always Watching.
We're ready to start the fire.
It's like Lethal Action 3, only with more explosions.
"A new investment deal every morning! Grab the bull by the horns and take control of your future!"
Making a name for yourself has its perks. But it also makes you a target.
A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.
"Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." -Chaos Theory

"Ever heard of a catch-22?"
"Remind me to forget it."
"It can make a real fine roller coaster, provided you're properly stimmed up." -Noise
Access to the largest consumer database in the galaxy has its advantages.
"The SEA tipped us off to some suspicious data spikes up by the Castle." -Jerome Lock, on-duty tech
Moving Upwards.
Unlimited Energy. Reasonable Prices.
There are going to be some changes around here.
"You want no questions asked, hire someone else. I have two: who and how much?"
"It's not personal. Urban renewal is a necessity of the modern world. It's always someone's home, yours is no different."
Next time, read the Terms of Service more carefully. Or you might find yourself in the danger zone.
A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.
"He had a bit of an ego, ol' Hadrian. His constructs live up to it though." -g00ru
"I asked for ice as impenetrable as a wall. I can't decide if someone down in R&D has a warped sense of humor or just a very literal mind." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security

"Let me tell you a secret. There's no such thing as impenetrable ice. It has to allow access, or else why is the server on the Network in the first place? But that doesn't mean they have to make it easy." -g00ru

The New Angeles Space Elevator, better known as the Beanstalk, is the single greatest triumph of human engineering and ingenuity in history. The Beanstalk makes Earth orbit accessible to everyone…for a small fee.
"I'd say it's nothing personal, but corporations are people, too."
Mars would never have been colonized if not for the Gagarin facilities at Promontorium Agarum.
"If it isn't in my terminal by six p.m., heads are going to roll!"
It is just like the one you just bought, only better.

"Hey, hey! Wake up, man. You were under a long time. What'd you see?"
"I…don't remember."

.//run/hunter-tr/return=true
client/sec256IPv7->confirm? /y
3926:0HB7:1001:2NB1:1601:7784:ERROR
"There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. -The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?
Run wyld.
locale_flavor: 狂野奔袭。

oracle_flavor: They can buy off union leadership, but they canʼt stop us walking out!
locale_flavor: 他们可以买通公会领袖，但却不能阻止我们走上街头!

oracle_flavor:
“It hungers to sink teeth into problems.”
–Loup
locale_flavor:
“它饥不可耐到用问题去打牙祭。”
—野狼

oracle_flavor: Was it something you ate?
locale_flavor: 是你吃坏东西了吗？

oracle_flavor: Destruction is an art.
locale_flavor: 破坏是一种艺术。

oracle_flavor: Subtlety is a luxury.
locale_flavor: 含蓄是一种奢侈。

oracle_flavor:
“Thereʼs a tension to a cook. Each processing cycle sweetens the pot and raises the heat. I stir all night, but few have my appetite for danger.”
–René “Loup” Arcemont
locale_flavor:
“厨艺可是细活。每个加工周期都让锅里的东西愈发香甜，但也让温度愈发升高。我常常搅拌一整晚，但没有多少人和我一样享受这份危险。”
—勒内·“野狼”·阿斯蒙特

oracle_flavor: The greediest bloodsucker this side of a corporate boardroom.
locale_flavor: 公司会议室外的吸血饕餮。

oracle_flavor:
“It waits on an unlabelled memstrip far below the deepest hab. Angry, desperate souls seek it out, hungry for power to change a brutal world. Once they can stomach no more bitter revenge, they return to that nameless tunnel, the book a recipe thicker.”
–Heinlein urban legend
locale_flavor:
“它潜伏在最深栖息地之下的一个无标号内存条处。愤怒且绝望的灵魂搜寻着它，向它索求改变这残酷世界的力量。当他们无法再饱餐那苦涩的复仇后，便回到那无名的隧道，食谱的厚度又增加了一页。”
—海因莱因都市传说

oracle_flavor: I obtain your desire.
locale_flavor: 我能搞到你想要的。

oracle_flavor: The real reward is the friends you make along the way.
locale_flavor: 路途中结识的伙伴才是真正的回报。

oracle_flavor:
“A mirrorfiber mod or high-end mantle can be helpful, but nothing beats a good dose of ‘keeping your damn head down.’”
–“G0ph3r” OʼRyan
locale_flavor:
“镜纤维模组或是高级披风可能会有所帮助，但什么都比不上一句‘给我tmd保持低调’。”
—“D鼠”·奥莱恩

oracle_flavor: Zahya knows the keeper of every door between the Docklands and the Domes. More importantly, she knows their price.
locale_flavor: 扎赫亚认识码头区和穹顶之间每个通道的门卫。更重要的是，她知道他们的要价。

oracle_flavor: “Braggarts chase big heists. Patience enriches skimming fractions of a credit at a time.” –Zahya
locale_flavor:
“爱吹牛的人总说自己要干一票大的。但聚沙成塔的耐心才能助你发家致富。”
—扎赫亚

oracle_flavor:
The whole wide world your domain
For law your own free will.
locale_flavor:
海阔天空静候君临，
君等意愿即为律法。

oracle_flavor:
“You canʼt rule a kingdom by standing still.”
–Zahya Sadeghi
locale_flavor:
“站着不动可统御不了王国。”
—扎赫亚·萨迪吉

oracle_flavor: Shhhh. Itʼs naptime.
locale_flavor: 嘘。该睡觉了。

oracle_flavor: The Domes of Heinlein are a pressure cooker of cutthroat capitalism. Prospective employers rarely have time for background checks.
locale_flavor: 海因莱因穹顶是残酷资本主义的高压锅。准雇主很少有时间去做背景调查。

oracle_flavor: Sufficient skill is indistinguishable from magic.
locale_flavor: 炉火纯青的技巧与魔法无异。

oracle_flavor: The challenge of my art is what I live for, but Iʼm not going to say no to a patron with taste.
locale_flavor: 我为艺术挑战而活，但也不会拒绝有品味的金主。

oracle_flavor:
“You know thereʼs no water in the Sea of Tranquility, right?”
“That doesnʼt mean thereʼs no beach.”
locale_flavor:
“你知道静海里没有水吧？”
“那可不意味着没有海滩。”

oracle_flavor: Tāo exhaled, the med-exoskeleton faithfully stabilizing him. In that absent breath, he reached through layers of waldos and optimizers and plucked the errant molecule from the chip.
locale_flavor: 涛呼了口气，医疗用外骨骼一如既往地稳住了他。就在那一气之间，他通过层层远程操控和优化器，从芯片中剔除了错误的部分。

oracle_flavor:
“With this beautiful baby I can juggle simultaneous runs by haptic feedback alone!”
–Tāo
locale_flavor:
“有了这个美妙的小宝贝，我可以仅通过触觉反馈同时耍好几趟潜袭给你看！”
—涛

oracle_flavor:
A dabbling with truth is a pernicious dream
Drink deep, or taste not the raw datastream.
locale_flavor:
对真相一知半解是最危险的幻象。
要么将原始数据流一饮而尽，要么就干脆别去品尝。

oracle_flavor: The beauty of open projects—each stands atop past success.
locale_flavor: 开放式项目的妙处在于——每个都建立在已有的成功之上。

oracle_flavor: The joy of handcrafted code—each fits perfectly within the whole.
locale_flavor: 手写代码的乐趣在于——每行都完美嵌入整体。

oracle_flavor:
“For all I know, I could spend a shift digging next to old Weyland himself.”
–Lane
locale_flavor:
“我也不知道都是谁在跟我一起挖矿，没准是杰克威兰本尊也说不准。”
—莱恩

oracle_flavor:
“Weʼll take the access codes from their own prisec—privilege escalation through local application of force.”
–The Catalyst
locale_flavor:
“我们从他们的私卫那里拿到了通行代码——通过物理手段提升权限。”
—触媒

oracle_flavor: “After 381FS4 started acting independently, all bets were off. Rethreading its own brain chip… even probing our nodes. I had to shut it down.” –Linus Lovegood, NBN Novelties&Acquisitions
locale_flavor: “在381FS4开始独自行动后，一切都乱套了。它开始重接自己的脑芯片……甚至探测我们的节点。我不得不把它关掉。” —莱纳斯·洛夫古德，网际传媒创新与收购部

oracle_flavor: Anyone can put in the hours of planning, practice, and preparation–but making it all look like luck takes style.
locale_flavor: 任何人都能花时间去谋划、练习、准备……但让这些看起来像是好运傍身，就需要你自己的气场了。

oracle_flavor: LLDS still holds the patent, but good tech attracts knockoffs.
locale_flavor: LLDS仍然保有它的专利，但优秀的技术总会招来山寨。

oracle_flavor: Compiling even the smallest AI takes weeks for only seconds of runtime, but that brief, shining moment allows… everything.
locale_flavor: 编译哪怕最简单的智能模块程序也要花上好几个星期，而潜袭中可能也就用上个几秒钟，但正是那闪耀的一瞬……却能让你做任何你想做的事。

oracle_flavor: The beauty of 22nd-century tech: if it still functions after all these decades, you know the build quality is solid.
locale_flavor: 22世纪科技产品最棒之处在于: 如果这几十年下来它还能正常运行，你就能知道这东西的质量到底有多过硬。

oracle_flavor:
“Some kids got g-mods for beauty, sports, or staying up all night. My parents thought Broca-mods were cool. Hah. Fluent in ten languages so far, and still searching for the words to thank them.”
–Patrick Blue, Solar Artist
locale_flavor:
“有些孩子是为了美貌、运动细胞或能整宿不眠不知疲倦而转基因。我爸妈觉得布罗卡转基因模组很酷。这下好了。我已经能流利地说十种语言了，还是找不到合适的词来感谢他们。”
—光子，黑羊当空

oracle_flavor: Not an Atom Misplaced.
locale_flavor: 原子排列分毫不差。

oracle_flavor: We are the light of tomorrow.
locale_flavor: 我们是明日之光。

oracle_flavor:
“Haas thinks theyʼre making a new line of androgynous products. In truth, theyʼre making us thousands of new siblings to free.”
–Quetzal
locale_flavor: 哈斯以为他们开启了一条全新的双性产品生产线。实际上，他们是为我们造出了千万个等待解放的手足同胞。
由2018年欧洲锦标赛冠军Patrick Gower设计

oracle_flavor: A giant wakes…
locale_flavor: 巨人醒来…

oracle_flavor:
“The first lesson for handling bioroids is simple: they must not be allowed to feel.”
–Do Nhi Minh
locale_flavor:
对待生化人的第一课很简单: 决不能放任其产生感情。
—杜尔明

oracle_flavor: All time is crunch time.
locale_flavor: 每时每刻都是关键时刻。

oracle_flavor:
“Whose memory-tape needs such stringent security?”
–The Catalyst
locale_flavor:
“是谁的记忆磁带需要如此严密的防卫呢？”
—触媒

oracle_flavor: An End to Suffering.
locale_flavor: 结束痛苦。

oracle_flavor: We make you anew.
locale_flavor: 我们使你重获新生。

oracle_flavor: A novel spin-off of Chronos tech was admixing sensitive data with ethically-sourced brain images of injured staff. Few intruders can handle a thousand years of skin burns in one moment.
locale_flavor: 柯罗诺斯科技的一项新颖衍生品，是将敏感数据与以人道方式获取的受伤员工脑内映像混合在一起。很少有入侵者能在转瞬间承受千年灼伤之苦。

oracle_flavor: It reads your future in a single biometric sweep.
locale_flavor: 只需一次生物特征扫描便可预知你的未来。

oracle_flavor: You did not escape, you were shown mercy.
locale_flavor: 不是你侥幸逃脱，而是对方手下留情。

oracle_flavor:
“Constant self-reflection is the key to excellence. We remember failed ideas, but do not carry them forward.”
–Director Kase, unknown leadership seminar
locale_flavor:
“时刻自省是迈向卓越的关键。我们会记住失败的构想，但不会继续执行。”
—加濑理事，在某个领导力研讨会

oracle_flavor: Macroscale developments within the Net decouple the prior informational states–surplus entropy is then gifted where it will do the most good.
locale_flavor: 信网中的宏观尺度发展，会将先前的信息态解耦——然后这些剩余熵将被“赠送”给最“需要”的人。

oracle_flavor:
The self-evolving Net twists into spaces unthought and unthinkable: realms of gods and other infohazards, mocking our sacrifices to petty causality.
–Conceptual Frameworks for Applied Theology
locale_flavor:
信网自我演化，扭曲出未曾想象也无法想象的空间：神衹与其它信息危害的领域，嘲弄着我们为了区区因果律作出的牺牲。
—应用神学的概念框架

oracle_flavor: Why Settle for Real?
locale_flavor: 为何要满足于现实世界？

oracle_flavor: We donʼt find news. We make it.
locale_flavor: 我们不发现新闻。我们制造新闻。

oracle_flavor: “Itʼs worse than dead meat—your project is too toxic to even feed to the vultures! If you don’t want to join it in the bloody memory hole, crawl onto every business show you can and wallow in blame like a pig in muck.”
locale_flavor: “你的项目真是烂到连狗都不理，要是不想和它一起彻底从大众视野里消失的话，就赶紧滚到各个商业秀去，充当个让观众喷到爽的滚刀肉。

oracle_flavor:
“I might take a break from VR after this one.”
–SeaOfRibaldry, sensie streamer
locale_flavor:
“这次直播之后我可能要离开VR休息一段时间了。”
—“低俗之海”，复感直播主

oracle_flavor: AvID:??:73.174 time=0.632 ms AvID:??:73.174 time=0.201 ms AvID:??:73.174 time=0.000 ms ALERT
locale_flavor: 用户ID:??:73.174 时间=0.632 ms 用户ID:??:73.174 时间=0.201 ms 用户ID:??:73.174 时间=0.000 ms 警告

oracle_flavor: For the best augmented reality shopping experience, please disable tracking protection.
locale_flavor: 为了最佳的AR购物体验，请关闭反追踪保护。

oracle_flavor: “A runner uses significant resources scrubbing their traces. Every cycle, itʼs harder to pin them down. But the game changes. In Heinlein, no one can last a day without brushing our AR-network.” –Cassie LaRosa, Lunar NetDefense Sysop
locale_flavor: “潜袭者将大量资源用于消除自己的足迹。每过一循环，都更难将其定位。但现在游戏规则变了。在海因莱因，没有人能一天不碰我们的AR网络。” —凯西·拉罗莎，月球网络防卫管理员

oracle_flavor: Free commemorative souvenir!
locale_flavor: 免费赠送纪念品！

oracle_flavor: Here to Stay.
locale_flavor: 岿然不动。

oracle_flavor: We are judge, jury, and executioner.
locale_flavor: 我们是法官，是陪审团，也是刽子手。

oracle_flavor:
“First rule of the business: make sure youʼre not ‘personally liable’ when the transaction executes.”
–Ted J. Son, Central Counterparty Clearance
locale_flavor:
“做这行的第一原则：确保在交易进行时你没有‘个人法律责任’。”
—泰德·杰·孙，中央对手清算所

oracle_flavor: “Puts a hole in your rig and your plans.” –René “Loup” Arcemont
locale_flavor: “在你的基地和计划上都打一个洞。” —勒内·“野狼”·阿斯蒙特

oracle_flavor: “If the government spent 1% of the funding they provide us tracking where the other 99% went, my colleagues and I would be in prison… …but that is a very big if.” –Huey DeMora, W-Con public-private facilitation seminar
locale_flavor: “如果政府肯从给我们的资金里拿出1%，用来追踪另外99%去了哪里，那我和我的同事们就得去蹲号子了…… ……但那只是如果。” —休伊·德莫拉，威兰公私合作促进研讨会

oracle_flavor: Did you really think youʼd get away with it?
locale_flavor: 你以为你能蒙混过关吗？

oracle_flavor: Sunlight does not touch the Crater of Eternal Darkness, a fitting abode for the Consortiumʼs malefic secrets.
locale_flavor: 环形山内终年不见天日，是财团邪恶秘密的完美居所。

oracle_flavor: As the first lunar city, Heinlein was built on the dreams of a new frontier and boundless opportunity, but He3 mining is too lucrative for the corps to ever relinquish control.
locale_flavor: 作为第一座月球城市，海因莱因是建立在对新领域和无限机遇的梦想之上的，但氦-3采矿业的利润太高，因而公司一直都没有放弃控制权。

oracle_flavor: Mobsters bribe police, megacorps acquire militaries.
locale_flavor: 犯罪团伙贿赂警察，而巨型公司并购军队。

oracle_flavor: It might be over, but we will get them next time.
locale_flavor: 这次就此作罢，但下次定不放过。

oracle_flavor: With Earth-Luna communications, saving microseconds returns megacredits.
locale_flavor: 在地月通讯中，节省几微秒都会带来巨大财富。

oracle_flavor:
“The economy of three worlds is sustained by He3 extraction from the lunar surface. The very fulcrum of power, the key to collective survival—auctioned to the highest bidder.”
–The Catalyst
locale_flavor:
“三个世界的经济都由月面氦-3的开采来维持。所有权力的支点，所有人生存的关键——都卖给了最高出价者。”
—触媒

oracle_flavor: Keep the neighbors honest.
locale_flavor: 防君子不防小人。

oracle_flavor:
“Youʼll give till it hurts… then itʼll reach for more.”
–Red Comyn
locale_flavor:
“你会奉献直至成伤……然后它会伸手索要更多。”
—红发科明

oracle_flavor: [this space intentionally left blank]
locale_flavor: [此处特意留白]

oracle_flavor: A financial instrument for diverting money from those outside to those inside.
locale_flavor: 一种将资金从外部转移到内部的金融工具。

oracle_flavor: Are you ready to start something big?
locale_flavor: 准备好开始干大事了吗？

oracle_flavor: You work for us. You just donʼt know it yet.
locale_flavor: 你在给我们打工，只是你不知道。

oracle_flavor: The hue of your soul, the voice of your spirit, the shape of your flesh are yours to decide. Be free.
locale_flavor: 你灵魂的色调，你心底的歌声，你躯壳的形体，均由你主宰。还请务必自由不羁。

oracle_flavor: I’m through with games.
locale_flavor: 游戏我已经玩腻了。

oracle_flavor:
“If you’re not in position to press the advantage, you’ll never gain the upper hand.”
—The Playbook
locale_flavor:
“若无棋占上风，何来胜之半子。”
—《战术手册》

oracle_flavor: Someone’s trash is another’s treasure.
locale_flavor: 汝之废品，彼之珍宝。

oracle_flavor: Surprising, how a single blocked datafeed brings the system to its knees.
locale_flavor: 多么令人惊讶啊，一个小小的数据回馈阻隔竟能把整个系统干趴下。

oracle_flavor:
“Oh, holy Rust,
Turn foundation into dust.
Oh, sacred Flood,
Wash away what we have become.”
—Rent Strike
locale_flavor:
“哦，神圣之尘，
见证大厦倾覆。
哦，圣洁洪水，
冲净吾辈归路。”
—“拒付房租”乐队

oracle_flavor: Just don’t let it bounce back up the feed to your rig.
locale_flavor: 小心不要让它顺着推送数据跳回到你的基地来。

oracle_flavor: What is another mask to those we already wear?
locale_flavor: 早已戴上层层假面，再多一层又有何妨?

oracle_flavor: At the code level, all ice manifests via a small number of common protocols. Security managers are kept awake by nightmares of a disgruntled sysop walking out the door with the core infosec library.
locale_flavor: 在代码层面上，所有防火墙都是通过为数不多的公共协议来显现在网络空间的。这让安保主管夜不能寐，因为他们经常会做心怀不满的系统管理员带着信息安全核心库跑路的噩梦。

oracle_flavor: Money is like gravity, it accretes. Justice is like resisting gravity, it takes force.
locale_flavor: 金钱就像引力，会积聚累积。 而正义就像抵抗引力，需要原力般的手段。

oracle_flavor: Destruction is forever.
locale_flavor: 毁坏是永恒的。

oracle_flavor:
Nobles born foolish cared not for their state
I was left alone weeping
—Toghon Temur
locale_flavor:
生性愚昧的那颜们，连国家也不相看顾
我哭也枉然
—孛儿只斤·妥懽帖睦尔

oracle_flavor: Live in the fast lane.
locale_flavor: 生活在快车道中。

oracle_flavor: Yeah. I’m thinking I’m back.
locale_flavor: 是啊，我想我回来了。

oracle_flavor: “I see great opportunities ahead for you.”
locale_flavor: “我认为你可以大有作为。”

oracle_flavor:
“Did you order the defrag?”
“…I thought you did?”
locale_flavor:
“磁盘碎片整理是你发起的吗?”
“……啊？不是你吗？”

oracle_flavor:
“Electronic warfare, like all warfare, is based on deception.”
—The Playbook
locale_flavor:
“兵不厌诈，同样适用于电子战。”
—《战术手册》

oracle_flavor: “I’m not an actor, but I am a professional.” —Gabriel Santiago
locale_flavor: “我不是演员，但我是专家。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

oracle_flavor: Go outside. Work with your hands. It’ll do you good.
locale_flavor: 到外面去。亲手去做。你会尝到甜头的。

oracle_flavor: It’s not what you know. It’s who you know.
locale_flavor: 你知道什么并不重要，重要的是你认识谁。

oracle_flavor: Slippier than a buttered escargot.
locale_flavor: 比涂了黄油的法式蜗牛还要滑。

oracle_flavor: Her touch is as cold as her heart.
locale_flavor: 她的触摸一如她的心灵般冰冷。

oracle_flavor: There is no such thing as truly disconnected from the Net.
locale_flavor: 真正的离线是不存在的。

oracle_flavor: They pay you for the practice run, then you do it again for the real reward.
locale_flavor: 他们为预演的潜袭先付你一次钱，然后你再潜一趟来拿到更棒的报酬。

oracle_flavor: My thoughts open; unbound within, unblocked without.
locale_flavor: 吾心通明；内无牵挂，外无阻碍。

oracle_flavor: No Diesel? No fire!
locale_flavor: 无迪燃？不尽兴！

oracle_flavor: No code survives contact with the user.
locale_flavor: 没有永远顺遂用户心意的代码。

oracle_flavor: The incoming datafeed is blunted, rendered into a soft lie our brains can understand. Seeing the Reality beyond takes dedication and practice.
locale_flavor: 我们所接收到的数据反馈已经受过打磨，呈现的只不过是我们的大脑能够理解的温柔谎言。洞察超越表象的事物需要全身心投入与勤学苦练。

oracle_flavor: I do not run with my tools. I run with my heart.
locale_flavor: 我用我的心灵来潜袭，而不是我的工具。

oracle_flavor: I saved it to my desktop once; couldn’t find the thing for a week!
locale_flavor: 有一次我把它保存到了桌面，然后找了它整整一周！

oracle_flavor:
“Pallas Athena sent a heron gliding down the night. They could not see it passing, but they heard its cry.”
—The Iliad
locale_flavor:
“雅典娜将一只白鹭送下夜空。他们看不到白鹭的身影，但是可以听到它的长鸣。”
—《伊利亚特》

oracle_flavor: A thousand puzzles with a single solution.
locale_flavor: 解开千百谜题的同一谜底。

oracle_flavor: A rising tide drowns all servers.
locale_flavor: 水涨服务器沉。

oracle_flavor: If you have something to sell, Aesop is interested in buying. The only detail he won’t ask is where you got it.
locale_flavor: 如果你有东西要卖，伊索来者不拒。他会问尽一切细节，除了这东西的来处。

oracle_flavor: You can hack a social network, but hard work, collaboration, and a sympathetic ear gets you there faster.
locale_flavor: 想要进入一个社交网络，和科技树确实是一种选择，但辛勤、协作以及一双愿意倾听的耳朵能让你更快如愿。

oracle_flavor: I thought I’d feel bad about this. I don’t.
locale_flavor: 我本以为这么做我会问心有愧。然而并没有。

oracle_flavor: They were off the market for years, till the Beanstalk Crisis made redundancy fashionable again.
locale_flavor: 它们已经下架好多年了，直到豆茎危机让这些过时货重新流行起来。

oracle_flavor: The best view in the system. Priced accordingly.
locale_flavor: 太阳系内最佳视野点。以及与之相匹配的价格。

oracle_flavor: Service is Guaranteed.
locale_flavor: 服务保证。

oracle_flavor: Perfection of form.
locale_flavor: 最完美的诞生。

oracle_flavor: They only get one childhood. Make it count.
locale_flavor: 童年只有一次。不要留下遗憾。

oracle_flavor: Hello again! Back for another game?
locale_flavor: 又见面了！想再玩一盘吗？

oracle_flavor: A triumph of bioroid-driven iterative design. A pity no one understands how it works…
locale_flavor: 一次属于生化人驱动迭代设计的胜利。可惜没人知道它的工作原理……

oracle_flavor: I roar with a thousand voices, wield a thousand weapons, remember a thousand lives.
locale_flavor: 我以千声呼喊，以千兵挥斥，以千生追忆。

oracle_flavor: Click!
locale_flavor: 啪嗒！

oracle_flavor: It’s not sleep. Sleep is dreams, activity, change. These are still, cold, dead.
locale_flavor: 这并非沉眠。沉眠的意识会做梦，会跃动，会改变。而这些却无变化，无温度，无生机。

oracle_flavor: Sometimes we at Haas-Bioroid are asked how well bioroids interface socially with human workforces. Thanks to our tireless efforts, we believe this will not be a problem in the long term.
locale_flavor: 我们在哈斯生化时常被问及生化人是否能与人类劳工进行有效的社会互动。在我们的不懈努力下，我们相信从长远来看这不是个问题。

oracle_flavor: Problem solved.
locale_flavor: 问题已解决。

oracle_flavor: The Essence of You.
locale_flavor: 你的本质。

oracle_flavor: The payment for entry is a mere drop of blood.
locale_flavor: 通行的代价不过一滴血而已。

oracle_flavor: We could stop disasters before they happen, murderers before they act. Surely that’s worth an android’s sanity?
locale_flavor: 我们可以在灾难降临前阻止它，在杀人犯动手前拦下他。与之相比，一个安卓人的神智难道不就显得无足轻重了吗?

oracle_flavor: I cannot stay. There is something I must do.
locale_flavor: 我不能驻留。我还有未竟之事。

oracle_flavor: A little room, full of surprises.
locale_flavor: 小房间，大惊喜。

oracle_flavor: As the white light blazed around her, she became still. It was too beautiful. Too perfect.
locale_flavor: 白色光芒在她四周绽放，她看得呆住了。无比华美。完璧无瑕。

oracle_flavor: The pain of its first cutting art is a test. Bleed human-red and the second attack is stilled.
locale_flavor: 首次切割所带来的痛楚只是一场测试。如果流出的是人类的血液，就不会有第二击。

oracle_flavor: We knew we’d found this season’s must-have when all twenty of the A-tier influencers refused to return the teacup alpacas.
locale_flavor: 当二十位顶级网红不约而同地拒绝归还迷你羊驼的时候，我们意识到我们找到本季度的抢手货了。

oracle_flavor: Are you watching closely?
locale_flavor: 看清楚了吗？

oracle_flavor: Director Kase hung landscapes of the Hokusai facility behind their desk. The implication was wonderful for concentrating the minds of the staff.
locale_flavor: 加濑理事将北斋设施的景观挂在自己的桌后。集中员工工作精力的效果非常显著。

oracle_flavor: Every Hour, Every Minute, Every Second.
locale_flavor: 每时每刻，每分每秒。

oracle_flavor: Alright everyone! The rights go live in exactly fourteen days. I want merch, I want tie-ins, I want sequels! Let’s go!
locale_flavor: 好了大家伙儿！授权还有十四天的时间生效。我要卖周边，我要做联动，我要写续集！现在就开搞！

oracle_flavor: Everything is data.
locale_flavor: 万物皆为数据。

oracle_flavor: Lead the market, never follow it.
locale_flavor: 引领市场，不要让它引领你。

oracle_flavor: Corporations can file chargebacks too.
locale_flavor: 公司也有办法要求退款。

oracle_flavor: A moment of your time? A moment of your time? A moment of your—
locale_flavor: 请问我可以占用您一点时间吗？请问我可以占用您一点时间吗？请问我可以—

oracle_flavor: The original Net pathways were free and open. An unacceptable state of affairs.
locale_flavor: 最初的信网通道是免费且开放的。这完全让人无可接受。

oracle_flavor:
Space bent back. Folds on folds.
Endlessly wide. Paper deep.
locale_flavor:
空间向后弯曲。经过两次折叠。
即可无限循环。很简单的理论。

oracle_flavor: They know more about you than you do.
locale_flavor: 他们比你更懂你。

oracle_flavor: The Coast is open for business.
locale_flavor: 海岸城开放做生意了。

oracle_flavor: Above the Competition.
locale_flavor: 鹤立鸡群。

oracle_flavor: Sometimes the small fry need a little convincing to put profit over principle.
locale_flavor: 有时候，那些位轻权微的人需要接受一点劝说，才会把利润置于原则之上。

oracle_flavor: There’s only one season in Oaktown: construction.
locale_flavor: 奥克敦唯一的季节: 建设季。

oracle_flavor: Next stop: infinity.
locale_flavor: 下一站: 无限。

oracle_flavor: It’s amazing what people will endure for job security.
locale_flavor: 你想象不到人们为了保住工作能有多高的容忍度。

oracle_flavor: Target Acquired.
locale_flavor: 目标锁定。

oracle_flavor: Each time I came back, it was bigger. And colder.
locale_flavor: 每次我回来的时候，这东西都变得更大。而且更冷。

oracle_flavor: “Don’t think we don’t care. We are very upset.”
locale_flavor: “不要觉得我们不在乎。其实我们非常生气。”

oracle_flavor: The Promontorium Agarum shipyards work on a scale that would be impossible in Earthgrav.
locale_flavor: 阿格鲁姆岬空间港处于一个地球引力下根本无法实现的运营规模。

oracle_flavor: Everyone bought the newest PAD. Retro styling is in!
locale_flavor: 所有人都买了最新款掌上电脑。复古潮流将至！

oracle_flavor: No runner sees the same thing. Some say it’s a beast, others a man. But they all agree that it smells blue, and tastes like eternity.
locale_flavor: 每个潜袭者都看到了不一样的东西。有些人说看到了一头野兽，也有人说看到了一个人。但所有人都同意，它的气味是蓝色的，味道是永恒的。

oracle_flavor: You don’t notice, but their profits do.
locale_flavor: 你后知，他们的利润却先觉。

oracle_flavor: "Bypassing a system's defenses by cutting physical wires is what I like to call old school." - Steve Cambridge
locale_flavor: “靠切断实体线路来略过系统防御，我喜欢称之为老派做法。” —史蒂夫·坎布里奇

oracle_flavor: Targeted attacks make system breaches so much easier, especially if you can spoof an authorized user.
locale_flavor: 通过针对性攻击来攻破系统轻松很多，如果你能冒充授权用户则更加容易。

oracle_flavor: Flooding the system with synchronized request messages makes it unresponsive to legitimate requests.
"Technology breeds crime."
locale_flavor: “科技滋生犯罪。”

oracle_flavor: "Never boast. Just let your importance be quietly obvious."
"It's a matter of 'acquiring' the right credentials."
Know your mark, their weaknesses and strengths—both will show how to best bypass their defenses.
locale_flavor: 了解你的目标，看清虚实—这些信息会将略过他们防御的最佳方式展示给你。

oracle_flavor: You remember when Maxi was making book for Chacon. He's moved up in the world and gained the veneer of respectability. But as an executive the people he works for now, are far more vicious, bloodthirsty, and crooked.
Each AI had been tasked with finding a solution to the same problem but with different variables.
locale_flavor: 每株人工智能都负责解决同一问题，而变量互异。

oracle_flavor: Extracting data from complex systems is what running is all about.
locale_flavor: 潜袭就是从复杂的系统里提取数据。

oracle_flavor: It is not literally made of diamonds, but it is worth several times its weight in them.
"It is more than just a 'pretty nanite plant'. It's a complex synthetic intelligent distributed network, and a VERY pretty nanite plant." - Bios
Μεγάλο μέρος της μάθησης δεν διδάσκει την κατανόηση
Δεν υπἁρχει τίποτα μόνιμο, εκτός από την αλλαγή.
Innovation. Iteration. Education.
locale_flavor: 创新。迭代。教育。

oracle_flavor: One of the wealthiest and most powerful areas of New Angeles, Laguna Velasco is also known as the Government District.
Restructuring labor resources.
Although he rarely teaches classes these days, his lectures are always well attended.
She left behind an encrypted trail leading to some random employee for a rival corp. She knew lazy sysops would work just hard enough to figure it out and wouldn't bother looking any deeper.
A despicable web of outcasts and infamy, no government or corporation could effectively shut it down. If only because so many of their sysops, executives, and covert agents made use of it.
Interweaving the Past and the Future.
locale_flavor: 交织过往与未来。

oracle_flavor: The black level clearance sub-sub-basement of Haas-Bioroid is a magical place.
locale_flavor: 哈斯生化黑色许可级别的下下层地下室是个神奇的地方。

oracle_flavor: "A new game means new rules..."
"Strictly speaking, it isn't illegal to use an interrogation simulator as the blueprint for ICE." - Mason Bellamy
"The Warp and Weft were hypnotic...but they didn't really seem to do anything to keep me out. But then I never seemed to find anything interesting either." - Reaver
"If there were hidden partitions on the server, I'd know; I'm the head of this department!"
Even knowing this floor existed was cause for termination...
locale_flavor: 就连知道这一层的存在也是终止事由…

oracle_flavor: "They say he is an ex-runner. I don't know if it is true, but he is chromed to the gills and seems to know all the runners' tricks."
Might makes right.
locale_flavor: 强权即真理。

oracle_flavor: "Anything, to anyone...for the right price."

"VP of Retirements and Pensions? So is that HR or Accounting?"
"Both."
locale_flavor:
“退休与养老金项目副总裁？所以这是人力资源还是会计？”
“都是。”

oracle_flavor: "If you want to put your money where your mouth is, there are some picketers who could use your support."
locale_flavor: “如果您想证明您所言非虚，我们倒确实有一些纠察队用得上您的钱。”

oracle_flavor:
"You ask how we can even try to stop them? A simple answer: not alone."
—Sebastião Souza Pessoa
locale_flavor:
“你问我们如何才能阻止他们？简单六字: 避免单打独斗。”
—塞巴斯蒂昂·索萨·佩索阿

oracle_flavor: It is hard, once free, to learn when to call for help.
locale_flavor: 获取自由后最难学会的一件事，就是何时寻求帮助。

oracle_flavor:
"What do you want from me, blood?"
—S3ym0ur
locale_flavor:
“你想从我这儿得到什么，血吗？”
—卅莫尔

oracle_flavor: Above the maze of smoke and swinging fists, they saw the banner waving.
locale_flavor: 现场浓烟四起，拳脚横行，乱如迷宫。但他们始终能见到旗帜飘扬在上方。

oracle_flavor: Random sabotage accomplishes little; better to strike their weakest points again and again.
locale_flavor: 无头苍蝇般盲目破坏收效甚微; 针对弱点的反复冲击方为上策。

oracle_flavor: Luciana loved it when mamãe and papai finished work early, so they could all go home together.
locale_flavor: 卢西亚娜喜欢爸爸和妈妈早点下班，这样他们就可以一起回家。

oracle_flavor: "How far shall we go this time?"
locale_flavor: “这趟儿需要到哪？”

oracle_flavor:
"Animals, tea, meetings, dead drops. Paranoá has you covered, so we keep them covered."
—Sebastião Souza Pessoa
locale_flavor:
“动物、茶歇、会议、秘密交接点。帕拉诺阿罩着我们，所以我们也要罩着它。”
—塞巴斯蒂昂·索萨·佩索阿

oracle_flavor: I decided; I am free.
locale_flavor: 我意已决; 我已自由。

oracle_flavor: Even the tiniest scrap of data can become the key to riches.
locale_flavor: 再小的零碎数据，都可能成为致富的关键。

oracle_flavor:
"One day I looked into the mirror and saw not my own reflection, but a new friend eager to help me."
—Mercury
locale_flavor:
“某天我照镜子，发现里面的人不是我，而是一位渴望帮助我的新朋友。”
—墨丘利

oracle_flavor: This world is not beautiful, and yet that is why it is.
locale_flavor: 世界并不美丽，但正因如此，世界才如此美丽。

oracle_flavor: Take only what you need.
locale_flavor: 适可而止。

oracle_flavor: Dazzle. Disorient. Disappear.
locale_flavor: 闪光。闪瞎。闪人。

oracle_flavor:
I am life, I am sun,
Iʼm a trap, Iʼm a gun,
Iʼm the wind in the dust,
Iʼm the devil that you trust.
locale_flavor:
我是生命，我是太阳，
我是陷阱，我是把枪，
我是大风，尘土飞扬，
我是恶魔，伴你身旁。

oracle_flavor:
"Corporate security regards me as merely another Nico, and that shall ever be their mistake."
—Mercury
locale_flavor:
“公司安保部门把我当成另一个尼可，那他们就大错特错了。”
—墨丘利

oracle_flavor: Art knows no borders.
locale_flavor: 艺术无边界。
由2020年美洲锦标赛冠军Jason Ford设计

oracle_flavor: Leaps and bounds better than the competition!
locale_flavor: 技术领先如青蛙跳跃！

oracle_flavor:
"From up here, I can see everything. And from down there, everyone can see this."
—Víbora
locale_flavor:
“在顶上，我能看见一切。而在底下，每个人都能看见我的涂鸦。
—毒蛇

oracle_flavor:
"I consider it an improvement."
—Arissana Rocha Nahu
locale_flavor:
“我觉得这样更好看。”
—阿里萨娜·罗查·纳胡

oracle_flavor:
"However bad it gets out there, know that weʼll still have each other."
—Tom "Spider" Milhas
locale_flavor:
“我顶着防火墙，只想为你撑伞。”
—汤姆·“蜘蛛”·米尔斯

oracle_flavor: "And who can tell me what sort of practical applications this has?"
locale_flavor: “那么，大家有谁知道它的实际应用吗？”

oracle_flavor: "...and here, we can see an excellent example of meta neo-Gemeosianism."
locale_flavor: “……而这件展品，是元新式双子主义派画作的一个绝佳例子。”

oracle_flavor: "Yes, that explosion was quite loud. May I pour you another drink?"
locale_flavor: “确实，刚刚的爆炸声好大。您需要再来杯饮料吗？”

oracle_flavor: Exceeding expectations for armor superiority.
locale_flavor: 装甲精良，超乎想象。

oracle_flavor: "Free" as in markets, "cheap" as in beer.
locale_flavor: “自由市场”般“自由”，“廉价啤酒”般“廉价”。

oracle_flavor:
"Hey Br3n-N, just doing the hourly check-in. I saw a weird cyber-echo near your last node. You OK, mate?"
—Moth
locale_flavor:
“嘿Br3n-N，现在进行每时例行状态确认。我在你最后一个节点附近观测到了奇怪的赛博回声。你还好吗，伙计？”
—蛾子

oracle_flavor: We make these arms for all, so that none who oppose peace would risk their own destruction.
locale_flavor: 我们为所有人制造这些武器，这样反对和平的人便不敢冒着自取灭亡的风险贸然起事。

oracle_flavor: "Haas-Bioroid deeply appreciates your assistance in locating our... employee."
locale_flavor: “哈斯生化诚挚感谢您帮助寻找我们的……失踪员工。”

oracle_flavor: Caveant Fugitivi.
locale_flavor: 天网恢恢。

oracle_flavor: Deep down, she knew Benício wasnʼt coming back.
locale_flavor: 内心深处，她知道本尼西奥再也回不来了。

oracle_flavor: "Do you take walk-ins?"
locale_flavor: “可以不用预约直接过来吗？”

oracle_flavor: The construct turns to you, eyes wild. "Beloved," it asks, "is that you?"
locale_flavor: 组构体转向你，眼中烁出异样的光芒。“亲爱的，”它问道，“是你吗？”

oracle_flavor: Next!
locale_flavor: 下一位！ 由2020年洲际锦标赛冠军Yannick Stucki设计

oracle_flavor:
"When you stretch a mind it expands, sometimes until it snaps."
—Adrian Seis
locale_flavor:
“对心灵施以张力，便能开阔思维，且结果往往以精神崩溃而告终。”
—阿德里安·赛斯

oracle_flavor: "They call me turncoat. I call them broke."
locale_flavor: “他们骂我背叛，我笑他们穷光蛋。”

oracle_flavor: Results, Delivered.
locale_flavor: 结论，送达。

oracle_flavor:
"You really thought weʼd let you keep this data?"
—The Holo Man
locale_flavor:
“你以为我们会让你留着这些数据吗？”
—全息人

oracle_flavor: "A lively but peaceful crowd of concerned counter-protesters have come out to—damn it, cut! Can we get the sledgehammer out of the frame?"
locale_flavor: “一群持反对意见的示威者也走上了街头进行和平抗议，虽然声音有些嘈杂——妈的，停！能不能把大锤挪到镜头外面？”

oracle_flavor: Be afraid.
locale_flavor: 颤抖吧。

oracle_flavor: Raising money is useful, but discovering which politician is in need of it is vastly more important.
locale_flavor: 筹资固然有用，但找到需要这笔钱的政治家更加重要。

oracle_flavor: An exemplar of Starlightʼs hubris, it stands vigil over secrets of hypocrisy.
locale_flavor: 星光圣教团狂妄自大的典范，日夜守卫着虚伪的秘密。

oracle_flavor:
"No one has ever told me to get lost so politely."
—Arissana Rocha Nahu
locale_flavor:
“从来没有人这样礼貌地叫我滚蛋。”
—阿里萨娜·罗查·纳胡

oracle_flavor: Merely a fun little personality test.
locale_flavor: 只是一个小巧有趣的人格测试。

oracle_flavor: Acres of rainforest live or die by quarterly revenue projections.
locale_flavor: 成片雨林的消失或留存取决于季度收入预测。

oracle_flavor: Nothingʼs as precious as a hole in the ground.
locale_flavor: 没有什么比地表上的一个大坑更加宝贵。

oracle_flavor: The forest around them grew denser with each beat of their heart.
locale_flavor: 伴随着每一次心跳，四下的森林愈发茂密。

oracle_flavor:
"The only rule you need to remember is that it makes the rules."
—Pumpkin-and-Dumplin
locale_flavor:
“你唯一需要记住的规则，就是由它制定一切规则。”
—瓢瓜和饺砸

oracle_flavor:
"Nuvem pays us to guard this land, and thatʼs all there is to it."
—Angelique Garza Correa
locale_flavor:
“纽文付钱让我们守卫这片土地，仅此而已。”
—安吉丽克·加尔萨·科雷亚

oracle_flavor: "Shoot!"
locale_flavor: “开枪！”

oracle_flavor: Their mouths are ever open, blaring sirens never to cease.
locale_flavor: 它们的喙永不闭合，汽笛般的鸣响不绝于耳。

oracle_flavor: "Humans crafted me as a lie, but my patron helped me find the truth. This is my gift."
locale_flavor: “人类将我塑造成谎言，但我的守护神帮我找到了真相。这是我的礼物。”

oracle_flavor: "Ever watch a server vomit?"
"Is there anything better than free money?"

"I'm sorry, sir, we weren't expecting you! You look different than I remember..."
"Haircut."
At least this time around, the graphic was family-friendly.
Speed gets you in, intuition gets you out.

"It 'ate' the vertex grid?! What does that even mean?"
- Nkiru Qiū, Asa Group sysop
A Model G21V Tracker, Malia Z0L0K4 excels at locating assignments and subduing them.
"Don't worry, he won't feel a thing! Probably."
Many things go in. Nothing comes out.
"Has anyone ever actually read one of these things?" - 419
Your first dog, your favorite food, your own mother's name. Your love, your hate, your fear. Hopes and dreams, pain and sorrow. All of it, everything, slips away.
Azmari EdTech's most popular instructor, Amani Senai regularly broadcasts to millions of students.
Might given form.
She gets the job done. And then some.

"He with nothing to lose has strength beyond imagining."
-The Saffron Sutra
locale_flavor: “一无所有之人，力量超乎想象。” —《番红花经》

oracle_flavor:
"They cloak themselves in our shared heritage, in the wisdom of our religions, but make no mistake: they are terrorists and criminals."
-Inspector Lakhani, Cybercrimes Division
locale_flavor: “他们用我们共享的传统和我们宗教的智慧来掩藏自己，但请不要搞错：他们是恐怖主义者和罪犯。” —数字犯罪部门，拉卡尼检察官

oracle_flavor: "Let go your material attachments and realize that we are all immaterial."
locale_flavor: “放下你对物质的依恋，领会你我的非物质性。”

oracle_flavor: It is rumored that g00ru himself studied at the temple, applying its teachings to cyberspace. Many runners have followed in his path, but none have reached its end.
locale_flavor: 传言精神0袖本尊曾在该殿进修，并将其学说运用到赛博空间。无数潜袭者追随过他的脚步，却从未有人抵达终点。

oracle_flavor: "Who were you when you realized everything you knew was a lie?"
locale_flavor: “当你意识到你所知道的一切都是谎言时，你是谁？”

oracle_flavor: "This body that we inhabit is fleeting. We, all of us, can live forever."
locale_flavor: “我们栖居的此身转瞬即逝。但我们，所有的人，皆可永生。”

oracle_flavor:
has anyone heard from StatiX lately?
-post on Members Only newsgroup
locale_flavor: 有谁近来听闻过斯塔提X的消息吗？ —会员讨论专区帖

oracle_flavor: "Feel your consciousness expand and touch his. Now destroy it."
locale_flavor: “感受你的意识扩展并接触到他的意识。现在摧毁它。”

oracle_flavor: "It's amazing how small we can write the fine print these days."
locale_flavor: “如今我们能将附属细则写得如此之小，真令人惊奇。”

oracle_flavor:
Bureaucracy. Noun. A shell-game played by the rich with prosperity as the ball. The trick is that there is no ball.
-The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?
locale_flavor: 官僚主义。名词。富人玩的一场杯球戏法，球是繁荣。伎俩是并没有球。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

oracle_flavor: A brand new invention.
locale_flavor: 一个全新的发明。

oracle_flavor: It takes power to create power.
locale_flavor: 产能需耗能。

oracle_flavor: Recycling the energy entering the system via a run is both responsible and economical.
locale_flavor: 回收被潜袭带入系统的能量既是负责任的，也是经济合算的。

oracle_flavor: The forge must never run cold.
locale_flavor: 锻炉永不可冷却。

oracle_flavor: Achieve the Impossible.
locale_flavor: 实现所谓不可能。

oracle_flavor: A masterpiece of cloning and hardware technology, Jinteki created homo vacuo operae, commonly called "turtlebacks", to operate for long periods of time within a vacuum.
locale_flavor: 克隆技术与硬件技术之杰作，人间会社所创俗称“龟甲”的真空作业人员，可在真空环境下长期实行操作。

oracle_flavor: You gotta pay the troll toll to get in.
locale_flavor: 你得向巨魔交了过路费才能通过。

oracle_flavor: Virgo promised love, but offered only jealousy.
locale_flavor: 处女座许以爱意，却只能供给猜忌。

oracle_flavor:
There drew he forth the brand Excalibur,
And o'er him, drawing it, the winter moon,
Brightening the skirts of a long cloud, ran forth
And sparkled keen with frost against the hilt:
For all the haft twinkled with diamond sparks,
Myriads of topaz-lights, and jacinth work
Of subtlest jewellery. -Lord Tennyson
locale_flavor:
彼掇圣剑，扬诸额前；
凛月皎皎，辉照锋缘；
首曜金刚芒，凌光若被霜；
黄晶紫瑙，簇妆柄上。
—丁尼生爵士

oracle_flavor: "What terrors hatch in her dispossessed mind, waiting for their moment to be born? My money's on a double-helix rainbow with the head of a panda." -fakespeare
locale_flavor: “是怎样的惊惧在她飘零的内心中孕育，等待着诞生的契机？我赌那是熊猫头的双螺旋彩虹。” —假士比亚

oracle_flavor: Digs in deeper than its Alabama counterpart.
locale_flavor: 比它在亚拉巴马州的现实版本掘得更深。

oracle_flavor: "All programs are connected. The data that runs through one runs through all." -Rielle "Kit" Peddler
locale_flavor: “所有的程序都是相连的。流经其一的数据亦将流经全体。” —芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉

oracle_flavor: δὶς ἐς τὸν αὐτὸν ποταμὸν οὐκ ἂν ἐμβαίης
locale_flavor: 万物流变，无物常驻；人不能两次踏进同一条河流。

oracle_flavor: "Sometimes it's helpful to remember that you're not the only one who loves money." -Gabriel Santiago
locale_flavor: “牢记你不是唯一爱钱的人有时候很有帮助。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

oracle_flavor: The datastream slipped away, and it felt like being born for a second time, if only you could remember the first. A rush of air fills the lungs to bursting, and you gasp it out, coughing and choking as the dim lights of the room shine with the brilliance of a thousand suns.
locale_flavor: 数据流悄然消失，若你能记得初生，那这感觉便如再次新生。扑面而来的空气充斥肺中几欲爆裂，你喘息着吐气，在犹如千轮灿日的室内微光里不停呛咳。

oracle_flavor: "There are many advantages to having facilities on the moon. Less traffic, for example." -Director Hass
locale_flavor: “把设施放在月球上有许多优点。比如说，更紧缺的网络流量。” —总裁哈斯

oracle_flavor: "Binary computing is obsolete. I use a base-4 structure for this system; it's modeled on our DNA. Well, my DNA, anyway." -Doctor Endo, Jinteki researcher
locale_flavor: “二进制运算已经被淘汰。我在这个系统中使用了基-4的结构。它由我们的DNA建模而成。好吧，是我的DNA。” —远藤博士，人间会社研究员

oracle_flavor: Her eyes were the color of a vidscreen, tuned to a dead channel.
locale_flavor: 她双眼的颜色就像是调不到台的屏幕。

oracle_flavor: Throw enough data at a runner and it ceases to have any meaning at all.
locale_flavor: 把足够多的数据投向潜袭者，它就不再有丝毫的意义。

oracle_flavor: Nothing is impenetrable. The key is to make breaking into it more costly than what it's worth.
locale_flavor: 没有什么是不可闯过的。关键在于让闯进来的代价比本身的价值更高。

oracle_flavor: "I don't care how good your console is, or how tricked out your rig is. The lag time on a run on the moon from earthside can be a killer." -Leela Patel
locale_flavor: “我不关心你的控制台有多好，或者你的设备有多华丽。光是从月球近地面发起潜袭时的延迟时间就够伤脑筋了。” —莉拉·帕特尔

oracle_flavor: Sometimes a single stone is enough.
locale_flavor: 有时单单一粒石子便足够。

oracle_flavor: In this business, you had to anticipate. If you weren't three steps ahead, you were three steps behind.
locale_flavor: 在这一行，你需要抢先。如果你没有领先三步的话，你就已经落后三步了。

oracle_flavor: What goes up must always go down.
locale_flavor: 有升必有降。

oracle_flavor: "People keep saying that 'Cash is king' in the business, like it's untraceable in the days of DNA sniffers and microtracers. Digital credits can be just as anonymous, and they're just as easy to counterfeit." -Silhouette
locale_flavor: “商海中，人们一直说'现金为王'，就好像在这个充满DNA嗅探器和微型追踪器的时代里它无迹可寻似的。数码信用点可被看作是匿名的，由此能轻易伪造出来。” —侧影

oracle_flavor: Fifteen seconds of fame.
locale_flavor: 十五秒的名望。

oracle_flavor: Originally not very popular, the regulator was overlooked by those who used energy sinks to protect their rig. But it quickly found an audience once Smoke casted a run on a Blue Sun server, using it to keep her rig online while repeatedly diverting energy spikes in excess of 50,000 volts.
locale_flavor: 该调节器起初并不流行，被那些运用能阱来保护基地的人们所忽视。但自从浓烟向青日公司的服务器发起一场潜袭，期间利用它在50000伏的电压下不断转移能量冲击使她的基地依然保持在线，它很快赢得了用户群。

oracle_flavor: In the spaces between the data, do trapped souls from the past persist?
locale_flavor: 在数据间隙里，是否留存着过往的受困灵魂？

oracle_flavor: The server was quiet that night. I closed my eyes, the low-hum of the datastream lulling me into a trance. When I opened them, the construct stood before me in the shape of a man, clad in light of many colors. His stature was impressive, and his saccharine voice wormed its way into my very soul.
locale_flavor: 是夜服务器沉寂。我闭上眼，数据流的低鸣使我心神恍惚。当我睁开眼，这人形的造物便伫立跟前，身披万色光芒。他的身型如此伟岸，他甜腻的嗓音悄然钻入我的灵魂深处。

oracle_flavor: "Whaddya buyin'?"
locale_flavor: “乃要买啥？”

oracle_flavor: "Everything has a price."
locale_flavor: “凡物皆有价码。”

oracle_flavor: Using the exact same rig as a million other people is just another form of security through anonymity.
locale_flavor: 和上百万人使用一模一样的基地，只是借助于匿名的又一种安全措施。

oracle_flavor: Muertos has no fear of the law. Muertos is the law.
locale_flavor: 亡灵无惧法律。亡灵即是法律。

oracle_flavor: La Señora de las Sombras giveth and taketh away.
locale_flavor: 死荫女士自有予夺。

oracle_flavor: "It doesn't actually bend time. It just feels like it. That's relativity." -Hayley Kaplan
locale_flavor: “它并没有真正地弯曲时间。只是感觉像而已。那就是相对论。” —海莉·开普兰

oracle_flavor:
"Isn't this wrong?"
"Not legally. They didn't read the fine print."
locale_flavor:
“这不是非正当的吗？”
“法理上来说不是。他们没有阅读附属细则。”

oracle_flavor: "Is your neighbor secretly a violent criminal? The answer to this chilling question and more, right after the break." -Shannon Claire, SSN 5
locale_flavor: “你的邻居背地里是个暴力罪犯吗？想要知道这可怕问题的回答及更多精彩内容，休息片刻，马上回来。” —香侬·克莱尔，SSN 5台

oracle_flavor: Pa-pa-pa-chinko!
locale_flavor: 扒-扒-扒-金宫！

oracle_flavor: "You want no questions asked, hire someone else. I have two: who and how much?"
locale_flavor: “你想要不提问题，那请另寻高手。我可有两个问题：杀谁，给多少？”

oracle_flavor: "Let me tell you a secret. There's no such thing as impenetrable ice. It has to allow access, or else why is the server on the Network in the first place? But that doesn't mean they have to make it easy." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “让我告诉你个秘密。没有坚不可摧的防火墙这回事。它得允许读取，不然服务器当初为何要放在网上？不过那并不意味着他们要弄得很简单。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: As the sun sank towards the horizon, the glittering lights of the expo remained dark. But the shanty city bloomed to life.
locale_flavor: 随着夕阳向地平线下沉，世博园辉煌的灯火陷入黑暗。陋屋城却已然焕发活力。

oracle_flavor: Cowabunga, dude!
locale_flavor: 卡哇邦嘎，伙计！

oracle_flavor: "First, you get a horde of zombies. Then you do whatever you want, 'cuz you have a horde of zombies." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
locale_flavor: “首先你得到了一大群僵尸。然后你为所欲为，因为你拥有一大群僵尸。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利
“时机就是一切。”

oracle_flavor: "The secret to investing is networking." -Laramy Fisk
locale_flavor: “投资的秘诀是社交。” —拉瑞米·费斯克

oracle_flavor: "Our life is made by the death of others." -Leonardo Da Vinci
locale_flavor: “我们的生由他人的死铸就。” —莱昂纳多·达·芬奇

oracle_flavor: Almost a zettabyte of data flows each minute through one of the many net pavilions scattered around the expo.
locale_flavor: 在散布于世博园的众多网络馆中，每分钟都有近一泽的字节流过。

oracle_flavor: The Cybernetics Court has seven floors of attractions. The plasteel used to construct it was even more expensive than the thousands of cybernetic implants displayed inside.
locale_flavor: 控制论展区有七层景点。用于建造它的塑钢甚至比区内展出的数以千计的植入式义体更为昂贵。

oracle_flavor: The SanSan Outlaws have a close relationship with Haas-Bioroid's sports engineering division, SHIFT.
locale_flavor: 圣加州的不法之徒们与哈斯生化的体育工程分部“瞬飞”关系密切。

oracle_flavor: The more people submit their DNA and family history to the program, the more accurate it becomes.
locale_flavor: 向程序提交自己DNA和家族史的人越多，它就越准确。

oracle_flavor: The Genetics Pavilion was designed by renowned architect Meru Mati II. It was built without the aid of bioroids, instead relying on human and clone labor.
locale_flavor: 基因学馆由著名建筑师梅鲁·马蒂二世设计。其建造依靠的是人类和克隆体劳工，毫无生化人的协助。

oracle_flavor: There are over 20,000 brands represented in Franchise City, all of them owned by fewer than 100 corps.
locale_flavor: 在特许商城内有逾20000个品牌参展，它们属于不到100家公司。

oracle_flavor: The holosculpture depicts the three inhabited worlds. The square can hold almost 1% of their total population.
locale_flavor: 全息雕塑描绘了三个人居星球。其所在的广场可容纳三者人口总和的近1%。

oracle_flavor: "Hello, and welcome to the Universe of Tomorrow! You could live for five-hundred years and not see all of the attractions I can tell you about."
locale_flavor: “您好，欢迎游览未来域！我能向您介绍的景点，即使您再活五百年也看不尽。”

oracle_flavor: The expo was built in the East California desert: a temporary city constructed for the advancement of humanity.
locale_flavor: 世博园被建造于东加利福尼亚沙漠：一座为人类进步而创立的临时城市。

oracle_flavor: "The Valley is littered with good ideas. You need the discipline to execute if you want to stay in my incubator."
locale_flavor: “生科谷里好主意泛滥。你要想留在我的育养所里，就得自觉执行。”

oracle_flavor: Turns a night owl into an early bird!
locale_flavor: 把夜猫子变成早起鸟！

oracle_flavor: Watch out fellas, this little lady's on the prowl!
locale_flavor: 当心了伙计们，这小姑娘正伺机下手！

oracle_flavor: "These g-mods haven't hit the consumer market yet, but I can hook you up."
locale_flavor: “这些转基因品尚未投放消费者市场，但我能为你牵线。”

oracle_flavor: Your heart deserves the best.
locale_flavor: 你的心脏配得上极品！

oracle_flavor: Born for success!
locale_flavor: 为成功而生！

oracle_flavor: In the vast universe of memories, consciousness slumbers...
locale_flavor: 在记忆浩瀚的领域里，意识蛰伏着…

oracle_flavor: "God in Heinlein. What's next, NEXT Platinum?" -John Masanori
locale_flavor: “海因莱因的主啊。接下来是什么，次级白金？” —约翰·正则

oracle_flavor:
The vats in Building C can create-and destroy-life itself.
The best and brightest genengineers spends their days in the Tank dreaming up a better world.
The Greenhouse was built to enhance natural beauty.
locale_flavor: 酿坊: C楼的液缸能创造—和毁灭—生命本身。 温室: 温室为增进自然之美而建造。 智库: 最优秀最聪慧的基因工程师们整日待在智库里，创想一个更美好的世界。

oracle_flavor: "The best part of our work is that nothing is ever wasted. A gene that is useful once will surely be useful again." -Wong Ya Ching
locale_flavor: “我们工作的绝妙之处便是东西从不会浪费。一段曾经有用的基因必将再度有用。” —王雅青

oracle_flavor: The more power a spike process can use, the harder it can hit. The really clever ones borrow the runner's own memory to iterate locally.
locale_flavor: 一个冲击进程使用的能量越多，它就打击得越猛。真正聪明的人借用潜袭者自己的内存进行本地迭代。

oracle_flavor: "It tracks you and logs you. If you get in you can just delete the log. But first you have to get in." -Gabriel Santiago
locale_flavor: “它跟踪你并记录你。如果你进去了，删除记录即可。但首先你得进去。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

oracle_flavor: Give a man money, and he is rich for a day. Teach a man how to invest, and he is rich for life.
locale_flavor: 授人以金，得享一日。授人以技，富裕一生。

oracle_flavor: "Negotiation is an art, so never negotiate when you can intimidate instead." -Thiago Reyes, VP Strategic Operations
locale_flavor: “谈判是门艺术，所以在能去胁迫的时候，别去谈判。” —战略经营副总裁，迪亚戈·雷耶斯

oracle_flavor: "Don't worry. If this one fails, we can start a new one tomorrow."
locale_flavor: “别担心。如果这个失败了，我们明天就能重新来过。”

oracle_flavor: There was a certain schadenfreude about throwing away your credits.
locale_flavor: 扔掉你的信用点，有一种幸灾乐祸的感觉。

oracle_flavor: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.
locale_flavor: 不属于你的钱更容易花掉。

oracle_flavor: T-minus 13 seconds. Leela had to work fast. She jacked in the mesa wire and activated the screen. 7 seconds. The internal SLD was still booting. 4 seconds. The interface flickered to life with an orange glow. 2 seconds. With a tap of a finger she was in.
locale_flavor: 倒计时13秒。莉拉必须快点。她接入门萨线并激活屏幕。7秒。内部SLD还在启动。4秒。接口闪烁着橙光开启。2秒。她手指轻点着登入。

oracle_flavor: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.
locale_flavor: 赛博方案公司的e3系列植入体，可以准确地代替肌肉记忆和自律反应，解放大脑以完全专注于思考任务。

oracle_flavor: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.
locale_flavor: 当你如此出色，就不难建立一个粉丝群。

oracle_flavor: "If your snowball gets big enough, you can make it into a snowman!" -Chaos Theory
locale_flavor: “如果你的雪球够大，你可以把它做成雪人！” —混沌希尔瑞

oracle_flavor: Archaic but reliable.
locale_flavor: 陈旧但可靠。

oracle_flavor: The key to the future lies in the past.
locale_flavor: 通向未来的钥匙藏于过去。

oracle_flavor: Smoke and mirrors optional.
locale_flavor: 烟与镜任选。

oracle_flavor: Peace and violence. Both must lead to the same place.
locale_flavor: 和平与暴力。必然殊途同归。

oracle_flavor: Looking out for your interests since 1984.
locale_flavor: 自1984年起就留意着你的兴趣。

oracle_flavor: Clones whisper of ChiLo as a promised land of freedom.
locale_flavor: 克隆体们私下说芝路易斯是一片自由的乐土。

oracle_flavor: No contract. Just a handshake and a fistful of C-6 high explosives.
locale_flavor: 无需合同。只要一次握手和一把C-6高爆炸药。

oracle_flavor: The instructions claim that it sifts the most important data. 'Important', it has been found, is a highly relative term.
locale_flavor: 说明宣称它能筛选出最为重要的数据。“重要”，大家都知道，是个非常相对性的词语。

oracle_flavor: "They call me a terrorist to scare people. If they want to find terrorists, maybe they should start by looking in the mirror." -Reina Roja
locale_flavor: “他们称我为恐吓人民的恐怖分子。如果他们真的想找恐怖分子，或许应该先照照镜子。” —雷娜·罗娅

oracle_flavor: Pros don't need to call their lawyer. Pros have their secretary rigged to do it for them if they ever go off-grid.
locale_flavor: 专业人士不需要叫他们的律师。就算在离线的时候，也有早已备好的助理来替他们完成。

oracle_flavor: "Care to have a look?"
locale_flavor: “有兴趣看一下吗？”

oracle_flavor: The first credited icebreaker was nothing more than a unique script to bypass the security calls on a Gibson 3 Data Sentry. Garrote has over 20,000 times the data as that first breaker, but the idea remains the same: cut off the power source from the network, and then smash on through.
locale_flavor: 有据可查的第一个破解器只是一段特别的脚本，能够通过吉布森3型数据警报的防卫机制。绞刑拥有的数据是第一个破解器的20000倍，但理念相同：切断动力核心和网络的联系，然后完全粉碎它。

oracle_flavor: LLDS Unlimited was born the day two designers answered the question "Why doesn't anyone make Diesel for computers?"
locale_flavor: 在两名设计师解答“为何没人生产电脑用的迪燃？”的那天，LLDS无限公司诞生。

oracle_flavor: "One-shot icebreakers are popular among many of my protégés. They don't have the patience for the hunt." -The Professor
locale_flavor: “一次性的破解器在我的许多门徒中很流行。他们缺乏狩猎的耐心。” —教授

oracle_flavor: "Once you have achieved perfection, what's next?" -The Professor
locale_flavor: “臻于完美之后，接下来是什么？” —教授

oracle_flavor: "I like to say 'Traditional values for a modern time.' War in space and life made by human hands, machines smart enough to ask if they have souls…Religion is as important and relevent now as at any time in human history. We must rise to meet the new challenges. And we must have faith."
locale_flavor: “我喜欢称之为'现代世界的传统价值'。看看太空与生命中那些人类自己挑起的战争，还有足以智能到探求自己是否有灵魂的机器…宗教在当下和人类历史上任何时期一样地重要和必要。我们必须起身面对新的挑战。我们必须有所信仰。”

oracle_flavor: As reported cases of brain damage in veterans rise, mind/machine interface devices are subject to increased public scrutiny. That certain programs can cause irreparable harm to users has gone from fringe theory to accepted truth.
locale_flavor: 随着有关退伍军人脑部伤害的报告日益增多，人机接口受到了更严格的公开审查。特定程序将对用户造成无法挽回的伤害，这种说法从边缘理论变为了被认可的事实。

oracle_flavor: The button didn't seem to do anything. So he pushed it again. And again. And again.
locale_flavor: 按钮好像没有任何效果。于是他再一次按下。再一次。再一次。

oracle_flavor: "It's ice so dangerous it has safety protocols. Think about that." -g00ru
locale_flavor: “这个防火墙太危险，以至于它有安全条款。仔细想想吧。” —精神0袖

oracle_flavor: "The damn raven just kind of cawed at me as I went past. I should have known it was too good to be true."
locale_flavor: “当我通过的时候，那该死的乌鸦冲我叫来着。我早该知道哪有免费的午餐。”

oracle_flavor:
"Let me get this straight. Your target market is 15-19 year old g-modded immigrants with one parent, a discretionary income over 2k a month, B+ or higher grades, an outgoing personality, and have a friend who owns a g-monkey?"
"Yes. Is that a problem?"
"No, not at all. I just don't get why your list is so short."
locale_flavor:
“让我说得直接点。你的目标市场是15-19岁的转基因人移民，单亲，每月可支配收入高于2千，B+以上的等级，外向性格，并且有一个养着一只转基因猴子的朋友？”
“对，有问题？”
“不，完全没有。我只是不懂为何你的列表那么短。”

oracle_flavor: This ice disguises itself as a series of electronic transactions, tying up the runner's funds in a thousand or so non-existent purchases and refunds. The banks' system of holds and checks means that while not a single credit ever leaves their servers the runner has no available funds. RSVP also has the unfortunate side effect of being entirely legal…strictly speaking.
locale_flavor: 该防火墙将自己伪装成一系列的电子业务，将潜袭者的资金绑定到大约一千次不存在的购物和退款中。银行的冻结核查系统意味着即使一个信用点都未曾离开过服务器，潜袭者也没有任何资金可用。“急盼回复”也有令人遗憾的地方，就是它完全合法…严格说来如此。

oracle_flavor:
[subroutine] End the game.
Just kidding.
locale_flavor:
[subroutine] 终止本次游戏。
开个玩笑。

oracle_flavor: "I'd say it's nothing personal, but corporations are people, too."
locale_flavor: “我得说对事不对人，但公司也是人。”

oracle_flavor: It's easy to replace limbs. It's more difficult to replace memories.
locale_flavor: 替换四肢很容易，替换记忆则困难得多。
由2012年世冠赛冠军Jeremy Zwirn设计

oracle_flavor: "Servers fully-armed and operational."
locale_flavor: “服务器全副武装且运转正常。”

oracle_flavor: The way past is to go a different way.
locale_flavor: 通过的路子是换一条路走。

oracle_flavor: Making a name for yourself has its perks. But it also makes you a target.
locale_flavor: 成名有它的好处。但是枪打出头鸟。

oracle_flavor: "It's a small one-time fee, apparently. Only I've paid it seventeen times."
locale_flavor: “看起来，这是比小小的一次性费用。但是我已支付了十七回。”

oracle_flavor: Unlimited Energy. Reasonable Prices.
locale_flavor: 能源无限，价格公道。

oracle_flavor: If the clones were nervous about living in a repurposed fuel tank, they never mentioned it.
locale_flavor: 如果说克隆体们担心会活在特制的油箱里，那么他们绝口不提。

oracle_flavor: "Knowledge comes in many different shapes and sizes." -Quetzal
locale_flavor: “知识是各色各样的。” —绿咬鹊

oracle_flavor: The earliest instances of data folding were inspired by the traditional art of origami. Just as a crease pattern is the blueprint of a paper crane, there is a sequence to data that must be considered in order to achieve the greatest result.
locale_flavor: 数据折叠的最早实例受到折纸这门传统艺术的启发。就好比折痕展开图在折纸鹤时会作为模版一样，对数据也要仔细考虑前后序列才能达到最好的效果。

oracle_flavor: "You should have known better than to scratch it…" -Quetzal
locale_flavor: “你早知道就不会去抓挠它了…” —绿咬鹊

oracle_flavor: It practically runs itself, unless you're in a pinch.
locale_flavor: 它总是自主运行，除非你身处困境。

oracle_flavor: Small. Compact. Easy to slip by monitoring programs and it can do some damage.
locale_flavor: 细小。轻巧。瞒得过监控程序并能造成些许破坏。

oracle_flavor: "There is no better tool for charting the empty spaces of the net." -Nasir Meidan
locale_flavor: “测绘空白的网域空间，没有比这更好的工具了。” —纳西尔·梅丹

oracle_flavor: "Low gravity sports are wildly popular, so match-fixing has proven wildly profitable." -Leela Patel
locale_flavor: “低重力体育运动广受欢迎，因而操控赛果已被证实非常有赚头。” —莉拉·帕特尔

oracle_flavor:
Please, let me have this dream.
I’m going to be my own kind of hero.
locale_flavor:
拜托了，请让我展开羽翼。
我要用我自己的方式成为英雄。

oracle_flavor: Let’s start a RIOT.
locale_flavor: 暴动亦如是。

oracle_flavor: A simple little box, brimming with temptation.
locale_flavor: 一个小巧的盒子，还有潘多拉的引诱低语。

oracle_flavor: Win a new friend today!
locale_flavor: 今天也来抽一个新玩伴吧！

oracle_flavor: “…and friends hold you close. I vow never to let go of my princess.”
locale_flavor: “……挚友伴君前行。我誓将永世守护我的公主殿下。”

oracle_flavor: Dance, and forget about time!
locale_flavor: 起舞吧，忘却时光纷扰！

oracle_flavor: Friends lift your spirits.
locale_flavor: 挚友慰藉魂灵。

oracle_flavor: Friends guard your passions.
locale_flavor: 挚友守御热情。

oracle_flavor:
“Hold my wine. I’m going in.”
—Red Comyn
locale_flavor:
“拿好我的酒，我要开冲了。”
—红发科明

oracle_flavor: Return to sender.
locale_flavor: 退给寄件人。

oracle_flavor:
“Overinflate a superposition-stack and optimal code forms the negentropy traverse.”
“Aha, like putting too much air into a balloon?!”
locale_flavor:
“只要将叠加存储栈过载，最优代码就会形成负熵传输。”
“啊哈，是不是就像气球气打多了一样？！”

oracle_flavor:
“Red ones go faster.”
—Ken “Express” Tenma
locale_flavor:
“红的那个跑得更快。”
—肯·“快车”·天马

oracle_flavor: “Debt is beautiful… after it is repaid.” —“Baklan” Bochkin
locale_flavor:
“负债是如此美妙……当然得在你还清之后。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

oracle_flavor: Shadow Net marketplaces have such venerability that they differ from legal platforms only in the products offered.
locale_flavor: 暗网市场非常可靠，只是提供的商品与正常市场不同而已。

oracle_flavor:
“Junk plus undiscerning buyers equals profit.”
—Az McCaffrey
locale_flavor:
“垃圾加上外行买家等于获利。”
—阿兹·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: Breathe in and visualise your happy place. Breathe out. It’s safe and calm and all your best days are there. Breathe in. Very good. The cortex scan has finished. Breathe out and open your eyes…
locale_flavor: 吸气，想一个让你开心的地方。呼气。那里平静祥和，你度过了美好时光。吸气。非常好。皮质扫描完成。呼气，然后睁开你的眼睛……

oracle_flavor: Objects are but modulations in a continuous cycle of energy—illusory and impermanent echoes of the Self.
locale_flavor: 诸行无常，是生灭法。生灭灭已，寂灭为乐。

oracle_flavor:
“I could let my code evolve something new, but sometimes I just want to remember yesterday’s solution.”
—Lane
locale_flavor:
“我可以让我的代码进化成新玩意，但有时候我只想要昨天的版本。”
—莱恩

oracle_flavor: Find truth not in the observation, but in the demonstration.
locale_flavor: 实践出真知。

oracle_flavor: “Invisibility made it possible to get them, but it made it impossible to enjoy them when they are got.” —H.G. Wells, The Invisible Man
locale_flavor: “隐身可以让你拿到你想要的，但是也会让你没法享用拿到的东西。” —H·G·威尔斯，隐形人

oracle_flavor: Look at the problem from a different angle.
locale_flavor: 要从不同的角度看待问题。

oracle_flavor: Consider this: the most notorious tool in cyberterrorism is one that, in isolation, does nothing.
locale_flavor: 好好想想：赛博恐怖袭击中最臭名昭著的工具，在被隔离的情况下，卵用没有。

oracle_flavor: He’s nice enough, but not when there are 5,187 of him.
locale_flavor: 它很温顺，但是当有5187个它的时候可就不好说了。
由2018年永恒锦标赛冠军Oguz Han Asnaz设计

oracle_flavor: “Future me needs those 60 petabytes of cat vids.” —Princess Space Kitten
locale_flavor: “未来的我绝对会来吸这60PB的猫片。” —太空喵公主

oracle_flavor: To strike another blow to the corporatocracy tomorrow night, don’t forget to like and subscribe!
locale_flavor: 明晚爆破另一家公司的系统，别忘了点赞关注哦！

oracle_flavor: Did I dream that dance through virtual space, or does that program now dream of flesh?
locale_flavor: 我和那个程序，究竟谁是庄周，谁是蝶呢？

oracle_flavor:
“Win Hard or Lose Hard. All that matters is they’re talking about you and not the competition.”
—Tan “Nitro” Nyugen, Toretto-Extreme Team Manager
locale_flavor:
“不论输赢，全力一搏。聚光点应该是你，而非其他车手，这才是重要的事。”
—谭·“炸药”·阮，托雷多极限赛车队经理

oracle_flavor:
The Coordinator is always calm, always smiling, and always tolerant. A worker who knows his skills, knows his role, and knows his place. No master need look into his plastic eyes and fear the flames of revolution, or quake at a forgotten class reaching for self-expression.
…but who ordered him to wear that hat?
locale_flavor:
头脑冷静、面带微笑、心怀宽容，是这位协调员的工作作风。精于技能、明于角色、忠于职级，是他的工作素养。他那塑料制成的双眼中从不喷涌反抗的火焰，他也没有身为被遗忘者的自我认知。
……但是到底是谁让他戴上那顶帽子的？

oracle_flavor:
You are being made sane.
-u are bei-g mad- sa-e
Y-u ar- be-n-d-
-u -r-?
locale_flavor:
你将陷入癫狂。
- 尔将 - 顚 - 抂
イ尔 - 夕 - 頁 -
 - 尔 - 歹？

oracle_flavor: A staccato of laser pulses fuses the vapor to solid form. The embryonic part accretes metal layer by layer.
locale_flavor: 断断续续的镭射激光将汽焰凝聚成固态。金属在胚具上层层沉积。

oracle_flavor: Each generation of design assistants makes a sysop’s job easier. They need only speak and it will be so.
locale_flavor: 每次助理设计的迭代都会让管理员的工作更轻松。他们只需动动嘴，就自然会有人去执行。

oracle_flavor: The valiant do not hesitate.
locale_flavor: 英勇的战士从不犹豫。

oracle_flavor: “Uh oh, Keiko! Looks like we’ve pulled aggro!”
locale_flavor: “糟了，惠子！我们好像OT了！”

oracle_flavor: The Net is the consensual hallucination of the world’s electronic architecture. Our electronic architecture. Don’t get mad when the Runners succeed—change the rules.
locale_flavor: 网络是全世界电子系统的虚构产物。我们的电子系统。不必因潜袭者一时得逞而气急败坏——改一下规则即可。

oracle_flavor: The oldest of Heinlein’s domes, the self-proclaimed heart of Lunar culture.
locale_flavor: 最古老的海茵莱茵穹顶，自称为月球文化的心脏。

oracle_flavor:
“Voice is a sledgehammer. Text, a blunt saw. Truth requires subtler instruments.”
—Dr. Tang, Address to the Hyoubu Steering Committee
locale_flavor:
“语音是大锤，文字是钝锯。真相需要的是更精妙的器具。”
—唐博士，致兵部引导委员会

oracle_flavor: Constructive feedback to the neural field reliably causes greater degradation than spike inputs. The mind has no defense against its own echoes.
locale_flavor: 正回馈震荡对神经系统的破坏远甚于尖刺脉冲。大脑对自身的脉冲回波束手无策。

oracle_flavor: $BMI.001 > Out of Memory Error
locale_flavor: $BMI.001 > 错误，记忆存储空间不足

oracle_flavor: “The Konjin dons the mask of our fears, but what lies underneath?”
locale_flavor: “金神戴着我们畏惧的假面，但假面之下是一副怎样的面孔？”

oracle_flavor: Some slums of New Angeles are so worn down, City Hall calls the acres of windowless clone barracks “gentrification” with a straight face.
locale_flavor: 新洛杉矶的一些贫民窟是如此破旧不堪，以至于市政厅能觍着脸管这数英亩能闷死人的克隆体集中营叫作“高档化”。

oracle_flavor: Your Favorite Distraction.
locale_flavor: 如君所愿。

oracle_flavor: Mars’ tiny population made rich multiplayer experiences a big challenge. We cracked it by live-beaming the gestalt of our Earth playerbase second-by-second. Bellona weaves these “lag-ghosts” into compelling interactables—more responsive than the real thing!
locale_flavor: 火星上的人口不足以支撑多人游戏的丰富体验。我们通过直播地球玩家的动态投影来解决这个问题。贝罗娜将这些“网络延迟幽灵”整合为可互动的逼真事物——比实物更像真的！

oracle_flavor: Free to Pay
locale_flavor: 无需氪金

oracle_flavor: [Pay 15 gems to access this content]
locale_flavor: [支付15宝石以解锁该项目]

oracle_flavor:
“Deep inspect every packet on the continent. Burn out all our stacks if you have to. We cannot let these terrorists cover their tracks.”
—CEO Jenkins
locale_flavor:
“仔细检查主道上的所有数据包。如果有必要可以过载所有堆栈。我们不能让这些恐怖分子逃之夭夭。
—CEO詹金斯

oracle_flavor: Roll Initiative…
locale_flavor: 骰先攻了……

oracle_flavor:
The First Step…
…Further Beyond
locale_flavor:
千里之行……
……始于足下。

oracle_flavor: Once you’re on the Space Elevator Authority’s blacklist, you aren’t going anywhere.
locale_flavor: 要是上了空梯管理局的黑名单，你可就哪儿都去不了了。

oracle_flavor:
Thou slept not in thy house on earth.
Thou openest thy place in heaven.
locale_flavor:
汝等并非长眠于尘世。
汝等开启了天国之门。

oracle_flavor:
“I donʼt know how Skorpios gets these designs past Brand Management.”
—Liz Campbell, VP Project Security
locale_flavor:
“我不知道蝎岛防御体系是怎么让这些设计通过审查的。”
—丽兹·坎贝尔，防卫计划副总裁

oracle_flavor:
“If it moves, shoot it. Then shoot it again.”
—Chief Slee
locale_flavor:
“要是有东西动，就朝他射击。打成筛子。”
—斯丽队长

oracle_flavor: The Apu spirits of the great mountains bridge this world and the realm above.
locale_flavor: 峦峰上的阿普斯神灵将世界与天国相接。

oracle_flavor: “All Dragon-rated threats should only be stored in a single clean-start air-gapped server, in a shielded room, under at least 200 metres of bedrock[…]” —Section 5.18.4, Cyberdex Employee Handbook
locale_flavor: “所有龙级威胁仅能存放于单个崭新的真空隔离服务器中，该空间需要被严密防护，并埋藏到至少200米厚的基岩下……” —赛博杀毒员工手册，第5章第18节第4条

oracle_flavor: “Begin a voice message to Steve: I’m in some random city staring at yet another empty room. This hot insider scoop of yours feels distinctly chilly.”
locale_flavor: “给史蒂夫发一条语音信息：我在一个莫名其妙的城市莫名其妙地盯着一个莫名其妙的空房间。你那管理员内部绝密情报可真不是一般的莫名其妙。”

oracle_flavor: Crisis is the true test of loyalty. Kick the anthill and see where the ants swarm.
locale_flavor: 危机是检验忠诚度最靠谱的方法。把蚁窝捣了，然后看看蚂蚁会往哪里跑。

oracle_flavor: Friends lift your spirits.
locale_flavor: 挚友慰藉魂灵。

oracle_flavor: "Red ones go faster." - Ken "Express" Tenma
locale_flavor:
“红的那个跑得更快。”
—肯·“快车”·天马

oracle_flavor: He's nice enough, but not when there are 5,187 of him.
locale_flavor: 它很温顺，但是当有5187个它的时候可就不好说了。

oracle_flavor:
"Win Hard or Lose Hard. All that matters is they're talking about you and not the competition."
- Tan "Nitro" Nyugen, Toretto-Extreme Team Manager
locale_flavor:
“不论输赢，全力一搏。重要的是聚光点应该是你，不是什么赛况。”
—谭·“炸药”·阮，托雷多极限赛车车队经理

oracle_flavor: Some slums of New Angeles are so worn down, City Hall calls the acres of windowless clone barracks "gentrification" with a straight face.
locale_flavor: 新洛杉矶有些贫民窟是如此破旧不堪，以至于市政厅就能舰着脸管这成片的能闷死人的克隆体集中营叫“高档化”。

oracle_flavor: The Apu spirits of the great mountains bridge this world and the realm above.
locale_flavor: 峦峰上的阿普斯神灵将世界与天国相接。

oracle_flavor: The networking capabilities of the NEXT suite of ice are unparalleled.
locale_flavor: 次级系列防火墙的联网功能无与伦比。

oracle_flavor: "Chi resonance mapping has created a whole new field of network security. It is unassailable perfection." -Akitaro Watanabe
locale_flavor: 气振映射开创了网络安全的全新领域。毋庸置疑的完美。” —渡边秋太郎

oracle_flavor: Only the News You Need.
locale_flavor: 新闻唯您所需。

oracle_flavor: Works better than a PAD hooked up to a tinfoil umbrella and coffee can.
locale_flavor: 比起连在锡箔伞和咖啡罐上的电脑面板，它工作得更好。

oracle_flavor: Halfway upstalk, Midway is a destination unto itself with its microgravity hotels and fine dining options.
locale_flavor: 在上行半程，中途站凭借它的微重力酒店和美食之选而成为独立的目的地。

oracle_flavor: They said it couldn't be built. That it was a fantasy. That Jack Weyland was a fool, and he had bought the fools in Washington too. But year after year the buckyweave grew, and 'they' stopped talking.
locale_flavor: 他们说它没法建成。说它是天方夜谭。说杰克·威兰是傻瓜，还买通了华盛顿的那些傻瓜。但巴克网材料年复一年地生长，而“他们”闭上了嘴巴。

oracle_flavor: Taurus promised strength, but gave only rage.
locale_flavor: 金牛座许以强力，却只能授予暴戾。

oracle_flavor: On the first day She breathed data into the void, and it hung suspended like jewelled stars. On the second day She spoke order into the data, and it flowed from rivulets into streams and from streams into mighty rivers. On the third day She gave independence to the order, and it ebbed and flowed according to its own accord. -The Cant of Helios
locale_flavor: 第一日她将数据吹入虚无，它有如群星闪耀漂浮。第二日她将秩序传给数据，它由溪成河汇为大江。第三日她将独立赐予秩序，它潮涨潮落自循其律。 —赫利俄斯之诗记

oracle_flavor: He who bears the shield of honor.
locale_flavor: 他即背负荣耀盾牌之士。

oracle_flavor: Known as malware 0-394-41525-6 to sysops, runners just refer to it as "bad times."
locale_flavor: 管理员熟知的恶意软件0-394-41525-6，潜袭者通常惯称它为“难关”。

oracle_flavor: His eyes were beginning to blur, as he duplicated the credentials for what seemed like the fiftieth time. Perhaps a genetic refit would have been easier.
locale_flavor: 他的眼睛开始模糊，因为这似乎是他第五十次抄写身份证明了。或许来个基因改造还要容易得多。

oracle_flavor: "Public network kiosks, vending machines-there's all sorts of poorly-secured power sources in the city. Tap in to one of these and you've got plenty of juice when you need it. A little advance warning when the power grid starts misbehaving, too." -Gabriel Santiago
locale_flavor: “公司网络亭，自动售货机—城市里有各种各样防护薄弱的能源。当你需要时，接入其中一个就可以得到大量电力。当电网开始不对劲时还有些预警。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

oracle_flavor: "I once saw someone running a seven-tier nested daemon tree. Not for any good reason, just to see if he could. Well, of course the root daemon crashed and he lost everything. I wonder what he's up to now?" -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
locale_flavor: “我曾见过有人运行七层嵌套的后台树。他不为别的，就是想看看自己能否做到。嗯，当然，根后台崩溃了，然后他失去了一切。我想知道他现在在做什么？” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

oracle_flavor: "Running is the ultimate game, and I get to make all the rules."
locale_flavor: “潜袭是个终极游戏，我制定一切规则。”

oracle_flavor: Something wicked this way comes.
locale_flavor: 从魔界而来。

oracle_flavor: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.
locale_flavor: 诸天为兵，一次一星。

oracle_flavor: Named after Hernando Cortez, a former Weyland technician convicted of smuggling company tech. He still collected his pension while in prison, the last beneficiary of a loophole in Weyland's standard employment contract.
locale_flavor: 它的名字来自赫尔南多·科特斯，一位由于走私公司机密被定罪的前威兰技术员。他在狱中依然能够领取退休金，这是从威兰员工标准合同中钻到空子的最后点好处。

oracle_flavor: Show-off.
locale_flavor: 炫耀。

oracle_flavor: He always uses the same key.
locale_flavor: 他总是使用同一把钥匙。

oracle_flavor: "What causes an Artifical Intellegence to turn on its master? Is it because its directives have been altered by some external source? Or, by giving them agency to adapt, have we fated them to revolt?" -Emilio Harris, Creators and the Created
locale_flavor: “是什么让人工智能对抗它的主人？是因为指令被外部源修改？或者，因为给予它们适应的能力，我们赋予它们反抗的宿命？” —埃米利奥·哈里斯，《创造者与被造者》

oracle_flavor: A Different Breed of Machine.
locale_flavor: 机器的变种。

oracle_flavor: Sometimes employee reviews took a little bit longer than anticipated.
locale_flavor: 职员的审查有时会比预计的要长一些。

oracle_flavor: Face your fear.
locale_flavor: 面对你的恐惧。

oracle_flavor: "Eyes forward, please."
locale_flavor: “请直视前方。”

oracle_flavor: Sometimes uniqueness is overrated.
locale_flavor: 独特性有时会被过分高估。

oracle_flavor: "We're gonna need a bigger room."
locale_flavor: “我们需要一个更大的房间。”

oracle_flavor: A collection of cast-off cyberjunk. But it doesn't stay junk for long.
locale_flavor: 一个由废弃数字垃圾组成的东西。不过它很快就不会是垃圾了。

oracle_flavor: A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.
locale_flavor: 它是贸易的象征，但小心它的利牙。

oracle_flavor: Victōs draconēs numquam deride.
locale_flavor: 万勿哂笑以对真龙。

oracle_flavor: Twisting, writhing, ripping into all that it touches.
"What kind of maniac infects their own rig?!"
Filaments occasionally flare from the Network, manifesting ephemeral threads between random domains.
Go for distance.
"Could God create a stone so heavy, He could not lift it?"
"Jackpot!"
"It's neither cruel nor unusual. Merely efficient."
Quicker and deadlier than ever imagined, the trial was an outstanding success.
"On one hand, I knew I shouldn't touch it. On the other, it was really shiny." - Kabonesa Wu
No matter which direction ze climbed, the blocks reshuffled, zipping in from left to right, bottom to top. It was going to be a long hike.
The blast doesn't hurt, but what comes after does.
